column2: In Brass: Birmingham, you become an ambitious entrepreneur during the Industrial Revolution, constructing networks and industries in 18th-19th century England. Across two eras, canal and rail, you navigate changing demands and economic challenges. Each turn, you strategically choose actions like building, networking, and developing your industries to outsmart competitors and accumulate the most victory points. Unique mechanics like card management and a varied setup ensure no two games feel the same.
Build networks, grow industries, and navigate the world of the Industrial Revolution.

In Pandemic Legacy: Season 1, you will tackle a thrilling campaign across 12-24 sessions, depending on your team's success. You'll start by racing against time to curb global diseases, much like in classic Pandemic, but with a twist as the storyline evolves. You and your team of specialists will journey worldwide, heal disease hotspots, and research cures. As months pass, you'll face new rules, permanent changes, and intense decisions that shape your game forever. Teamwork is crucial to saving humanity.
Mutating diseases are spreading around the world - can your team save humanity?

In Ark Nova, you will design a modern zoo focused on conservation. Build enclosures and accommodate animals to increase your zoo's attraction. Use action cards strategically to manage your gameplay, where the cards' positions determine their power. Gain and use cards featuring animals, specialists, enclosures, and projects to enhance your zoo's reputation. Plan wisely, as each decision impacts your path to becoming the most successful zoological establishment.
Plan and build a modern, scientifically managed zoo to support conservation projects.

In Gloomhaven, you take on the roles of wandering adventurers equipped with unique skills and motivations. In this ever-evolving world, you'll explore dark dungeons and forgotten ruins, fighting automated monsters with strategic cardplay. Each turn, choose two cards and decide your actions wisely, as over time, you may lose cards and be forced to retreat. Cooperative gameplay and branching storylines make each decision impactful in your quest to carve out a legacy, all within approximately 150 minutes.
Vanquish monsters with strategic cardplay. Fulfill your quest to leave your legacy!

In Twilight Imperium: Fourth Edition, you dive into epic space battles and political intrigue to become the ruler of the galaxy. Choose one of seventeen unique factions, each with its own strengths and strategies. Build your galaxy by strategically placing system tiles, explore new worlds, and engage in trade or warfare. The game is dynamic, with a strategic action system and evolving objectives. Plan your moves wisely and outmaneuver your opponents in a race to achieve ten victory points first.
Build an intergalactic empire through trade, research, conquest and grand politics.

In Dune: Imperium, you step into the shoes of a leader from one of the Great Houses of the Landsraad. Engage in a deep strategy game combining deck-building and worker placement mechanics, drawing inspiration from the iconic Dune universe. Craft your strategy by acquiring powerful cards, deploying agents, and navigating political intrigue. As you vie for control over Arrakis, will you prioritize military strength or political cunning? Each decision shapes the fate of your House and determines who will control the all-important spice.
Influence, intrigue, and combat in the universe of Dune.

In Terraforming Mars, you control a corporation tasked with making Mars habitable in the 2400s. You will invest in projects to increase temperature, raise oxygen levels, and create oceans. As you develop your infrastructure, you'll balance buying and playing project cards to maximize your resource production. Compete for the best locations on Mars and earn victory points by achieving milestones and awards. The game ends when the planet has been successfully terraformed.
Compete with rival CEOs to make Mars habitable and build your corporate empire.
War of the Ring: Second Edition <small>(2011)</small>

In War of the Ring: Second Edition, you will decide the fate of Middle-earth as either the Free Peoples or the Shadow Armies. As Sauron, you aim to crush resistance and find the One Ring. As the Free Peoples, your hope lies in escorting the Ring to Mount Doom while fending off assaults. Game turns revolve around action dice, allowing you to move armies, recruit forces, or influence the political landscape. Strategic use of event cards can change battles and tactics, making each game replayable and full of intrigue.
The Fellowship and the Free Peoples clash with Sauron over the fate of Middle-earth.

In Star Wars: Rebellion, you take control of either the imposing Galactic Empire or the valiant Rebel Alliance. Experience the struggle for the galaxy as you command fleets of starships, deploy troops, and execute strategic missions. Use your wits and resourcefulness to either crush the Rebel base or evade the Empire's mighty forces. The game's cinematic scope is filled with iconic characters and secret missions that bring epic Star Wars moments to life. Can you shape the fate of a galaxy far, far away?
Strike from your hidden base as the Rebels—or find and destroy it as the Empire.

In Spirit Island, you become powerful spirits protecting your island home from invading colonizers. Collaborate with fellow spirits, each wielding unique elemental powers, to push back the intruders. Strategically choose energy and power cards to thwart the spread of blight across the island. The invaders expand and ravage the land, but with planning and teamwork, you'll grow stronger and repel them. Each turn requires forethought as you strike a balance between fast and slow actions to reclaim your territory.
Island Spirits join forces using elemental powers to defend their home from invaders.

In Gloomhaven: Jaws of the Lion, you step into a rich fantasy world with unique characters like Valrath Red Guard and Inox Hatchet. You'll face 16 types of monsters over a 25-scenario campaign, uncovering dark secrets behind mysterious disappearances in the city. Transforming cardboard map tiles into a book offers easy gameplay setup, making it perfect for newcomers. The game simplifies learning with a tutorial and engages you with strategic cardplay and story-driven exploration.
Vanquish monsters with strategic cardplay in a 25-scenario Gloomhaven campaign.

In Dune: Imperium – Uprising, you navigate the treacherous sands of Arrakis, balancing military might and political intrigue. Employ spies, secure vital contracts, and learn to ride the fearsome sandworms to gain the upper hand. This standalone expansion introduces a new six-player mode, pitting two teams against one another in a high-stakes struggle for dominance. It builds on the original's blend of deck-building and worker placement, offering fresh strategies and challenges. Will your alliance prevail?
Compete in teams on Arrakis and learn to ride the sandworms.

"Immerse yourself in the expansive universe of Gaia Project, where you take the role of one of 14 unique alien factions striving to expand across the stars. On a modular board representing different planetary systems, you'll terraform planets into your faction's preferred habitats, expand your reach, and develop advanced technologies. Balance strategic resource management with technological advancement to outmaneuver your opponents and claim victory in this epic space civilization builder.
Expand, research, upgrade, and settle the galaxy with one of 14 alien species.

In Twilight Struggle, you dive into the tense geopolitics of the Cold War, playing as either the USA or USSR. You will strategically use cards to exert global influence, manage resources, and decide key historical events. The game is played over a world map where your every move must counter your opponent's strategies, all while avoiding nuclear escalation that could end the game abruptly. It's a battle of wits, reflecting the intricate dance of diplomacy and power during this historic period.
Relive the Cold War and rewrite history in an epic clash between the USA and USSR.
Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization <small>(2015)</small>

Build your civilization from the ground up in Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization. Manage resources as you lead your nation from antiquity to the modern age. Discover technologies, elect influential leaders, construct monumental wonders, and maintain a robust military. Balance is key—focus too heavily on one aspect, and you're vulnerable to opponents’ strategies. With a unique card drafting system, choose technologies wisely to outpace your rivals and claim victory with the most culture.
Rewrite history as you build up your civilization in this epic card drafting game!

In "Die Burgen von Burgund," you will step into the shoes of an aristocrat in medieval France and transform your small princedom into a prosperous estate. Through strategic tile placement, you will construct settlements, grand castles, trade along the river, and exploit silver mines. Dice rolls guide your actions, allowing you to expand your territory and earn victory points. With a blend of strategy and chance, this game is about balancing resource management and tactical decisions in your pursuit of success.
Plan, trade, and build your Burgundian estate to prosperity and prominence.

In Great Western Trail, you'll step into the boots of a 19th-century rancher navigating the wilds of America. Your goal is to guide your cattle from Texas to Kansas City efficiently. This journey isn't just about speed; you'll need to smartly utilize buildings along the trail and hire talented staff to improve your herd and infrastructure. Strategize your moves to earn the most money and victory points. Success depends on your ability to balance resources and adapt to changing conditions.
Use strategic outposts and navigate danger as you herd your cattle to Kansas City.
Eclipse: Second Dawn for the Galaxy <small>(2020)</small>

In Eclipse: Second Dawn for the Galaxy, you control an interstellar civilization seeking to surpass rivals in the galaxy. You'll explore star systems, research advanced technologies, and assemble powerful fleets for potential conflicts. With multiple victory paths, you'll craft your strategy based on your species' strengths, adapting to opposing civilizations. The game stands out with its dynamic system, modular board, and a refined balance of diplomacy and warfare.
Build an interstellar civilization by exploration, research, conquest, and diplomacy.

In Scythe, you enter a dieselpunk 1920s Europe, where five factions vie for control of new lands around the enigmatic Factory. You will build your unique engine, managing resources like power and popularity, while enlisting recruits and deploying mighty mechs. The game’s engaging mechanics let you develop your faction’s abilities and expand your territory without player elimination. With strategic choices dictating combat outcomes, this game rewards careful planning and adaptation.
Five factions vie for dominance in a war-torn, mech-filled, dieselpunk 1920s Europe.

In 7 Wonders Duel, you engage in a battle of wits as you and your opponent build rival civilizations. Played over three ages, you strategically draft cards from a pyramid structure, managing resources to construct prestigious wonders. Timing is key, as accessible cards change dynamically. You may win through military conquest, scientific dominance, or by amassing the most points. Unique mechanics and intense face-offs make this two-player game a thrilling adaptation of its parent game.
Science? Military? What will you draft to win this head-to-head version of 7 Wonders?

In Brass: Lancashire, you will step into the shoes of a cotton entrepreneur during the Industrial Revolution. Your goal is to build and expand your network through the canal and rail phases in Lancashire. Strategically manage your resources and cards to build industries, connect towns, and fulfill the demand for iron, coal, and cotton. The game is won by scoring the most victory points through careful planning and execution across two distinct phases. Can you master the economic challenges and emerge as the most successful industrialist?
Test your economic mettle as you build and network in the Industrial Revolution.

In Frosthaven, you will lead a band of mercenaries to safeguard and rebuild a dilapidated northern outpost. Engage in an epic campaign with over 100 scenarios, battling enemies like Algox and Lurkers in a frozen wilderness. With new characters and items, this game challenges you to manage your resources wisely, craft weapons, and expand your settlement. Enjoy cooperative gameplay, solve mysteries, and explore unknown territories, all while dealing with evolving narratives that test your strategies.
Adventure in the frozen north and build up your outpost throughout an epic campaign.

In Nemesis, you face the ultimate sci-fi survival horror as you navigate a spaceship overrun with aliens. You take on the role of a crew member, each with unique skills and personal objectives. To survive, you must balance cooperation and betrayal, contend with evolving threats, and complete one of your secret goals before safely reaching Earth. Every decision counts, as the ship's condition and your companions' hidden agendas constantly change the stakes. Challenge your wits against the unknown.
Survive an alien-infested spaceship, but beware of other players and their agendas!

In Clank! Legacy: Acquisitions Incorporated, you embark on a thrilling adventure where deck-building meets legacy gameplay. Establish your own franchise within the famous adventuring company, Acquisitions Incorporated. Over several sessions, your board, deck, and world evolve, creating a unique experience for your group. Navigate quests, face challenges, and make impactful choices. Your cunning and boldness could lead your team to become legendary treasure-hunters.
"Go forth, be bold, and ACQUIRE!" in this campaign version of "Clank!"

In A Feast for Odin, you will immerse yourself in the life of Vikings, balancing exploration, raiding, farming, and crafting. Through strategic worker placement, you'll gather resources and expand your village, aiming to increase your wealth and secure your place in history. With numerous paths to victory and a unique puzzle mechanic involving tiles, each game session offers a fresh challenge as you decide how best to thrive in the harsh Scandinavian world. Engage in this epic strategy to lead your clan to glory.
Puzzle together the life of a Viking village as you hunt, farm, craft, and explore.

In Concordia, you'll guide a Roman dynasty aiming to build a vast trade empire around the Mediterranean. With no dice or cards dictating your fate, it's your strategic abilities that will help you expand. Send colonists to develop cities, produce essential goods, and appease the gods for victory points. Keep a close eye on your opponents while expanding your trade network and choosing actions wisely from your hand of cards, each critical for gaining victory points and emerging triumphant.
Traders compete to build the greatest empire in the Roman Mediterranean.

In Great Western Trail: Second Edition, you take on the role of a rancher herding cattle from Texas to Kansas City, aiming for the most valuable cows to earn money and victory points. Navigate the trail by strategically using the buildings along your path and employing the right staff: cowboys to enhance your herd, craftsmen to build infrastructure, or engineers to boost the railroad. The game offers rich strategic opportunities with its solo mode and stunning new artwork. Compete wisely to emerge victorious!
Wrangle your herd of cows across the Midwest prairie and deliver it to Kansas City.

In Lost Ruins of Arnak, you will embark on an exciting expedition to discover the secrets of a mysterious island. Your adventure combines deck-building and worker placement mechanics as you explore the terrain, gather resources, and uncover ancient artifacts. Each turn, you'll make crucial decisions to outsmart fellow explorers and face the island's formidable guardians. With countless strategies and unique setups, every game is a fresh journey into the unknown.
Explore an island to find resources and discover the lost ruins of Arnak.

In Arkham Horror: The Card Game, you will immerse yourself in a world of mystery and terror. As investigators in the eerie town of Arkham, work alone or with up to three friends to uncover dark secrets. Build your custom deck reflecting your unique strengths and weaknesses, and navigate haunted locations, encountering cultists and sinister creatures. Your choices affect ongoing campaigns, providing a rich blend of card play and role-playing in a Lovecraftian universe.
Investigate the horrors of Arkham while courting cosmic doom.

In Root, you will dive into a thrilling conflict for control over a vast wilderness. Play as one of the asymmetrical factions, each with unique abilities and victory conditions. Will you lead the Marquise de Cat, striving to exploit the forest, bolster the Alliance's resistance, guide the noble Eyrie, or roam as a Vagabond? Utilize multi-use cards and strategic decisions in this dynamic, interactive game that promises diverse outcomes. Adapt your strategies, negotiate, and wage war in this immersive experience.
Decide the fate of the forest as woodland factions fight for contrasting goals.

In "Too Many Bones," you will embark on a strategic adventure through the northern territories as a member of a new fantasy race. This unique dice-builder RPG challenges everything you know about dice games. Team up or play solo in cooperative campaigns, facing tactical battles using over 100 skill dice and choosing from various classes. Every encounter is a puzzle. With decisions around resting, exploring, and fighting, the path to the final boss is full of intrigue and strategy.
Toss gobs of unique dice in an epic adventure en route to a final boss showdown.

In Terra Mystica, you take on the role of one of 14 unique factions, each tied to a distinct homeland. Your goal is to expand your territory by terraforming neighboring lands to suit your faction's environment. Develop your skills and harness special abilities to dominate the mystical landscape. The game is a strategic brain workout with no luck, relying solely on your planning skills. Engage with cults, upgrade buildings, and navigate tricky terrain interactions to lead your faction to victory.
Play fantastical factions.  Expand your influence by terraforming and joining cults.

In Wingspan, you become a bird enthusiast trying to build the best wildlife preserve with a diverse collection of birds. Each turn, gather food, lay eggs, and attract new birds to your sanctuary. With each bird card you play, you unlock new strategies and powerful effects as they populate your habitats. The game offers rich tactical depth, with over 170 beautifully illustrated bird cards, challenging you to balance resource gathering with strategic planning for the highest score after four rounds.
Attract a beautiful and diverse collection of birds to your wildlife preserve.

In Orléans, you navigate medieval France, recruiting followers and harnessing their skills to achieve dominance in trade, construction, and science. Through bag-building, acquire farmers, knights, and monks, each providing unique advantages. Strategically decide actions and balance resources to outmaneuver rivals. Every turn offers decisions that could lead to supremacy, using your followers effectively on the board. Will you find the best path to victory in the vibrant world of Orléans?
Craftsmen, scholars & monks can help you reign supreme—but who will turn up to help?

In Sky Team, you and a partner take on the roles of pilot and co-pilot to land airplanes in various airports worldwide. This cooperative game challenges you to silently coordinate and assign dice to balance your aircraft's axes, control speed, deploy flaps, and communicate with the control tower, all without losing focus under pressure. Each airport offers unique trials, and working in tandem is crucial to avoiding any mishaps and ensuring a safe landing.
Pilot and co-pilot work together to land planes.

In Mage Knight Board Game, you take on the role of a powerful Mage Knight exploring and conquering lands under the Atlantean Empire's control. Build your army, enhance your deck with spells, and explore dungeons to claim mighty cities. The game merges RPG elements, deck-building, and traditional board game mechanics, offering competitive, cooperative, and solo play. Its rich universe promises a deeply strategic experience where only one can emerge victorious.
Build your hero’s spells, abilities, and artifacts as you explore & conquer cities.

In Barrage, you will compete to dominate hydroelectric power in a dystopian world where water is a scarce resource. Plan your strategy to build and expand dams in an Alpine region, channeling water through tunnels to generate energy. The unique Construction Wheel mechanic requires careful resource management as you balance short-term needs with long-term goals. Outmaneuver your opponents by strategically placing your dams and managing the shared water flow, aiming to fulfill contracts and climb the power track to victory.
Nations vie for hydroelectric dominance in a dystopia where water is power.

In The Crew: Mission Deep Sea, you embark on an underwater journey to uncover the mysteries of the lost continent of Mu. This co-operative trick-taking game challenges you and your teammates to navigate the deep sea by winning tricks and making crucial decisions together. Communication is limited due to the depths, making teamwork essential as you explore this thrilling abyss filled with surprises. Can you coordinate well enough to lead your team to success and discover the secrets of Mu?
Dive into the deep sea in this co-operative trick-taking game.

In Everdell, you step into the lush woodland realm to build a thriving village of critters and structures under the watchful eyes of towering trees. Engage in dynamic tableau building and strategic worker placement as you gather resources like twigs, resin, pebbles, and berries to construct buildings and meet vibrant characters. Choose actions wisely each season to outpace rivals in developing the most successful city before winter arrives. The game's intricate card interactions yield countless strategies, keeping each game fresh and engaging.
Gather resources to develop a harmonious village of woodland critters and structures.

In Viticulture Essential Edition, you find yourself managing a small vineyard in the beautiful region of Tuscany. As an aspiring winemaker, you allocate your workers across the seasons, deciding which tasks to prioritize to develop your vineyard. Strategize in each season, plant vines, build structures, and create wines to fulfill orders. Use visitor cards for unique bonuses that can give you an edge over other players. Build the most successful winery and achieve your winemaking dreams.
Create the most prosperous winery in Italy from the Tuscan vineyard you've inherited.
Der Herr der Ringe: Duell um Mittelerde <small>(2024)</small>

In "Der Herr der Ringe: Duell um Mittelerde," you will choose between the Fellowship or Sauron to determine the fate of Middle-earth. Take turns gathering cards and resources, building your presence, and rallying races to your cause. Each chapter presents strategic choices that will affect your path to victory, whether it's destroying the One Ring, capturing it, or dominating the land. Unique victory conditions allow for varied playstyles, making each game a unique challenge.
Play as the Fellowship or Sauron and attempt to determine the fate of Middle-earth.

In Heat: Pedal to the Metal, you jump into the thrilling world of competitive car racing. Manage your hand of cards wisely to maintain the optimal speed, ensuring you don't overheat while navigating tight curves and overtaking opponents. Customize your car with upgrades and tackle various weather and road conditions in single races or entire championships. Experience the rush solo with the Legends Module, or bring extra competition with automated drivers. Your strategy and skill determine the victor!
Manage your race car's speed to keep from overheating.

In Marvel Champions: The Card Game, you will step into the shoes of iconic Marvel heroes like Iron Man and Spider-Man to thwart villainous plans. This cooperative Living Card Game allows 1-4 players to face off against notorious villains with unique abilities and strategies. Through deck construction and hand management, customize your hero’s deck to fit your play style. Regular new releases keep the game fresh with additional heroes and scenarios, offering endless replayability in the Marvel Universe.
Battle Marvel villains with unique teams of iconic heroes in this LCG.

Crokinole is a classic Canadian dexterity game played on a wooden board with rings and a bullseye. You'll flick disks using your fingers, aiming to land them in high-scoring rings. The central hole scores the most points. The challenge comes from navigating the ring of posts, which act as obstacles. Play is both strategic and skillful, requiring you to hit opponent's disks when present. Great for two or four players, it's a simple yet engaging game with various play styles.
Flick discs and make trick shots in this traditional Canadian dexterity game!

In Kanban EV, you step into the shoes of a rookie employee in an electric vehicle factory. As you navigate the intricacies of production, your goal is to optimize resources, manage supplies, and impress the factory manager, Sandra. The game challenges you to balance time and resources, while using the kanban system to streamline assembly processes. Compete with others to earn production points and rise through the ranks by orchestrating a flawless workflow and achieving factory goals.
EV-factory workers optimize and innovate to stand out at the big board meeting.

In Food Chain Magnate, you will take charge of a burgeoning fast-food empire, hiring and training staff to outmaneuver your competitors. Strategize your marketing campaigns on a modular city map to tempt neighborhoods with your gourmet offerings while optimizing your operations and resources. The game focuses on intricate card-driven management, making every decision critical to success. With its tough competition for market share and high-stakes decisions, this game challenges your business acumen.
Strategically hire and manage your workforce to outcompete rival fast food chains.
Hegemony: Lead Your Class to Victory <small>(2023)</small>

In Hegemony: Lead Your Class to Victory, you will step into the turbulent world of a fictional nation where classes clash. You can choose to play as one of four socio-economic groups: the Working Class, the Middle Class, the Capitalist Class, or the State. Each group has unique abilities and goals, navigating a game of strategy, politics, and negotiation. Use your influence to vote on policies that affect the game. Will you reform the system, hold onto profits, or balance the state budget?
Simulate a whole contemporary nation in this asymmetric, politico-economic euro-game.

In Pax Pamir: Second Edition, you take on the role of Afghan leaders in the 19th century, navigating the tumultuous political landscape after the Durrani Empire's fall. As you build your tableau of cards, you influence the region by placing units and forming coalitions. The game challenges you to leverage alliances while occasionally disrupting opponents. Victory depends on the shifting dominance of factions or your personal power as players evaluate coalitions at key moments.
Swing the tides of "The Great Game" as countries vie for control of Afghanistan.

In Underwater Cities, you become one of the world's most brilliant minds tasked with building vibrant underwater metropolises to combat Earth's overpopulation. At its core, the game involves placing cards strategically. Match card colors with board slots to unlock powerful actions and benefits. Expand your network by constructing tunnels, domes, and production buildings. With nearly 220 unique cards, each game offers new challenges and strategies for achieving victory.
Develop future cities on the seafloor through politics, production, and science.

In Slay the Spire: The Board Game, you will embark on a cooperative deck-building adventure to conquer the mysterious Spire. You'll craft a unique deck as you face bizarre creatures and uncover relics of immense power. The game features a rich selection of cards, minis, and boards, providing endless strategic possibilities. Join forces with friends or take on the challenge solo to become strong enough to slay the Spire and emerge victorious.
Craft a unique deck, discover powerful relics, and Slay the Spire together!

In Puerto Rico, you step into the shoes of a colonial governor striving for prosperity on the island. Your goal is to accumulate victory points through shipping goods and constructing buildings. You'll manage a personal board to cultivate crops, alongside shared resources like ships and a trading house. Strategic role selection each round offers diverse opportunities, granting you actions and benefits. The game’s unique phase order system and hidden victory points keep tension high as you weigh each decision carefully.
Ship goods, construct buildings, and choose roles that benefit you more than others.

In Cascadia, you will embark on a serene journey to build the most harmonious ecosystem in the Pacific Northwest. Piece together beautiful hexagonal habitat tiles and populate them with diverse wildlife. Strategically place wildlife to meet random goals, which change each game, creating a unique puzzle every time. With open drafting and pattern building, maximize habitats and wildlife corridors to outscore your opponents. Will your ecosystem be the most flourishing of them all?
Create the most harmonious ecosystem as you puzzle together habitats and wildlife.

In Cthulhu: Death May Die, you step into the shoes of 1920s investigators daring to summon and confront the Elder Gods. This cooperative game, inspired by H.P. Lovecraft, challenges you to balance your sanity while navigating scenarios where madness could become your ally. The game features thrilling dice rolls, strategic actions, and a variety of standalone episodes, ensuring each playthrough is unique. With your friends, prepare to face cosmic horrors and test your mettle in a thrilling adventure.
Disrupt the ritual and slay the Elder Gods in this co-op dice chucker.

In Pandemic Legacy: Season 0, you are thrust into the espionage of the Cold War in 1962 to stop a Soviet bio-threat named "Project MEDUSA". As CIA recruits, you will travel globally using aliases, neutralize enemy agents, and setup operations. Experience evolving gameplay in this cooperative legacy game as every action influences future missions. Work together, adapt strategically, and face the challenges posed by enemy agents. Your cooperation is vital to prevent global disaster.
Work together during the Cold War to prevent a Soviet bio-threat.

In Caverna: The Cave Farmers, you lead a family of dwarves living in a mountain cave. You'll expand your home by mining resources and cultivating fields. Each turn, assign your family members to various tasks, such as farming, building, and exploring. Grow crops, raise animals, and discover hidden treasures as you develop your own unique strategy. Unlike its predecessor, Agricola, Caverna offers more freedom with its expansive tile placement and a variety of paths to victory.
From a simple cave, expand your dwarven home through mining, agriculture, and more.

In Anachrony, you explore a post-apocalyptic Earth in the 26th century, divided by four ideologies: Harmony, Dominance, Progress, and Salvation. As a leader, you harness the power of Time Rifts to gather resources and prevent an impending asteroid catastrophe. The game features a unique two-tiered worker placement system, requiring specialists and Exosuits for missions. With variable objectives and time travel mechanics, race against time to shape the future and become the dominant force on Earth.
Use Exosuits & time travel to ensure your vision for the future after the cataclysm.

In "On Mars", you play as a chief astronaut tasked with developing the most advanced Martian colony. Initially reliant on Earth, you must strategically travel between the Mars Space Station and the planet's surface, building essential infrastructure like mines, power generators, and greenhouses. As the colony grows, manage resources crucial for survival and complete missions to win. Compete with others using tech advancements to create a self-sustaining settlement and become the best Martian contributor.
Be a part of the first Martian colony, striving to be the best contributor.

In Blood Rage, you take control of a Viking clan on a heroic quest as the world ends with Ragnarök. Strategize your path to glory by invading lands, pillaging for rewards, and battling rivals. Choose your clan's destiny wisely through card drafting, which represents the blessings of the gods, offering special powers and quests. Engage in epic clashes with hidden card play, where sometimes losing a battle might actually lead to a greater victory. Only the most glorious will bask in the eternal glory of Valhalla.
Ragnarök has come! Secure your place in Valhalla in epic Viking battles.

In Agricola, you step into the role of a farmer, balancing the growth of your humble homestead. Starting with just you and your spouse, you'll manage resources to plow fields, gather materials, and build fences. Each round introduces new actions, expanding your strategic choices. As your family grows, so does your workload, requiring you to carefully plan for food and shelter. With numerous strategies and complexities, Agricola challenges you to adapt to both opportunities and opponents.
Build your farmstead by sowing fields and raising livestock. But don't forget to eat!
SETI: Auf der Suche nach außerirdischem Leben <small>(2024)</small>

In SETI: Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence, you lead a scientific institution in the quest for alien life. You'll launch probes to explore planets and moons, gathering data. Decide between landing for samples or orbiting for surveys. Use telescopes to scan distant systems for alien signals. Upgrade your equipment, boost telescope capabilities, and manage resources wisely. Over 200 unique cards enhance your research with real-life technologies. Discovering alien life is in your hands.
Search for signs of alien life by launching probes and analyzing distant signals.

In Oathsworn: Into the Deepwood, you embark on epic adventures as part of a Free company fighting to protect humanity from terrifying creatures and the mysterious Deepwood. This game combines storytelling and tactical combat, featuring an ever-evolving narrative driven by player choices. Experience tense boss battles where innovative mechanics like the 'Battleflow' cooldown system and a unique dice system keep you on edge. Discover new allies, gather loot, and shape your legacy in this gripping campaign.
Fight for humanity's survival against unnatural horrors and the Deepwood itself.

As Captain Sofi Odessa, you and your friends are lost in the strange realm of the Wandering Sea aboard the steamship Manticore. Explore exotic islands, meet intriguing characters, and gather the totems of the gods to find your way home. Each game session is part of an ongoing campaign, allowing you to save and resume your journey easily. With each page of the game atlas, unlock new adventures and make choices that shape the story. This cooperative game is perfect for solo or group play.
Voyages of the steamship "Manticore" and her crew on the Wandering Sea.

In Age of Innovation, you take control of one of twelve distinct factions in the Terra Mystica universe, aiming to terraform the world to suit your faction's needs. Compete by constructing buildings and forming flourishing cities. You'll strategically upgrade structures for resources, like tools and scholars, to fuel your growth and create lasting innovations. With variable set-ups, each game unfolds differently, offering unique challenges and opportunities for strategic depth.
Terraform the world to expand your faction and create innovations on the way.

In Lisboa, you will take on the role of a noble in the wake of the devastating earthquake of 1755. Tasked with reconstructing the city, you will use your influence to open businesses, build new structures, and manage the royal treasury. The game combines tile placement, hand management, and area influence, set on a real map of Lisbon. Each decision affects the city’s commerce, earning you the wigs necessary for victory. Strategic planning is key as you navigate the challenges of rebuilding and commerce.
Compete to reconstruct the city of Lisboa after the great earthquake of 1755.

In Obsession, you find yourself at the helm of a struggling family estate in Victorian England. With prospects looking brighter, you aim to revitalize your estate by acquiring opulent building tiles, assembling a skilled service staff, and hosting lavish events. Employ strategic planning with worker placement mechanics to enhance your reputation and forge connections among high society. Strive to meet personal goals and win the favor of Derbyshire's elite, ultimately pursuing a romance that could change your fortune.
Renovate an estate, manage servants, and pursue romance in Victorian England.

In Pandemic Legacy: Season 2, you will embark on a journey into a world struggling to survive after a devastating plague. Living on floating stations called havens, you and your team will venture out to reconnect with isolated cities and ensure their survival. This cooperative game challenges you with evolving missions where your decisions impact future games, creating a unique experience each time. With a blend of exploration and strategy, discover what remains and fight for humanity's future.
The world is a mystery after a devastating pandemic—where will your team go?

In Grand Austria Hotel, you will manage a quaint café in Vienna, striving to transform it into a luxurious hotel. As the bustling city attracts VIPs and travelers, you must fulfill guests' desires, hire skilled staff, and prepare elegant rooms. The game involves strategic dice rolling and action drafting, offering diverse choices and demanding tactical decisions. With 116 different cards and a variety of setups, each playthrough presents new challenges and opportunities, making it highly replayable.
Serve guests and prepare rooms to be the best hotelier in the Viennese modern age.

In Mansions of Madness: Second Edition, you will explore the dark and mysterious world of Arkham, investigating eerie mansions. This app-driven, cooperative game lets you and up to four friends take on the roles of brave investigators. Solve challenging puzzles, gather helpful tools and weapons, and confront terrifying monsters and insanity. The app guides your journey, adding suspense as you uncover secrets and fight for survival. Each play is a unique adventure full of chilling surprises.
Unravel mysteries in Arkham with your investigative team in this app-guided game.

In Tzolk'in: The Mayan Calendar, you immerse yourself in the world of the ancient Maya. You represent one of their tribes, placing workers on giant rotating gears. As these gears spin, your workers move to new action spaces, allowing you to gather resources, build monuments, and progress in temples. Strategic planning is essential, as actions become more valuable over time. Balancing corn management with clever worker placement is key to earning the gods' favor and achieving victory.
Lead your people, build monuments and make offerings to earn the favour of the gods.

In Power Grid, you will take on the role of an energy supplier, competing to power the most cities. You must strategically bid on power plants, build a network of connections, and manage your resources wisely. As you purchase plants, new, more efficient options become available, requiring careful planning. The fluctuating market for resources and the dynamic auction system create tense moments as you strive to expand your network and outmaneuver your competitors in this engaging economic strategy game.
Bid, network, and manage resources in a race to supply the most cities with power.

In The Quacks of Quedlinburg, you become a quirky quack doctor concocting secret brews. Drawing ingredient chips from your bag, you'll add them to your bubbling pot, hoping not to spoil the mixture. The further you can push your luck without blowing up your pot, the more valuable your potion can become. Each round, you earn points and coins to improve your ingredient collection, but too many cherry bombs can lead to a tricky choice. Craft the best potions over nine rounds to win.
Pull ingredients from your stock to make your pot bubble, but hopefully not explode!

In Clank!: Catacombs, you will delve into the mysterious catacombs of the skeletal dragon Umbrok Vessna. This standalone adventure combines deck-building with tile-laying, creating a unique dungeon each time you play. Explore treacherous depths, free prisoners, and gather treasures while avoiding the dragon's wrath. Craft your deck wisely and navigate portals and ghosts in your quest for riches. With varying setups and strategies, each game promises a new challenge.
Deck-building adventure meets tile-laying in the newest incarnation of Clank!

In Clans of Caledonia, you will lead a historic Scottish clan to prosperity in the 19th century. Your goal is to produce, trade, and export valuable goods like sheep, cotton, and, of course, whisky. You’ll take turns performing various actions such as building structures, upgrading them, or engaging in trade. With a modular board, customizable with 16 configurations, and unique clans each with special abilities, you'll strategically expand your influence, adapt to market changes, and maximize your exports.
Lead your unique Scottish clan to economic might via production, trade, and export.

In Le Havre, you become a master of strategy as you manage a port town's resources. Each turn, you must choose between collecting all goods of one type or using buildings to upgrade or trade resources, construct structures, and build ships. Decision-making and foresight are key as you invest in properties to earn revenues and ensure your workers are fed. Time rounds out your strategy with a harvest and workforce feeding. After multiple rounds, the wealthiest port manager wins.
Establish a supply chain by collecting resources, building industries, and shipping.

In Paladins of the West Kingdom, you take on the role of noble leaders in 900 AD West Francia. Your mission is to defend against oncoming invaders like Vikings and Saracens while enhancing your city's defenses and spreading faith. Gather workers, build fortifications, and use the strengths of different Paladins to gain victory points. The strategic focus on worker placement and resource management makes each turn critical as you aim to balance faith, strength, and influence across seven rounds.
Invaders are coming from everywhere.  Keep the faith and defend your homeland.

In Maracaibo, you embark on an adventure in the 17th century Caribbean, striving for wealth and fame. You'll navigate your ship around the islands, forming strategic alliances with three powerful nations. As you interact with city tiles, you'll complete quests and deliver goods, while managing your resources with multi-use cards. The narrative quest mode adds depth to the game, offering a unique story to uncover. Dive into this richly strategic game and balance diplomacy, trade, and adventure.
Seafarers journey to obtain wealth and fame in the 17th century Caribbean.

In "The Gallerist", you become a savvy gallery owner in the competitive world of art and commerce. You manage the careers of artists, buy and sell artwork, and attract visitors to your gallery. You'll need to strategically invest in emerging artists and carefully curate your exhibitions to enhance their value. Utilize your assistants to maximize your gallery's efficiency and secure your reputation as a renowned Gallerist. Your goal is to amass wealth and prestige, ensuring your gallery's place on the international stage.
Amass a fortune, and stake your reputation by operating a lucrative art gallery.

In Star Wars: Imperial Assault, you dive into gripping battles and missions set in the Star Wars universe. Command either the massive forces of the Galactic Empire or join the elite squad of the Rebel Alliance after the dramatic events of the original trilogy. You will engage in tactical combat through a campaign or face off in skirmish missions. Customize your forces with iconic characters like Luke Skywalker and Darth Vader, and evolve your strategy. Explore galactic conflicts where the outcome depends on your decisions.
Play as Rebel or Imperial forces to fulfill mission objectives.

In Android: Netrunner, step into a cyberpunk world where you become either a megacorporation or a lone runner. As the corporation, your goal is to secure data and advance agendas using powerful security programs known as "ice." As the runner, you must break through these defenses with clever tactics and powerful software. This two-player card game is a strategic and tense face-off, full of surprises and risks, offering each side a unique set of challenges and rewards.
Megacorporation versus Netrunner in this futuristic cyberpunk game of cat and mouse.

In Mechs vs. Minions, you take on the roles of clever Yordles piloting powerful mechs to fend off an invading horde of minions. Set in the vivid world of Runeterra, this cooperative game invites 2-4 players to engage in a unique campaign of ten missions, each demanding teamwork and strategy. You’ll program moves and execute plans on modular boards, making each session an exciting challenge. Hone your skills in programming and piloting to conquer the mysterious enemies together.
Cooperatively program and pilot your mechs to defeat an army of marauding minions.

In Agricola (Revised Edition), you step into the shoes of a 17th-century farmer, striving to build a thriving homestead. You'll balance planting crops, raising animals, and expanding your family as you work to manage limited resources. With improved components and revised rules, the game offers fresh challenges and strategies for up to four players. As your family grows, you'll face the constant challenge of feeding them, requiring careful planning and resource management.
Help your farm to prosper in this updated, streamlined edition of the acclaimed game.
Die Crew: Reist gemeinsam zum 9. Planeten <small>(2019)</small>

In The Crew: The Quest for Planet Nine, you join a team of astronauts on a thrilling mission to uncover the mysteries of a new planet. This cooperative card game combines trick-taking with strategic planning, where communication is key. You’ll face 50 challenges, demanding precise teamwork to achieve individual goals within each mission. The difficulty increases as you progress, offering an engaging experience each time you play. Success depends on making the right moves at the right moments.
Go on a planet-discovering space mission in this cooperative trick-taking game.

In Harmonies, you will craft beautiful landscapes by placing colored tokens and designing habitats for your animals. As you carefully choose and place each tile, you'll aim to create environments that attract a variety of creatures. With strategic planning, incorporate these habitats efficiently to maximize your score and possibly secure victory. This relaxing yet engaging family game combines open drafting and pattern building to offer a serene experience grounded in nature.
Create your own landscape and habitats to welcome animals.

In Kingdom Death: Monster, you'll venture into a dark, haunting world where survival is paramount. This cooperative board game challenges you to guide a struggling settlement through cycles of hunting, intense monster battles, and strategic growth. Craft weapons and gear, manage resources wisely, and face evolving threats in a campaign that spans generations. With unique monsters and dynamic events, each playthrough is a fresh narrative journey, blending rich storytelling with strategic gameplay.
Try to survive in a nightmarish world that lies under eternal darkness.

In Race for the Galaxy, you will create a thriving galactic empire by cleverly managing your hand of cards. Each card represents a planet to colonize or a technology to develop. Simultaneously, players choose actions, which determine the phases each round. Only selected phases happen, letting you produce, consume, or explore. Balance your strategy between settling worlds and advancing technologies to outperform your opponents. The game ends when you reach a set number of developments or deplete victory points.
Worlds await! Colonize, develop and conquer taking advantage of others' choices.

In Azul, you will step into the shoes of a skilled artist tasked with creating stunning mosaics for the Portuguese king's palace. Carefully draft colorful tiles from the suppliers, strategizing each move to form beautiful patterns on your board. Points are awarded for completing rows, columns, and sets while avoiding waste. Azul captivates with its blend of simple rules and deep strategy, offering a refreshing challenge that invites players to express their creativity in tile-laying artistry.
Artfully embellish the walls of your palace by drafting the most beautiful tiles.

In The White Castle, you'll lead a clan through the majestic halls and gardens of Japan's Himeji Castle. As you navigate a world of power, you'll use dice and strategic planning to place workers in key roles, whether tending the serene gardens or safeguarding the castle walls. Your aim is to gather influence and rise through the court's hierarchy by effectively managing resources and timing your moves. Unravel the strategic depth and enjoy a richly thematic experience.
Become the most influential clan in Japan's Himeji stronghold.
Ticket to Ride Legacy: Legends of the West <small>(2023)</small>

In Ticket to Ride Legacy: Legends of the West, you will journey across North America as 19th-century pioneers in a twelve-game campaign. Start on the East Coast and work your way westward, completing tickets and adapting to unexpected events. This legacy game evolves as you play, with each choice leading to new rules and surprises. You’ll unlock frontier boxes, personalize your experience, and ultimately create a unique game to enjoy beyond the campaign, making each session fresh and exciting.
Build train lines across the United States in a twelve-game campaign.
Five Tribes: The Djinns of Naqala <small>(2014)</small>

In Five Tribes: The Djinns of Naqala, you navigate the land of Naqala by strategically moving tribes of Assassins, Elders, Builders, Merchants, and Viziers. The goal is to gain influence over this legendary sultanate by cleverly arranging tribes, summoning ancient Djinns, and controlling key locations like oases and markets. While the rules are simple, the challenge lies in mastering the strategy. Your choices determine victory, making it a unique twist on traditional worker placement games.
Move assassins, elders & builders through Naqala to claim oases & control djinns.

In Clank!, you explore a dragon’s lair in this thrilling mix of deck-building and push-your-luck mechanics. Sneak past dangers to steal artifacts, collecting resources like skill, swords, and boots as you go. While customizing your deck, you’ll face the constant threat of making too much noise, attracting the dragon’s attention. The goal is to escape with valuable loot and earn the title of Greatest Thief in the Realm. But beware—the deeper you delve, the more dangerous it becomes!
Claim your treasures but don't attract the dragon in this deck-building dungeon race.
Eclipse: New Dawn for the Galaxy <small>(2011)</small>

In Eclipse: New Dawn for the Galaxy, you command an interstellar civilization vying for dominance. Explore star systems, develop technologies, and assemble powerful spaceships to outmaneuver your opponents. The galaxy is a dynamic backdrop for your strategic ambitions, with varying routes to victory shaped by your species' unique features. As alliances form and falter, steer your civilization through both diplomatic and military challenges to secure your place in the cosmic hierarchy.
Build an interstellar civilization by exploration, research, conquest, and diplomacy.

In Fields of Arle, you step into the role of a farmer in the serene East Frisian village of Arle. You'll balance the intricacies of constructing dikes, draining bogs, and managing livestock across diverse seasons. Engage in strategic decisions, from harvesting flax to expanding your fleet of vehicles, all to boost your wealth and influence. The changing seasons offer unique challenges and opportunities, demanding careful planning to ensure your farm thrives. Embrace the pacing of rural life and enjoy the journey.
Construct dikes, drain bogs, harvest flax and tend to newborn animals in East Frisia.

In Revive, you will guide your tribe to rebuild civilization 5000 years after a devastating collapse. Explore the frozen landscape, gather resources, and bring surface survivors to your cause. Each game offers a unique challenge with asymmetric powers and variable setups. Unlock forgotten technologies by populating ancient sites and completing the 5-part campaign for endless replayability. Balance exploration, card play, and factory building to optimize your strategy and gain victory points.
Revive civilization, 5000 years after the fall of humankind.

In "Darwin's Journey," you embark on an epic exploration of the Galapagos Islands, vividly retracing Charles Darwin's adventures. As you delve into the islands' vast biodiversity, you'll gather specimens, study natural sciences, and make significant discoveries. This worker-placement game features a unique worker progression system, requiring you to learn different disciplines to take various actions. Your strategic choices across five rounds will earn you victory points in numerous ways.
Retrace Darwin’s journey to the Galapagos in a worker-placement adventure.

In Aeon's End, you find yourself in Gravehold, humanity's last bastion against monstrous invaders. Utilizing a unique deck-building system, you will channel energy from dimensional breaches to cast spells and equip weapons. You'll face The Nameless and their terrible minions with tactical hand management and strategic collaboration. The game's variable turn order keeps you engaged in its chaotic, thrilling battles. Can you and your fellow breach mages save the remnants of society?
Mages defend humanity’s last city, harnessing alien powers to destroy monstrosities.

In Great Western Trail: New Zealand, you manage a sheep station on the South Island at the turn of the 20th century. Your goal is to diversify your breeds and enhance the quality of your wool to thrive in a changing economy. You will plan your routes, make strategic decisions, and adapt to new challenges to ensure your station's success. Through a mix of deck-building, hand management, and set collection, you can optimize your strategy and outmaneuver others on the trail to prosperity.
Tend to your sheep on the South Island of New Zealand.

In Lords of Waterdeep, you step into the shoes of one of the secret lords of the city, competing for influence over the City of Splendors. You will deploy agents to recruit adventurers, complete quests, and earn rewards. By strategically building new structures, you expand the city's opportunities and potentially influence other players' actions. Intrigue cards allow you to subtly, or not so subtly, manipulate events to your advantage. After eight rounds, the lord with the most points claims victory.
Deploy agents and hire adventurers to expand your control over the city of Waterdeep.

In El Grande, you step into the shoes of powerful lords in medieval Spain, vying for control over regions as the king's influence wanes. Using your caballeros, you aim to dominate provinces by strategically moving them from your court onto the board. The gameplay unfolds over nine rounds, with each third round bringing a scoring phase. Choose wisely from power and action cards to outmaneuver your opponents. Only areas adjacent to the king's region can be entered, adding a layer of strategic depth.
Use your caballeros to control regions of medieval Spain, keeping clear of the King!

In Wingspan Asia, you will explore the vibrant world of Asian birds, encountering unique species to enhance your wildlife preserve. This expansion offers a standalone experience for 1-2 players with a special "duet" mode, or a larger 6-7 player game with the "flock" mode when combined with Wingspan. Employ strategies involving dice rolling, hand management, and set collection as you adapt to new birds. Enter a realm of fascinating biodiversity where each bird adds a new dimension to your strategic planning.
Travel to Asia to discover new birds for your wildlife preserve.

In Teotihuacan: City of Gods, you travel back to an ancient city, leading a team of worker dice to construct the awe-inspiring Pyramid of the Sun. With each move, your workers gain strength, and you must choose actions wisely on a modular board. Manage resources, develop technologies, and climb temple steps, all while balancing your workforce's needs. Played over three eras, your strategic decisions determine your fame and success as the builder of this legendary city.
Use your worker dice to raise the legendary and breathtaking Pyramid of the Sun.

In SCOUT, you dive into the exciting world of circus performance as you manage a unique hand of cards with dual values. Without rearranging your hand, you must cleverly decide whether to use cards as is, or flip your entire hand to access new values. Challenge your opponents by playing stronger sets or poach a card from their impressive performance. Each strategy impacts the final score, keeping everyone on their toes. SCOUT combines hand management with inventive gameplay, providing an entertaining experience in every round.
Poach your opponents' artists and outdo each other's circus shows.

In Blood on the Clocktower, you find yourself in the mysterious village of Ravenswood Bluff, where a demon lurks among you. As townsfolk, you and your fellow players must trade information, make alliances, and use your unique abilities to uncover the demon hiding in plain sight. With a mix of social deduction, bluffing, and strategic play, each decision can mean the difference between victory and defeat. Even in death, your role isn't over, as you continue to influence the game from beyond the grave.
Deduce who the Demon is through logic and bluffing. Dead players still play.

In Beyond the Sun, you will guide the technological and economic progress of your faction at the dawn of space exploration. Collaborate to develop an evolving tech tree, while meticulously planning to outpace your rivals in economic prowess, scientific research, and space colonization. Through worker placement and strategic planning, advance your technology, expand your influence across planetary systems, and achieve victory by accumulating points through various milestones and achievements.
Collectively develop a tech tree to fuel the automation and colonization of space.

In Concordia Venus, you'll embark on a peaceful strategy journey set in the Roman Mediterranean, aiming to establish the greatest empire. You manage resources like bricks, food, and wine by placing colonists in cities, deciding your actions through card play. Each card has a dual purpose, providing actions and scoring victory points. Adapt your strategies with modular maps and new personality cards featuring the goddess Venus. Engage in team play for an added cooperative challenge, but beware—your rivals are watching!
Traders compete to build the greatest empire in the Roman Mediterranean.
Through the Ages: A Story of Civilization <small>(2006)</small>

In "Through the Ages: A Story of Civilization," you will guide your civilization from antiquity to the modern age through resource management, selecting leaders, and advancing technologies. Each decision impacts your growth and survival. Use clever card drafting to unlock new abilities and strengthen your society. But beware—strength in military is crucial, as opponents may seize opportunities to attack weaker civilizations. Victory goes to the nation with the highest culture.
Lead your civilization through strategic drafting of leaders, technologies, and more.

In Dominant Species, you are thrown into the prehistoric world, just before an ice age. Assume the role of a major animal class—mammal, reptile, bird, amphibian, arachnid, or insect—and battle for survival. By placing action pawns strategically, you will adapt, migrate, and evolve to dominate different terrains. The game's tension lies in outmaneuvering your opponents and claiming crucial advantages on the board. Your goal: become the dominant species before the ice age fully envelops the world.
With an ice age approaching, which animals will best propagate, migrate, and adapt?

In 7 Wonders, you become the leader of an ancient city, striving to develop your civilization over three ages. You'll draft cards to gather resources, build commercial routes, and assert military strength against your neighbors, all while constructing an iconic Wonder. The game is fast-paced, with simultaneous card selection, and requires keen strategy as you adapt to the cards passed by neighboring cities. Balance economic growth, military might, and architectural ambition to emerge victorious.
Draft cards to develop your ancient civilization and build its Wonder of the World.

In "The Search for Planet X," you become an astronomer on a quest to find a hidden planet in our solar system. Using a companion app, you will perform scans, attend conferences, and use logical deduction to uncover the planet's location. Each round, you'll gather information, mark findings on your deduction sheet, and publish theories to earn points. As more data becomes available, you narrow down possibilities until you pinpoint Planet X's location. Will you be the first to make this groundbreaking discovery?
Plan, scan, and theorize to find a new planet at the edge of our solar system.
Robinson Crusoe: Abenteuer auf der verfluchten Insel <small>(2012)</small>

In Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island, you find yourself stranded after a shipwreck. You must work together to build shelter, find food, and overcome the challenges of the wild. Assume roles like cook or carpenter and use your skills to survive. Each scenario offers unique adventures where you face changing weather, wild animals, and hidden secrets. Will you unearth a treasure, or uncover a forgotten temple? Team up to plan, debate, and explore the unknown in this cooperative adventure.
Work together — with friends or with Friday — to survive on a deserted island.

In The Voyages of Marco Polo, you embark on a journey inspired by the famous explorer's travels along the Silk Road. You will assume the role of a historical character, each with unique abilities, and utilize your dice to take various actions. Collect resources, fulfill contracts, and strategically place trading posts as you travel from Venice to Beijing. The higher the dice value, the better your options, but be prepared to pay if others have already chosen your path. Plan wisely over five rounds to maximize your victory points.
Using unique abilities, fulfill contracts and reach your goals along the Silk Road.

In Final Girl, you step into the shoes of a lone female protagonist in a thrilling solo board game experience. As you face a terrifying movie killer, your objective is to survive and eliminate your adversary. The game's unique feature is its modular design; by combining the Core Box with different Feature Film Boxes, each offering its own killer and location, you can tailor your horror experience. With dice rolling and character movement, every game presents new challenges.
You alone must survive and defeat the horror movie killer.

In Voidfall, you are a leader of a Great House in the sprawling galaxy of Domineum. Face cosmic corruption as you repel the Voidborn across three epic cycles with a blend of strategic depth and economic prowess. Customize and develop your empire using focus cards, manage resources, and engage in fully deterministic space battles. Play solo, cooperatively, or competitively, pushing back the Voidborn or surpassing your rivals in restoring the galaxy's glory, all on varied modular map setups.
Repel the Voidborn and restore Domineum in this space themed, heavy Euro.

In Decrypto, you join a team to decipher your opponents' codes while protecting your own. You give and interpret coded clues, trying to map them to hidden numbers. The opposing team attempts to crack your codes, adding suspense to each round. This game challenges your communication skills and abstract thinking, as you balance clarity for your teammates against deception for your opponents. Can you outwit the rival codebreakers before they succeed against you?
Decipher your opponents' code before they decipher yours. Don't get caught.

In Splendor Duel, you and your rival will compete as Renaissance merchants, seeking to outshine each other and win the favor of the nobility. Strategically collect Gem and Pearl tokens from a shared pool to purchase powerful cards, gain bonuses, and secure prestigious royal favors. This standalone game for two players takes the classic Splendor formula and adds depth, with new mechanics and heightened interaction. Challenge your opponent in a dynamic quest for supremacy with multiple victory paths.
Renaissance merchants go head to head to please nobility.

In Trickerion: Legends of Illusion, you step into the shoes of a rival magician in a Victorian steampunk world. Using your team of specialists, you'll gather resources, learn complex tricks, and perform in the grand Theater to earn Fame. The unique blend of worker placement and simultaneous action keeps you engaged, as you explore the city's vibrant locations and unlock supernatural powers. The intricate strategy and variety in tricks assure a unique experience each play.
Magicians perform dazzling tricks for money and fame in a Victorian steampunk world.

Inis invites you to immerse yourself in Celtic history and lore, competing to become the King of the Island. You have three paths to victory: lead territories, expand your presence, or hold religious influence. The game balances strategic card drafting and tactical decision-making. Assemble your clans, gather epic tales, and use cunning to outmaneuver rivals. It's not a simple battle game; rather, diplomacy and clever play are key to claiming the crown. Will you rise above with merit and wisdom?
Claim the crown through merit and wisdom in this Celtic island struggle.

In Battlestar Galactica: The Board Game, you find yourself aboard the last remaining fleet of humanity, on the run from the relentless Cylons. You and your fellow players must work together to manage dwindling resources, fend off attacks, and navigate political intrigue, all while suspecting that some among you are secretly Cylon agents. Choose your character wisely, use their unique skills, and hope to expose the betrayers before they sabotage your quest for survival and Earth's safety.
How can the human race survive when you don't know who is actually human?

In Carnegie, you step into the shoes of an ambitious entrepreneur, expanding your business during the rise of the American steel industry. Inspired by Andrew Carnegie, you'll recruit and manage workers, invest in real estate, and build transport networks. Make strategic decisions over 20 rounds to earn victory points and prestige. With a blend of resource management and network building, your goal is to become a renowned benefactor and entrepreneur of your time.
Become the most influential entrepreneur and benefactor of your era!

In Architects of the West Kingdom, you are a royal architect working to impress the king by constructing landmarks in his domain. You'll gather resources, hire apprentices, and carefully manage your workforce. Choose wisely between virtue and vice, as shady dealings could cost you in the end. The game offers a unique twist with moral decisions, and only by game’s end is your true nature revealed, adding intrigue to this medieval city-building challenge. Aim to earn the most victory points by building and restoring the cathedral.
Will you be a virtuous or nefarious servant of the king? Build your way to glory.

In The Quest for El Dorado, you take on the role of an expedition leader navigating through the dense jungles of South America. Your goal is to assemble a strong team by hiring experts like scouts and scientists. With strategic deck-building, you manage your resources wisely to outpace your rivals and reach the legendary city of gold first. The game features a dynamic board, allowing a different challenge each time you play, as you tailor your strategy through smart card management and board navigation.
Race through a dense South American jungle in pursuit of the legendary city of gold.

In Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon, you'll explore a dark Arthurian world, blending legends with Celtic mythology. Face challenges like starvation, sickness, and mysterious weather as you journey through a realm shrouded in Wyrdness. Develop your character along conflicting traits, unlocking skills and crafting strategies crucial for survival. The game features a unique diceless encounter system for combat and diplomacy, ensuring each decision shapes your story in this unforgettable adventure.
Exploration, battle and diplomacy in a dark Arthurian realm.

In Dwellings of Eldervale, you explore a mystical world where elemental creatures and ancient forces clash. As a leader of a unique faction, you will place workers to gather resources, engage in battles, and build powerful dwellings. The game features a blend of worker placement, area control, and engine building mechanics, with a modular board that changes every game. Strategize your moves, harness the elements, and vie for dominance to shape Eldervale in your image.
Battle for control of a new fantasy realm in this worker placement game.

In Arcs, you will guide your faction through a decaying empire in a dark yet comedic universe. As an official, you'll vie for dominance via battles, resource gathering, and diplomatic intrigue. The game's trick-taking style action selection system is crucial, as timing and card play dictate success. Quick battles unfold with choices of risk, necessitating strategic planning and resource management. With customizable play options, enjoy an epic space opera filled with unique art and compelling narratives.
Guide your faction through a space opera.

In Keyflower, you will build a thriving village across four seasons using a unique auction system. Start with a basic tile and workers in red, yellow, and blue. Bid on tiles to expand your village or activate them to gain resources and more workers. The ever-changing mix of village tiles makes each game fresh and challenging. Manage resources, upgrade abilities, and strategically decide when to bid or produce to maximize points. Collect the most points to win and outbuild your competitors.
Compete in a unique auction system to build the most prosperous village.

In Raiders of the North Sea, you step into the role of a Viking warrior seeking to impress your Chieftain. The game blends strategic worker placement with exciting raids on settlements, where you gather gold, iron, and livestock. Your journey begins in a village where you gather provisions and hire a valiant crew. Each turn, you'll place and retrieve workers to execute strategic actions. Raid harbors, outposts, and more to earn glory and victory points. Balance strength and strategy to become the most renowned of Vikings.
Gather your Viking crew in order to plunder seas and lands for glory!

In Tigris & Euphrates, you will guide your civilization in the ancient fertile crescent. Through clever tile placement, you'll deploy leaders in farming, trading, religion, and government, collecting victory points in these categories. But beware—your score is your weakest category, urging balanced growth. Engage in external and internal conflicts as civilizations intersect and vie for dominance. The game also offers a ziggurat expansion with advanced strategies, ensuring a dynamic and competitive experience.
Keep your Mesopotamian civilisation in perfect balance through revolutions and wars.

In Dominion: Intrigue, you must strategize to construct the most powerful deck and outmaneuver your opponents. You begin with a modest set of cards and acquire new ones throughout the game to increase your strength and versatility. The intrigue lies in the variety of strategies available and the modifications to your deck through cunning purchases and clever management of your hand. With new kingdom cards and captivating mechanics, this game offers dynamic challenges and intense player interaction.
Enlist torturers, swindlers, and saboteurs to gain wealth and dominate the kingdom.

In Caylus, you are a master builder in medieval France, tasked with constructing the king's castle and developing the surrounding city. You strategically place workers in various buildings, gather resources, and construct new buildings along a developing road. Influence the Provost marker to control building usage and pace the game's progress. Skillfully balance resource management and tactical decisions to earn prestige and royal favor, ultimately striving to be the most renowned builder.
Entrepreneurs pay workers & bribe an official to build a Château & gain royal favor.

In Ra, you immerse yourself in the world of Ancient Egypt as you bid to collect valuable sets of artifacts and resources. Using your sun tiles, you carefully choose when to bid on lots of tiles, hoping to expand your influence and fame. Strategic decision-making is key, as the auction can end suddenly, leaving you without the opportunity to complete your sets. The game spans three epochs, each offering ways to gain immediate, defensive, or endgame points. Easy to learn, Ra combines tension and excitement in each round.
Bid to acquire the most valuable sets of Egyptian artifacts and resources.

In Troyes, you will relive four centuries of the iconic city in the Champagne region. Manage a group of dice representing the populace and use them to influence religious, military, and civil domains. You'll balance your actions between building the cathedral, securing the city's defense, and navigating the city's events. Acquire resources by negotiating with opponents and manage risks to gain fame. Your tactical decisions will shape the city's history and determine your path to victory.
Defend the city and rise to power by influencing the merchants, knights and clergy.

In "Lorenzo il Magnifico", you lead a noble family striving for prestige during the Italian Renaissance. You allocate family members with varying strengths to gather resources, acquire development cards, and activate their effects. Each round begins with rolling dice that influence these decisions, adding strategic depth. Keep an eye on your standing with the Church, as lack of devotion brings penalties. After six intense rounds, the family with the most prestige emerges victorious in this competitive strategy game.
Avoid excommunication and lead your family to power during the Italian Renaissance.

In Eldritch Horror, you team up with fellow investigators to prevent an ancient evil from bringing destruction upon the world. This cooperative game takes you across the globe, from bustling cities to remote wilderness, as you fight monsters, solve mysteries, and explore secret dimensions. Manage your resources and make tactical decisions to close otherworldly gates and search for clues. With unique characters and a mix of story-driven encounters, each game offers a new challenge to overcome.
An unknown Ancient One approaches the world—and you must solve mysteries to stop it.

In Nemesis: Lockdown, you find yourself in a secret Martian base overrun by aliens. As you explore its multi-level corridors, gather crucial items and face terrifying threats, you must also focus on completing your secret objective. The game's semi-cooperative nature means you'll work with others but also be wary of their hidden agendas. New mechanics, like advanced computer actions and a CSS hatch system, add depth and excitement, keeping you on the edge of your seat as you try to survive.
Survive an alien-infested lab on Mars but beware of other players and their agendas.

In Mombasa, you will immerse yourself in 18th century Africa, investing in four chartered companies. The goal is to expand their trading posts across the continent, increasing your share value. The game features a unique rotating-display hand mechanism, which challenges you to plan actions strategically. You'll trade in commodities like bananas and diamonds, managing your hand of cards to outsmart rivals. With multiple strategies and variable boards, each session offers a fresh challenge.
Acquire shares of unique companies and propagate their trading posts to rake in cash.
The Lord of the Rings: Journeys in Middle-Earth <small>(2019)</small>

In The Lord of the Rings: Journeys in Middle-Earth, you become heroes on a cooperative journey through Tolkien's world. Guided by an app, you and your friends will explore dynamic landscapes, face off against dark forces, and make choices that shape your adventure. Each game is part of a larger campaign, where using your skills and bravery is essential. The modular board and unique app integration create an immersive experience that lets you write your own story in Middle-earth.
Heroes explore Middle-earth, working together to combat evil in an epic campaign.

In Patchwork, you and another player compete to craft the most impressive quilt on your personal 9x9 board. Choose from the available patches and pay with buttons, carefully fitting pieces to avoid holes. As you progress on the time track, collect button income, vital for purchasing more patches. Will you opt to complete a 7x7 grid for a bonus tile? Plan each move strategically to outscore your rival in this delightful game of pattern building and resource management.
Piece together a quilt and leave no holes to become the button master.

In "Age of Steam," you relive the era of early American railroading, navigating a competitive landscape filled with strategic decisions. You’ll develop extensive track networks and powerful locomotives, carefully selecting routes for the best returns. Manage your finances to outpace rivals in building railroads across industrial hubs like Pittsburgh and Chicago. Each game phase demands critical choices, ensuring dynamic interactions and unique challenges every time you play. Towns grow into cities, making each game a new adventure.
Outperform your railroad rivals with shares, auctions, track-building, and deliveries
