In Twilight Imperium: Third Edition, you step into the shoes of a leader of an ancient galactic civilization. You'll navigate the vastness of space, negotiate with other races, and build powerful armies to claim the imperial throne. With a dynamic board and hundreds of cards, the strategy is deep and varied. Each game is unique due to the geomorphic tiles and variable player powers. Engage in diplomacy, trade, and warfare in this epic empire-building experience where your choices shape the fate of the galaxy.
Epic empire-building game of interstellar conflict, trade, and struggle for power.

In Dominion, you become a monarch seeking to expand your small kingdom into a vast dominion. Starting with a small deck of cards, you'll purchase and strategically use new cards to grow your resources and outpace rival monarchs. This deck-building game allows you to explore countless strategies as you make choices leading to the most valuable lands and victory points. With a wide variety of cards and endless combinations, each game is a fresh challenge in claiming sovereignty over newfound territories.
Acquire the most valuable lands by building your deck with treasure and power cards.

In Trajan, you will dive into the heart of ancient Rome, striving to expand your influence across its many facets—political sway, trade, military might, and culture. Utilizing a unique action selection mechanism inspired by mancala, you'll distribute action pieces to trigger powerful moves. Choose wisely to build, trade, influence the Senate, and command the legions. Balance your strategy, fulfill public demands, and avoid penalties to collect victory points and dominate the empire.
Manage and rule all aspects of Ancient Rome with a clever action selection mancala.

In Russian Railroads, you'll plunge into the competitive world of railway expansion in Russia. You must strategically assign workers to key tasks, modernize your tracks, and develop advanced locomotives and factories to outpace your rivals. As you progress, your choices will unlock new technologies and earn you valuable victory points. The challenge lies in balancing your strategy across multiple tracks, efficiently utilizing your engineers, and staying ahead in the race to build the greatest railway empire.
Acquire locomotives & industry, build track, and hire the best engineers in Russia.

In Wonderland's War, you take on the role of iconic Wonderland characters like Alice or the Mad Hatter and join the Hatter's tea party to prepare for battle. During the tea party, you draft cards, build your armies, and enhance your leader's abilities. The shards of the Looking Glass present risks as you gather forces. After the tea party, wage war across Wonderland's landscapes, carefully managing your resources to complete quests and avoid madness. Victory goes to the faction with the most points after three rounds.
The looking glass has shattered and war has come to Wonderland!

In Aeon's End: War Eternal, you will defend the last refuge of humanity, Gravehold, against the relentless invasions of otherworldly beings known as The Nameless. This standalone, cooperative deck-building game offers a dynamic experience with unique characters and powerful spells. Featuring innovative mechanics like variable turn order and strategic deck management, it challenges you to plan carefully. Play solo or with friends, and combine it with other Aeon's End content for endless adventures.
War Eternal is a standalone game compatible with the deck building game Aeon's End.

In Schwingenschlag, you will step into the shoes of an amateur dracologist in Wyrmspan, a world brimming with dragons. Your task is to delve into a newly discovered labyrinth on your property, transforming it into a sanctuary for these majestic creatures. Starting with three basic caverns, you'll gradually excavate more spaces and lure dragons to your sanctuary, stacking abilities and gaining the Dragon Guild's favor. Inspired by Wingspan's mechanics, Schwingenschlag stands as its own captivating game.
Build a cavernous sanctuary for dragons of all shapes and sizes!

In Hansa Teutonica, you take on the role of a trader in the Hanseatic League. Your aim is to build an extensive network of offices, control cities, and collect bonus markers. By strategically placing your pawns on routes between cities, you can establish offices and gain advantages. Skills improvement is key, allowing you more action points and better control. This game stands out with its deep strategic choices and interactive elements, as you compete to dominate the trade routes.
Build networks of merchants along the roads and market towns of the Hanseatic League.

In Rising Sun, you will lead a clan in mythical feudal Japan. Through strategic alliances, shrewd negotiation, and combat prowess, guide your clan to reclaim the land's honor. Each clan offers unique abilities, and you'll need to balance power and honor across the seasons. Honor dictates ties and alliances can shift, as deals are never binding. Collect Victory Points by winning battles, harvesting provinces, and embodying your clan’s virtues. As winter arrives, only one clan will stand victorious.
Lead your clan to victory through negotiation, combat, monsters and favors from Kami.

In Vinhos: Deluxe Edition, you step into the role of a Portuguese winemaker competing to craft the finest wines. Over six years, you will cultivate vineyards, hire skilled oenologists, and participate in trade fairs. With a unique blend of economic strategy and worker placement, you’ll strategize to create quality wines for profit or victory points. The game features beautiful new artwork, dual game modes, and streamlined rules. It is an intricate and rewarding challenge for any strategy game enthusiast.
The strategic craft of fine winemaking.

In The 7th Continent, you will embark on an epic journey through an uncharted land in the early 20th century. As an explorer, you aim to uncover the secrets of this vast and treacherous continent to lift a brutal curse upon you. Dive into a solo or cooperative adventure, crafting tools and making crucial decisions as you navigate through terrain and event cards. The game offers endless exploration, with a unique save system allowing you to pause and continue your quest at any time.
Journey through a vibrant but deadly land to uncover the key to lifting your curse.

In Yokohama, you take on the role of a burgeoning merchant during Japan's Meiji era when the city is transforming into a bustling trade hub. You'll navigate a modular board to collect resources such as copper and silk, fulfill international orders, and modernize your operations by adopting new technologies. With strategies including worker placement and network building, each decision impacts your path to becoming the most renowned merchant. Enjoy rich mechanics that offer multiple paths to victory.
Claim your fame as the dominant merchant in the Meiji period of Yokohama.

In Pandemic: Iberia, you will step into the Iberian Peninsula of 1848, taking on roles such as nurse and railway worker. Your mission is to travel from Barcelona to Lisboa to find cures for malaria, typhus, yellow fever, and cholera. You'll navigate by carriage, boat, or train, and use your skills to distribute purified water and build railways to slow disease spread. Experience history with special game variants that add depth to this cooperative challenge.
Travel from Barcelona to Lisboa to cure malaria, typhus, yellow fever, and cholera.
Clank! In! Space!: A Deck-Building Adventure <small>(2017)</small>

In Clank! In! Space!, you and your fellow thieves infiltrate the spaceship of the menacing Lord Eradikus. Your mission is to hack into the command module and snag valuable artifacts before making a daring escape. As you play, you'll build your deck, recruit allies, and collect loot. But beware: making noise can alert Lord Eradikus, putting you in danger. Your strategic choices and ability to stay quiet are key in this blend of deck-building and sci-fi adventure on a modular board.
Tiptoe your way through Lord Eradikus' spaceship to nab artifacts and an escape pod.

In Forbidden Stars, you command one of the galaxy's great factions as you vie for supremacy over the Herakon Cluster. You must build formidable armies and engage in strategic battles to secure key objectives scattered across the star sector. The game blends tight strategic planning with tactical combat, as each faction boasts unique strengths and abilities. Deploy, strategize, dominate, and advance your forces to outwit your opponents in this epic wargame of interstellar conquest.
Assemble your armies, devise your strategy, and wage war across the Herakon Cluster.

In Just One, you will team up to guess as many mystery words as possible. Each round, one player tries to guess a word based on one-word clues given by the other players. But beware: identical clues are canceled and won’t help the guesser. With 13 cards in a game, aim for a perfect score by giving the most original and helpful clues. It's a creative and cooperative experience where thinking outside the box is key to success. Play together, think differently, and make it fun!
Give one-word clues so someone can guess one word, but duplicate clues are discarded.

In Codenames, you will take on the roles of either a spymaster or an agent in a team-based word game full of intrigue and strategy. Your goal is to help your team identify all of your secret agents from a field of 25 codenames using clever one-word clues. Be cautious, though — guess the assassin and your team loses instantly. Each round is a mix of deduction and risk as you try to connect multiple words with a single clue. It's a fun and challenging game, ideal for parties and group gatherings.
Give your team clever one-word clues to help them spot their agents in the field.

In ISS Vanguard, you embark on a thrilling co-operative Sci-Fi journey as you and up to three others manage the crew of the first human interstellar ship. You navigate space, tackle strategic ship management, and face tactical planetary exploration. Dive into a branching narrative, with over 100 unique crew members, where your choices shape the story. Balance resources, equipment, and crew abilities in this dynamic blend of strategy and storytelling, ensuring your ship's survival and uncovering the secrets of the universe.
Crew the first interstellar ship in outer space, exploring and discovering...

In "Champions of Midgard," you will lead a Viking clan to defend an embattled harbor town against mythological Norse creatures like trolls and draugr. This middleweight game combines strategic worker placement with thrilling dice battles. Collect resources, rally warriors, and sail across seas to defeat foes and earn glory. As you gather the favor of the gods, you aim to become the most revered Jarl. With each decision, balance risk and reward to emerge as the champion of Midgard.
Gain glory by defending a Viking harbor town against trolls, draugr and other beasts.

In Rajas of the Ganges, you'll step into the roles of rajas and ranis in 16th century India, working to develop your provinces into prosperous domains. Through clever dice management and strategic worker placement, you must build markets and monuments to support the Great Mogul empire. Balance your resources wisely and use karma to your advantage as you race against others to achieve wealth and fame. Can you become a legendary ruler in this vibrant historical setting?
Manage your dice to build profitable markets and grand monuments in historic India.

In PARKS, you will guide two hikers through stunning trails across different seasons, capturing memories represented by resource tokens like mountains and forests. Each trail is unique, evolving as the seasons change. You'll trade these memories to visit National Parks, while campfires let you share spaces with others. Canteens and gear enhance your journeys as you carefully balance collecting resources and visiting parks. Immerse yourself in this relaxing yet strategic adventure.
Hike through National Parks tiles, collecting memories and admiring gorgeous scenery.

In Nukleum, you dive into an alternate 19th-century Saxony, where the discovery of Uranium has sparked an industrial revolution. You play as industrialists building networks, powering cities, and fulfilling contracts to lead this new era. Develop unique technologies and strategies as you expand railways and powerlines. With asymmetric powers, plan moves carefully in this heavy euro game, continuously engaging with no set phases. Can you master the atom and outmaneuver your rivals?
Become the leader of the industrial revolution in an alternate timeline.

In Roll for the Galaxy, you'll guide your group of dice workers to develop a flourishing space empire. Roll your dice to explore new worlds, advance technologies, and trade goods across the galaxy. Each decision determines how efficiently your civilization grows compared to others. This dynamic game blends strategic planning with the uncertainty of dice, offering a unique twist on the space expansion genre. Ideal for 2-5 players, it’s an engaging experience that balances luck with clever strategy.
Utilize your dice populace to develop technologies, settle worlds, and ship goods.

In Hadrian's Wall, you become a Roman General tasked with constructing and defending a milecastle along the famous wall. Over six years, you'll build fortifications, manage resources, and attract civilians by providing services and entertainment. Your goal is to gain renown, piety, valor, and discipline while managing the threats of the Pictish tribes. The most successful general will impress the Emperor and be celebrated as Legatus Legionis.
Compete as one of six Roman Generals in charge of a milecastle along Hadrian's Wall.

In Pandemic, you become a team of disease-fighting specialists striving to control four deadly plagues across the globe. The board shows major cities that need your urgent attention. On your turn, use up to four actions to travel, treat infections, discover cures, or build research stations. You'll need to carefully use your role's unique abilities and work with your team to combat outbreaks, all while managing a deck of cards that introduces new challenges with Epidemic cards. Cure all four diseases to win!
Your team of experts must prevent the world from succumbing to a viral pandemic.
Arkham Horror: The Card Game (Revised Edition) <small>(2021)</small>

In Arkham Horror: The Card Game (Revised Edition), you'll delve into the eerie world of Arkham, Massachusetts. Alone or with up to three friends, you'll investigate strange occurrences and face terrifying horrors as you unravel dark mysteries. Each decision shapes your story and survival, influenced by your unique strengths and haunting flaws. With improved organization and a revamped system, this edition supports up to four players from one core set, making it easier to explore the chaos and craft your narrative.
Revised core set repackages the original with support for 1-4p.

In Targi, you lead a nomadic Tuareg tribe, trading goods like dates, salt, and pepper to expand your influence along desert trade routes. The game board is a 5x5 grid where you strategically place meeples on action spaces to gather resources and claim valuable tribe cards for points. Skillfully balance collecting commodities and tribe combinations to maximize victory points. The interaction between meeple placement and resource management makes Targi a unique and engaging two-player experience.
A contest between two nomadic tribes along desert trade routes.

Tyrants of the Underdark immerses you in a strategic battle for dominance in a world beneath the Sword Coast. You lead a Drow house, using deck-building and territorial control to outmaneuver your rivals. Assemble an 80-card deck from Drow, Dragons, Demons, and Elementals to contend for resources. Recruit minions and expand your influence, while deploying your forces strategically. Victory goes to those who master power and influence to control sites, promote minions, and eliminate threats.
Lead a Drow house and build the best deck to establish supremacy over the Underdark.

In Star Realms, you engage in fast-paced outer space combat through deck-building. You start with basic cards and strategically acquire Ships and Bases from the Trade Row to enhance your deck. Use these to generate Trade or Combat, attacking your opponent and reducing their Authority to zero to win. Leverage powerful Ally abilities by focusing on specific factions, and make strategic decisions in each game. With easy-to-learn mechanics and deep strategic depth, it offers endless replayability.
Compete head-to-head to create the most powerful deck of spaceships and bases.

In Magic: The Gathering, you take on the role of a planeswalker, wielding powerful spells and summoning creatures to outsmart your opponents. You'll build a personalized deck from a vast array of over 25,000 cards and engage in strategic duels. Each card represents a different spell or creature, offering endless possibilities for combinations and tactics. This groundbreaking collectible card game challenges you to reduce your opponent’s life to zero while managing resources and anticipating their moves.
Cast spells and summon fantasy monsters in the original collectible card game.

In Res Arcana, you are powerful mages crafting potent artifacts and vying for mystical places of power. Set in a magical world, you gather essences like Life, Death, and Gold to fuel your spells. Choose your mage, manage your resources, and strategically play cards to summon creatures and claim ancient monuments. With a balance of resource management and tactical play, the goal is to reach 10 victory points over several rounds, outmaneuvering your rivals in this enchanting card game.
Rival mages create artifacts, vying for places of power and ancient monuments.

In Cartographers, you embark on a quest to chart the northern lands under Queen Gimnax's decree. You will draw maps to capture terrain for the Kingdom of Nalos, mindful of the queen's specific orders. As each season passes, adapt your plans to earn reputation points based on the queen's edicts. But watch out for the Dragul's interference! Engage in strategic drawing on your map sheet, outmaneuvering rivals to become the top cartographer by winter's end.
Explore lands on behalf of the queen and draw the most proficient maps to earn favor.

In Alchemists, you delve into the mysterious world of potion-making, competing over six rounds to prove your academic prowess. You mix ingredients, test their effects with the help of an app, and publish theories to gain respect and points. Money, earned by selling potions, allows you to acquire magical artifacts that enhance your reputation. Each choice affects your reputation, ultimately determining the winner. Engage in strategic planning and deduction in this immersive board game adventure.
Showcase your alchemical know-how by publishing theories in this app-driven game.

In Too Many Bones: Undertow, you embark on a thrilling voyage with Gearlocs Stanza and Duster, navigating the treacherous Sibron River. This standalone expansion blends fantasy and strategy with a unique dice-based combat system. With dual-sided battle mats, you engage in tactical battles both on land and water. Cooperative gameplay and customizable characters offer replayability, while its challenging mechanics test your strategic skills. Ideal for solo or duo adventurers.
Songstress Stanza & stealthy Duster board a raft & chuck gobs of dice on the Sibron.

In Watergate, you will take on the role of either a relentless Washington Post journalist or a member of the Nixon administration, each armed with a unique deck of cards. As the journalist, your goal is to uncover a chain of evidence linking informants directly to President Nixon. Meanwhile, the administration aims to stall and disrupt, trying to survive until the end of Nixon's term. Engage in a tense back-and-forth struggle, balancing strategy and timing in this political thriller.
Hide or expose the greatest American political scandal in a tug of war for evidence.

In Ticket to Ride: Europe, you embark on an exciting train adventure across the beautiful landscapes of Europe. You will strategically collect cards to build routes connecting iconic cities, from Lisbon to Moscow. The game introduces new mechanics, like tunnels that might require extra cards, ferries needing locomotive cards, and stations that let you use competitors' routes. Easy to learn, it offers fun for both families and seasoned gamers, crafting a unique journey across the map.
Build train routes across Europe in this sequel to the hit family board game.

In The Isle of Cats, you're on a mission to save as many cats as possible from the clutches of Lord Vesh. As citizens of Squalls End, you'll explore the island, draft cards, and place polyomino cat tiles on your boat. Fit the cats together to keep their families intact, while discovering treasures and ancient lessons that offer unique scoring opportunities. The strategic challenge lies in resource management and maximizing space as you aim for the highest score after five rounds.
Rescue as many cats as you can before Lord Vesh comes to destroy their home.

In "It's a Wonderful World," you'll guide an expanding empire, competing to shape a future through strategic card drafting and engine building. Draft cards to decide whether to recycle them for immediate resources or to invest in construction to boost your production power. Each completed project strengthens your empire's capabilities, making planning crucial as you navigate the production phases. With options for solo play and expansions featuring unique campaigns, there's always a new challenge to master.
Draft yourself the ‘perfect’ dystopia, complete projects and churn out resources.

In Undaunted: Normandy, you will command American or German forces during the pivotal D-Day operations. This engaging WWII deck-building game challenges you to navigate intense scenarios where each choice can shift the battle's tide. Use your deck strategically to reinforce your troops, control the battlefield, and counter the enemy’s plans. With its mix of strategy, tactics, and historical theme, Undaunted: Normandy offers a thrilling two-player experience of warfare and leadership.
Command your rifle platoon to victory in this WWII multi-scenario deck builder.

In Planet Unknown, you are tasked with colonizing a new planet as Earth's resources dwindle. You will strategically place polyomino-shaped tiles representing dual resources to build an infrastructure that supports life. Your choices are crucial, as each tile placement can trigger events like meteor showers that add complexity. The game shines with its Lazy S.U.S.A.N., allowing simultaneous decision-making on a shared platform. Compete to develop the best planet in this engaging blend of strategy and planning.
Develop and colonize your planet with oddly shaped tiles served on a rotating tray.
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game <small>(2011)</small>

In The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game, you will delve into the depths of Middle-earth, leading a fellowship on cooperative quests. Assemble a team of three heroes, bolstered by allies and powerful cards, to tackle unique scenarios set in the world of J.R.R. Tolkien. Plan your strategy—will you press forward with the quest or face off against formidable foes? With customizable decks and evolving campaigns, each adventure is unique. Relive the magic of Middle-earth as you forge your own legendary journeys.
Guide your fellowship as it embarks on unique adventures in Tolkien's Middle-earth!

In Stone Age, you step back to prehistoric times to manage a tribe of hunters and gatherers. Use your tribe members strategically, placing them in different areas to gather resources like wood, stone, and gold. Create tools, trade, and expand your village, all while ensuring you have enough food to support your people. This game combines luck and planning, offering an engaging experience of growth and survival. Balance your resources wisely to climb the ladder of civilization in this classic strategy game.
Travel to the time of hunters and gatherers in this classic game of tools and tribes.

In Dominion: Basisspiel 2. Edition, you will step into the shoes of a monarch, striving to expand your kingdom. Start with a small deck of cards and strategically acquire new ones to build your arsenal. Aim for efficiency as you compete against other monarchs for unclaimed lands. The game offers immense variety with an array of Kingdom cards, ensuring each playthrough is unique. This deck-building game challenges you to optimize your strategy for the most victory points by the end.
Acquire cards to grow your kingdom's influence in this classic deck-building game.

In War Chest, you'll engage in strategic battles where you'll draft unique units into your army and maneuver across a hex-grid battlefield. This bag-building game requires not just tactical prowess on the field but also careful management of your units yet to be deployed. In each round, you'll draw three coins representing different military units, using them to execute various actions. Victory is achieved when you place all control markers on the board, outmatching your opponent in strategic control and foresight.
Recruit, bolster and maneuver your way to controlling the hex-grid battlefield.

In Praga Caput Regni, you become a wealthy citizen of medieval Prague, engaged in ambitious building projects to earn the king’s favor. In a dynamic and strategic environment, you'll choose from six evolving actions on the action crane to gather resources, enhance your abilities, and contribute to iconic constructions like the Charles Bridge or St. Vitus Cathedral. Success hinges on discovering synergies in your actions and optimally timing your contributions to leave a lasting impression on King Charles.
Wealthy citizens of medieval Prague organize building projects to gain king's favor.

In Kemet, you take on the role of an ancient Egyptian god, leading your tribe's troops to dominate the mythical land. You'll harness divine powers and gather mystical creatures, directing epic battles or capturing valuable territories. Gameplay alternates between strategic day actions and resource-gathering night phases. With a variety of paths to victory, such as controlling temples or developing pyramids, you'll engage in tactical combat with card-play mechanics in a vibrant fantasy setting.
Play as warring Egyptian Gods and build the most powerful army to dominate Egypt.

In Sherlock Holmes Criminal-Cabinet, you step into the foggy streets of Victorian London to unravel intriguing mysteries. As you explore the city, you'll interview suspects, scour newspapers for tidbits, and gather evidence to solve puzzling cases. This cooperative game challenges you to match wits with Sherlock Holmes himself. With no dice or luck involved, it's all about your deductive prowess. Immerse yourself in the era, solve crimes, and experience the thrill of Holmesian detective work.
The game is afoot as you and your irregular friends search Victorian London for clues

In Terraforming Mars: Ares Expedition, you take the role of a corporation aiming to make Mars habitable. By managing your resources and carefully playing project cards, you'll influence the planet's oceans, oxygen, and temperature. The game offers unique strategic choices as you decide which phase to play each round. With simultaneous actions, the pace remains engaging as you compete for the highest terraform rating and victory points. The combination of resource management and tactical card play makes each session a dynamic challenge.
Return to Mars and terraform it once again, this time using only cards.

In Istanbul, you'll navigate the bustling bazaar with your merchant and assistants, aiming to gather rubies before your competitors. Move strategically across 16 locations, where each spot offers unique actions to expand your wheelbarrow, trade goods, or secure special abilities. Plan carefully as you'll need to leave assistants behind, collecting them later to remain agile. The dynamic board and varied strategies make each game unique, challenging you to manage resources and outsmart rivals.
Send your assistants through the shops of Istanbul as you race to acquire rubies.

In Endeavor: Age of Sail, you embark on a journey to earn glory for your empire. Setting sail from Europe and the Mediterranean, you will build shipping routes and occupy cities across the globe. Manage your growing industry, culture, finance, and influence to expand your reach and create a successful trade engine. This updated classic offers a double-sided board, varied starting setups, and engaging exploits to enhance your strategy and bring the world of exploration and empire-building to life.
Spread your glory over the vast, as of yet unexplored world in this updated classic.

In "Viscounts of the West Kingdom," you are tasked with navigating a kingdom in turmoil during the declining years of a once-mighty king. As a viscount, your mission is to amass the most victory points by constructing buildings, writing manuscripts, and working in the king's castle. You'll travel the realm, recruit allies, and gather influence among diverse spheres of society. Your choices will lead the kingdom to either poverty or prosperity, demanding strategic prowess to succeed in this uncertain era.
Travel the Kingdom seeking upgrades in an attempt to bring poverty or prosperity.
Legendary Encounters: An Alien Deck Building Game <small>(2014)</small>

In Legendary Encounters: An Alien Deck Building Game, you dive into the thrilling world of the Alien movies. You must work together to survive relentless waves of terrifying Xenomorphs. Assume the roles of iconic characters like Ripley or Hicks and use strategy to build your deck by recruiting powerful cards. With original artwork and immersive play, each game session is a race against time to uncover and defeat the lurking alien threats. It's a cooperative adventure that demands teamwork and clever planning.
In space, no one can hear you build a deck of marine & weapon cards to fight aliens.

In Glen More II: Chronicles, you're the leader of a Scottish clan, expanding your land and wealth from medieval times to the 19th century. You'll make key decisions, such as trading livestock, producing whisky, or securing landmarks like castles. The unique tile placement and activation system lets you plan and strategize, ensuring your clan thrives. Modular expansions called "Chronicles" introduce new mechanics, keeping the game fresh with every play session as you chart your path to victory.
Expand your Scottish clan by trading livestock, making whisky and gaining landmarks.

Unmatched: Cobble & Fog brings iconic Victorian-era characters into a tense duel. You will select from four legendary heroes—Invisible Man, Sherlock Holmes, Dracula, and Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde—each with their own unique deck and style. Engage in strategic movement and tactical card play as you outwit your opponent. Designed for two to four players, this game offers a dynamic and varied experience with its highly asymmetrical combat, ensuring every match-up feels fresh and engaging.
Heroes from Victorian-era literature join a skirmish to the death.
Marco Polo II: In the Service of the Khan <small>(2019)</small>

In Marco Polo II: In the Service of the Khan, you will embark on a journey back to the West as an emissary of the Khan, venturing to the furthest corners of his empire. You’ll need to navigate the Silk Road, trade valuable goods such as silk, spice, gold, and jade, and manage resources strategically. With elements like dice rolling and worker placement, every decision is crucial. Discover new routes or revisit familiar ones, aiming to build upon Marco Polo’s legendary legacy.
Travel to cities along the silk road, trading silk, spice, gold & jade along the way.
Xia: Legends of a Drift System <small>(2014)</small>

In Xia: Legends of a Drift System, you start as a humble starship captain eager to explore the cosmos. In this sandbox-style space adventure, you'll customize your ship and choose your path: trade, mine, or engage in thrilling battles. Navigate through unknown sectors and adapt quickly to earn Fame Points. Each game unfolds differently, offering limitless possibilities as you strive for stardom. Risk takers and savvy strategists will find their path to glory in the vastness of space.
Pilot your ship to stardom in a massive sci-fi sandbox.

Take command in the Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game, where you engage in thrilling space skirmishes. Control iconic vessels like Rebel X-wings and Imperial TIE fighters. Choose your crew and plan secret maneuvers using unique dials to outwit opponents. With beautifully painted miniatures and dynamic gameplay, each mission offers varied strategies and outcomes. Perfect for fans of tactical battles, this game brings the Star Wars universe to life with customizable options and exciting dogfights.
Pilot your ships in tight arcs to take out the enemy! The universe can be yours.

In Ganz Schön Clever, you will strategically choose dice to fill out your scoresheet in various colored sections. Each choice matters as you aim to create chain reactions with clever scoring combos. Dice left aside can be picked by others, ensuring everyone stays involved. Balance your need to lock in high scores against giving your opponents opportunities. This engaging dice game is both a brain-teaser and a race for points, perfect for family game night with its quick, dynamic turns.
Draft dice to mark numbers on your scoresheet, comboing bonuses to power your points.

In Radlands, you lead a group of survivors in a post-apocalyptic world, battling a rival tribe to protect your camps. This competitive card game requires you to wisely manage your resources, particularly water, to deploy people and events while maximizing card synergies. Draw cards from a shared deck and decide whether to play them or use their quick effects. Your goal is to outwit your opponent and destroy their camps before yours fall.
Post-apocalyptic bands of punks fight to destroy the rival tribe's camps.

In Jaipur, you step into the shoes of a powerful trader in Rajasthan. Compete directly with a rival to earn prestigious seals of excellence by trading and selling goods at strategic times. Decide whether to take camels, swap goods, or sell for profit—and keep an eye on the market as values fluctuate. Camels are crucial for trading and might just tip the scales in your favor by the round's end. Jaipur blends strategy, risk, and timing in this fast-paced, tactical card game for two.
Trade and sell goods to become the most wealthy merchant in this short game for two.

In Welcome To..., you are an architect in the 1950s aiming to build the finest suburban town in the U.S. Use cards to choose house numbers and actions like adding parks and fences. Instead of rolling dice, you draw cards to alter your suburb. Your goal is to complete public goals first and maximize your points by cleverly placing house numbers and improving your estate. With simultaneous play, the game supports large groups and promises no two games will be alike, offering various strategies to explore.
Design the most appealing 1950s neighborhood, with fences, parks, and swimming pools.

In Forest Shuffle, you will explore the intricate world of ecosystems. Collect diverse tree species and carefully invite animals and plants to cultivate a thriving forest community. Will your woodland creation surpass others? Use your cards to draw, strategize, and plant wisely, as the game unfolds towards winter’s inevitable chill. Clever use of species and terrain is key to outscoring your opponents in this eco-friendly, plastic-free adventure. Ideal for a family game night with strategic depth.
Gather the most valuable trees and attract species to them.

In Earth, you will embark on a journey to cultivate a thriving ecosystem filled with diverse flora, fauna, and terrains. As a tableau builder for 1 to 5 players, you will strategically combine cards to discover new synergies and connections, creating a self-sustaining engine of growth and expansion. Engage in this enlightening experience where even your discarded plants turn into compost, fueling future developments. Dive into Earth's rich environments and witness the marvels of nature unfold before you.
Strategically grow your ecosystem card engine with unique flora, fauna, and terrains.

In Welcome to the Moon, you embark on an epic journey to save humanity by colonizing space. Using a flip-and-write mechanism, you flip cards to create combinations of starship numbers and actions. Choose your combination wisely to fill zones on your adventure sheet in numerical order. Experience the dynamic campaign mode with eight unique adventure sheets, where your choices influence future missions. The game's variety and evolving challenges ensure each session is fresh and exciting.
Escape from Earth and plan the humankind journey to the moon to save humanity.

In Dune, you assume control of a powerful faction vying for dominance over the desolate world of Arrakis, the sole source of the precious spice melange. You will engage in strategic alliances and ruthless treachery, navigating a world filled with intrigue and power struggles. Each decision you make could alter the balance of the game as you compete to secure control over this vital resource. With unique faction abilities and a rich thematic setting, Dune offers a deep and immersive experience.
Wildly different factions vie for control of Arrakis through alliance and treachery.

In Star Wars: Outer Rim, you step into the roles of bounty hunters, mercenaries, and smugglers exploring the galaxy. Customize your ship, recruit iconic crew members, and complete daring missions to earn fame. Navigate the dangers of the outer rim, from warring factions to rival scoundrels. Balance risk and reward as you fulfill bounties, deliver illegal cargo, and upgrade your ship. The goal is to amass fame and become a legendary figure in the galaxy.
Star Wars characters race across the galaxy trying to achieve the most fame!

In "Chaos in the Old World", you assume the role of a malevolent god with unique followers and dark abilities. You must spread corruption across the Old World, battling both rival gods and the world's defenders. Each god has special gifts and powers, making every choice strategic. With multiple paths to victory, you will summon hideous creatures, influence territories, and clash for dominance. Experience an intricate mix of strategy and theme as you leave your sinister mark on the world.
Rival chaos gods send forth their minions to spread corruption and destruction.

In Great Western Trail: Argentina, you will guide your cattle across the stunning Pampas to Buenos Aires. Set at the end of the 19th century, you manage your ranch using familiar elements like deck management and rondel mechanics, with exciting new twists. Choose your path wisely between buildings and farmers, harnessing cow cards to gain resources like grain. Unlock shortcuts to outpace opponents and strategize your way to valuable bonuses at the port. With solo play and new challenges, it's a captivating journey.
Travel the beautiful plains of the Pampas with your cattle.

In War of the Ring, you will immerse yourself in the epic conflict of Middle Earth during the Third Age. As leader of the Free Peoples or the Shadow Armies, you'll strategize your moves on the Political Track and in military battles. Command armies, recruit troops, and use Action Dice for strategic decisions and Event Cards to influence the game. Balance protecting the Ringbearer with raising defenses. Will you lead to military conquest or destroy the One Ring in secret?
Rings, Fellowship, diplomacy and war in the Third Age of Middle Earth.
This War of Mine: The Board Game <small>(2017)</small>

In "This War of Mine: The Board Game," you enter a war-torn city as civilians trying to survive amid chaos. This cooperative game, for up to 6 players, challenges you with difficult decisions and moral dilemmas as you manage resources, fortify your shelter, and seek necessities like food and medicine. The game features adaptive storytelling and unique scenarios, making each playthrough different. Experience the harsh realities of war and test your resolve as you strive to survive under extreme circumstances.
Civilians trapped in a war-torn city must make difficult decisions to survive.

In Memoir '44, you will step into the shoes of commanders during pivotal World War II battles like Omaha Beach and Pegasus Bridge. This board game places you directly in the action, with a double-sided hex board and over 15 scenarios that replicate historical terrains and objectives. You will deploy forces using Command and Tactic cards while making strategic decisions. Featuring detailed miniatures and fluid gameplay, it offers a tactical yet accessible experience for 2 players or teams.
Revisit the battles of D-Day and control the forces of the Allies and the Axis!

In Meadow, you will embark on a journey through nature, collecting beautifully illustrated cards that depict species, landscapes, and discoveries. As an explorer, your aim is to become the most skilled nature observer by gathering the most valuable sets. You'll use path tokens on two boards to gain cards or activate special actions with strategic choices to fulfill adventure goals for additional points. With 1-4 players, the game is rich in strategy and surprises, as envelopes with additional cards enhance replayability.
Start your journey into nature and collect cards to become a true nature observer.

In The Red Cathedral, you lead a team to construct the magnificent Saint Basil's Cathedral in Moscow. Your task is to strategically claim sections of the cathedral, gather necessary resources, and complete construction for prestige and the Tsar’s favor. Utilize the rondel mechanism to obtain resources and guild favors. Pay close attention to your opponents' moves, as your strategic choices will determine your success. With easy-to-learn rules yet deep strategic potential, it's a rewarding challenge.
Lead a construction team to build Saint Basil's Cathedral under the Tsar's reign.
Descent: Die Reise ins Dunkel (Zweite Edition) <small>(2012)</small>

In Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition), you'll embark on an epic adventure in a vibrant fantasy world. Whether you're a courageous hero or the treacherous overlord, your journey will be filled with quests in dangerous dungeons and ancient ruins. You’ll battle monsters, gather riches, and strive to thwart the overlord’s vile plans. The game features modular boards, a unique dice system, and an immersive story-driven campaign, offering countless hero combinations and skills for an ever-engaging experience.
Fight the Overlord and level up your heroes in this fantasy dungeon campaign.

In 7 Wonders, you'll lead an ancient civilization to greatness by drafting cards and constructing a magnificent Wonder. Over three Ages, simultaneously choose cards representing different buildings like resource producers, military structures, and scientific advances, which create a thriving city. Engage in strategic planning and outmaneuver your neighbors in military conflicts. The player with the most victory points at the end claims the title of supreme leader.
Draft cards to develop your ancient civilization and build its Wonder of the World.

In Sagrada, you will become an artisan, crafting a stunning stained glass window. You'll draft colorful dice to fit into your window’s grid, adhering to specific color and value restrictions while avoiding placing similar dice adjacent to each other. Special tools allow you to bend the rules, but require strategic use of skill tokens. Each game features unique scoring objectives based on patterns and colors. Aim to create the most gorgeous window to win the game!
Craft the best stained-glass windows by carefully placing colorful transparent dice.

In Sekigahara: The Unification of Japan, you are thrust into the pivotal battle of 1600, vying for control of Japan. You will lead as Ishida Mitsunari or Tokugawa Ieyasu, commanding armies where loyalty is as valuable as strength. The game offers a unique experience with card-driven conflict resolution and no dice, making every move a blend of strategy and suspense. Manage your resources and cultivate allegiance among your allies to outmaneuver your opponent in this historically rich and tactically deep wargame.
Defend or depose the Toyotomi heir by commanding the loyalty of the feudal lords.

In Castles of Mad King Ludwig, you become a master builder, tasked with constructing a unique and extravagant castle for the whimsical King Ludwig II of Bavaria. Start with a humble foyer and expand your masterpiece room by room. You'll set strategic prices as the Master Builder, enticing opponents while aiming to build the most magnificent castle yourself. Balance the King's shifting demands with your goals, earning points based on your clever room placements and designs. The one with the most castle points at the end wins!
Choose and play tiles to satisfy the king's whims and build the best fantasy castle.

In Cosmic Encounter, you wield the power of an alien civilization vying for control of the universe. Each player leads a distinct alien race with special abilities, making every game unique. Engage in alliances, engage in tactical battles, and use cunning diplomacy. The objective is to establish colonies in your rivals' systems and be the first to achieve five colonies outside your own. Form and break alliances to navigate the ever-changing dynamics of the galaxy and secure victory.
Conquer the galaxy with shifting alliances and the unique powers of your alien race.

In Modern Art, you take on the role of art dealers, engaging in the thrilling world of buying and selling paintings. The game centers around five diverse artists, and your task is to auction their artworks, aiming to profit as both buyer and seller. Each round, you put a painting up for auction, hoping others will buy it, or paying the bank if you decide to keep it. The value of the paintings depends on their popularity, and the broker with the most money after four rounds wins.
Four types of auctions challenge players in this classic game of art speculation.

In Space Base, you take on the role of a Commodore leading your fleet of ships. Deploy ships to different sectors as you expand your space base. Use strategic decisions to build your engine by acquiring and upgrading ships that bring unique benefits and resources. The goal is to accrue influence and rise in rank to Admiral. With its engaging "I roll, everyone gets stuff" mechanic, Space Base is accessible yet offers depth in strategic planning and brings an exciting mix of luck and thoughtful gameplay.
Amass spaceships for your fleet as you roll your way to domination.

In Star Wars: The Deckbuilding Game, you will immerse yourself in the timeless battle between the Rebel Alliance and the Galactic Empire. This two-player game brings the iconic Star Wars conflict to life on your tabletop. Choose your side and strategically build your deck to overpower your opponent. Your goal is to destroy three enemy bases, employing a mix of resource management and tactical combat. Players can strengthen their positions with special abilities and dominating force tracks.
The Rebels and Empire go head-to-head to eliminate one another's bases.

In The Resistance: Avalon, you will enter the legendary realm of King Arthur, where the battle between Good and Evil unfolds. As one of Arthur’s loyal followers or a minion of Mordred, your goal is to complete missions without revealing your true identity. Merlin holds the key to identifying the agents of Evil but must communicate carefully to avoid being exposed. With hidden roles and secret information, your ability to deduce and bluff will be crucial in this game of social deception.
Who can you trust? A game of social deduction set in King Arthur’s legendary realm.

In Horrified, you will find yourself in a town under siege by legendary movie monsters. Your goal is to work with your team to fend off these fearsome creatures, including Dracula and Frankenstein, using strategy and cooperation. Each monster presents a unique challenge, requiring different tactics to defeat. With its easy-to-learn mechanics, you'll embark on a thrilling cooperative journey to save the town before it's too late. The game features beautifully sculpted miniatures and a dynamic setup that keeps every play session exciting.
Classic movie monsters terrorize a town! Can your team stop them in time?

In Paleo, you will embark on a cooperative adventure in the Stone Age, working to keep your tribe alive while completing various missions. You'll explore different locations, gather resources, and face the unpredictable dangers of prehistoric life. Each day is a challenge, as you must ensure everyone is fed and equipped to continue. With diverse modules, every game is unique, and your ultimate goal is to paint a woolly mammoth on a cave wall. Can your team survive and leave a mark on history?
Your Stone Age tribe must work together to eat, survive, and develop new tech.

In Railways of the World, you relive the early days of train travel as you establish your own railroad empire. Start with a modest engine and mission card, then connect cities like New York and Chicago. You will strategize to deliver goods efficiently, expand your routes, and upgrade your trains. With a vast game board and multiple expansions, each game is a new adventure. Build wisely to become the ultimate Rail Baron and maybe even connect the transcontinental railway!
Build rails, race to deliver scarce goods, and fulfill your Rail Baron's secret goal.
A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition) <small>(2011)</small>

In A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition), you dive into the chaotic world of Westeros, where power is not just taken by force but through cunning diplomacy. Lead one of the great Houses and navigate through a blend of strategic planning and intense negotiation. Each round involves making and breaking alliances, strategically placing orders, and engaging in battles with fellow Houses. Influence, betrayal, and warfare are at the heart of this epic struggle for the Iron Throne.
Make alliances—and break them!—as you strive to both unite and conquer Westeros.

In Azul: Summer Pavilion, you step into the role of a master artisan in 16th-century Portugal, tasked with building the king's summer pavilion. Over six rounds, you will carefully select and place colorful tiles to create intricate patterns on your player board. Each round, a different color becomes wild, adding a strategic twist. Earn points by completing stars and surrounding structures like pillars and statues. Balance your resources wisely to achieve the highest score and be recognized as the finest artisan.
You're an artisan working on creating striking patterns within a king's palace.

In Go, you will dive into an ancient strategy game that challenges the mind with its simple yet profound mechanics. The game is played with two players who take turns placing stones on a 19x19 grid. Your objective is to control more territory than your opponent by strategically enclosing areas and capturing their stones. Every move requires careful calculation and foresight, making Go a timeless test of wits. The game concludes when both players agree to finish, with the winner claiming the most controlled space.
Use stones to control space in this ancient game with simple rules.

In Ora et Labora, you lead a medieval monastery, managing workers and resources to expand your domain. Acquire land, construct buildings, and gather resources using a unique rondel mechanism that controls resource availability. Strategically place your workers in buildings for actions, and enter opponents' buildings by paying a fee. Craft prestigious items to earn victory points. Experience distinct gameplay modes with France and Ireland variants, adding depth and variety to your strategy.
Manage workers and resources to build up the land around your medieval monastery.

Embark on a winter journey with Ticket to Ride: Nordic Countries, where you traverse the snowy landscapes of Denmark, Finland, Norway, and Sweden. In this version, designed for 2-3 players, you'll gather and play train cards to construct routes between iconic cities like Copenhagen and Stockholm. Unique elements like ferries and tunnels spice up the game, adding extra challenges as you strategically block opponents. Engage in a more competitive Ticket to Ride experience with this Nordic adventure.
Build railways to connect destinations across Scandinavia, Finland, and Estonia.

In Clash of Cultures: Monumental Edition, you will guide your civilization from a humble settlement to a dominant empire. Immerse yourself in exploration, expansion, and strategic development. You will manage resources, build cities, advance technology, and forge alliances or conquer enemies. The modular board and distinct advances provide a unique experience each time. With beautifully sculpted miniatures and engaging mechanics, this is a must-play for lovers of civilization games.
Advance your ancient civilization from tiny settlement to mighty empire.

In Carcassonne, you will shape the landscape of medieval France by drawing and placing tiles. Each tile represents a part of the countryside, including cities, roads, cloisters, and fields. As you place tiles, you must cleverly connect cities to cities and roads to roads. Decide whether to claim areas by placing your meeples as knights, robbers, monks, or farmers. The strategic placement of tiles and meeples will earn you points as you complete cities or roads. Quick turns and engaging choices make every game different.
Shape the medieval landscape of France, claiming cities, monasteries and farms.

In Captain Sonar, you and your team control a high-tech submarine on a mission to track down and destroy the enemy's sub before it can do the same to you. Each player takes on a specific role like Captain, Radio Operator, or Engineer. You must communicate and strategize together in real-time for success. The game can be played turn-by-turn or simultaneously with various maps and challenges. Its unique blend of teamwork and strategy makes every game thrilling.
Torpedoes away! Hunt for your opponent's sub in this exciting, real-time team game.

In John Company: Second Edition, you will take on the role of ambitious families looking to exploit the British East India Company for personal advancement. Set in the early 1700s, you'll collectively manage the Company's fate, but your true goal is to boost your family's prestige. The game is rich in negotiation and strategic maneuvering, as you wrestle with the complexities of imperialism. This unique blend of cooperation and competition makes every decision crucial and intense.
Promise and cajole your way to the top whilst running the East India Company.

In Commands & Colors: Ancients, you step into the role of a military commander during pivotal battles from 3000 BC to 400 AD. This game offers a unique blend of history and strategy, as you maneuver units on a modular hex board using command cards. Each scenario reflects the terrain and forces used in historical battles like Cannae and Zama. You'll need to balance card play, dice-based combat, and strategic thinking as you adapt to varying unit types and battlefield conditions. Victory requires both cunning and flexibility.
Accessible tactical wargame from the dawn of history to the opening of the Dark Age.

In Splendor, you take on the role of Renaissance merchants looking to amass wealth and prestige. Your goal is to acquire gem mines, transportation means, and shops to gain prestige points. During your turn, you collect gem chips, buy development cards, or reserve cards for strategic advantage. Gaining wealth and prestige may even attract visits from nobles. The first to reach 15 prestige points wins, balancing strategy with resource management.
Renaissance merchants race to grab gems, acquire property, and please nobility.

In Suburbia, you aim to transform a small town into a bustling metropolis. Using hex-shaped tiles, you strategically place residential, commercial, and industrial areas to boost your town’s growth. As your town develops, you'll manage your income and reputation, which in turn affect your population. Compete to achieve unique goals and purchase valuable buildings while adjusting your strategy with each play. The player with the largest population wins, ensuring a fresh experience every time.
Expand your meager neighborhood into a sprawling suburb to attract the most citizens.

In Return to Dark Tower, you will step into the shoes of heroic adventurers confronting a resurging darkness. As you gather resources, cleanse buildings, and defeat menacing foes, every decision paves your path to preparing for the ultimate showdown. The game's iconic tower will test your strategy, featuring interactive technology that unveils new mysteries. Whether you collaborate with others or choose to go head-to-head, each session offers a dynamic blend of strategy and surprise.
Cooperative or competitive strategy game pitting heroes against an ominous Tower.

In Village, you will guide a family over generations as they strive for glory in a medieval village. Balance work, travel, and faith as you decide each member’s path. Acquire resources by selecting from different zones, but remember that time is precious, and villagers age. Immortalize them in the village chronicle for lasting honor. Unique to Village is its approach to time management and death, prompting thoughtful choices. Optimize your strategy to ensure your family's legacy.
Send your villagers to work, travel, pray, and... die when it brings the most renown.

In Ankh: Gods of Egypt, you embody ancient Egyptian gods striving to maintain your existence as the old ways fade away. Engage in strategic battles to convert followers and build with caravans. Sumptuous illustrations and detailed miniatures bring the ancient world to life as you summon mythical beasts and outmaneuver your rivals. Victory depends on cunning tactics rather than chance as you compete to become the sole deity remembered by history.
Take the role of Egyptian gods fighting to survive and be remembered.
Dead of Winter: A Crossroads Game <small>(2014)</small>

In Dead of Winter: A Crossroads Game, you take the role of survivors in a struggling colony during a zombie apocalypse. You'll face external threats while managing food, morale, and supplies. Each player leads a group with unique abilities, but also carries secret motives that may conflict with the colony's goals. Can you navigate the shifting alliances and trust issues to ensure survival? With a mix of cooperation and personal objectives, every decision could mean life or death.
As you struggle to keep survivors alive, how will you value group vs. personal needs?

In Tichu, you and your partner aim to empty your hands before your opponents in a compelling climbing card game. Play strategically with a standard 52-card deck, enriched by unique cards like the dog and dragon. Beat the top combination or pass, clearing up when your move holds. Predict your success with a "Tichu" call for big points—but beware, a wrong call costs. Team coordination and sharp tactics drive this race to 1,000 points, offering a dynamic balance of risk and reward.
Be the first team to empty your hands in this popular partnership climbing card game.

In Aeon's End: Legacy, you'll step into the shoes of a young apprentice training to become a breach mage, the last defense against The Nameless. Through an evolving campaign, you'll learn to manage resources, build your deck, and harness unique powers. Work together with up to four players to protect Gravehold, your desperately besieged home. With its legacy mechanics, your decisions will have lasting impacts, making each game session a unique and thrilling experience.
Defend your increasingly desperate home from The Nameless in an evolving campaign.

In Nidavellir, you are tasked with assembling a powerful battalion to defend the Dwarf Kingdom from the dragon Fafnir. Roam the taverns and recruit skilled dwarves, each with unique abilities. Bid your coins wisely each round to gain the best recruits. The game features distinct dwarf classes such as blacksmiths and hunters, each with different scoring strategies. Enhance your coin's value through clever coin-building tactics to outmaneuver rivals and secure victory.
Assemble and prepare a formidable crew of dwarfs to fight the mighty Fafnir!

In The Taverns of Tiefenthal, you will manage and upgrade your own tavern in a quaint village setting. Choose your dice wisely to attract guests and expand your deck of cards. The goal is to draw wealthy customers, earn profits, and enhance the tavern to entice nobles. With a modular setup, the game allows you to gradually add complexity, making each session unique and engaging. Balance your strategy between acquiring money and ensuring a steady flow of beer in this captivating blend of deck-building and dice-rolling.
Construct and upgrade your own tavern in this beer-filled deckbuilding game.

In Star Realms: Colony Wars, you will command a fleet of ten basic ships at the game's onset. Your aim is to expand by acquiring powerful ships and bases, using the Trade you gather. The game features a dynamic trade row with cards that continuously update, offering new strategic options. To win, reduce your opponent's Authority to zero by launching attacks and destroying their bases. This standalone deck-building game also serves as an expansion, adding variety and depth to the Star Realms universe.
Expand your fleet, defend your bases, and prevail in the battle for the colonies.

Paths of Glory is a compelling wargame that immerses you in the strategic battles of World War I. As a player, you'll command either the Central Powers or the Entente Powers. Your cards will determine your moves, allowing operational advances, strategic maneuvers, and key events. With a map spanning Europe and the Near East, you’ll recreate historical events and test your strategic skills. Decision-making is key; every card and move could lead to victory or defeat in this detailed conflict.
Step into the shoes of rulers and generals who triumphed or failed in the Great War.

In YINSH, you will strategically maneuver rings across the board, leaving behind color-changing markers. Your challenge is to align five markers of your color, but be cautious as each successful row reduces your ring count. This creates an intriguing balance between advancing and weakening your position. With its grid movement and dynamic piece-flipping mechanics, YINSH offers an abstract challenge that requires foresight and adaptability. Outplay your opponent by mastering the board's constantly evolving patterns.
Move rings over pieces to flip them, creating rows of five in your color.

In Ticket to Ride, you're on a thrilling journey across North America. Your goal is to collect train cards and claim railway routes connecting cities. Each turn, decide whether to draw cards, claim a route, or pursue more Destination Tickets. The game is easy to understand, making it a favorite for new and experienced players alike. Its large board, vibrant components, and strategic depth provide a captivating experience as you aim to create the longest network.
Build your railroad across North America to connect cities and complete tickets.

In Coimbra, you will lead one of the city's noble houses during Portugal's Age of Discovery. You aim to gain prestige through strategic interactions with influential citizens, nearby monasteries, and bold expeditions. The game features an innovative dice mechanism, where your chosen dice have multiple uses, influencing your strategy and offering countless opportunities. Every game feels fresh with dynamic synergies between citizens, expeditions, and monasteries, ensuring unique challenges each time.
Spread your influence across monasteries of Portugal and beyond!

In Under Falling Skies, you take on the role of defending Earth from alien invaders. As enemy ships fill the skies, you must strategically place dice to power your actions, while managing your underground base. The tension builds as you weigh the benefits of powerful actions against the risk of speeding up enemy descent. Expand your base, deploy robots, and shoot down ships, all while staying mindful of your energy resources. Can you save your city before the mothership arrives?
You alone command the forces of a city holding off invading aliens.

KLASK is a fast-paced magnetic action game for two players. The board resembles a miniature field with goals at each end and magnetic obstacles in the center. You control a magnetic piece using a magnet underneath the board to direct a ball and score by getting it into your opponent's goal. Be careful not to attract the white obstacles or fall into your own goal! It's quick to learn and full of exciting, real-time action. Perfect for parties and family gatherings.
Use magnets to push a ball into the goal, but beware of falling in yourself!

In My City, you will evolve your own city across different ages in this unique legacy board game. You start from the preindustrial era and advance through industrialization over 24 engaging episodes. Each game session personalizes your journey by adding new elements to your board and game. Your decisions in one game impact subsequent sessions for a tailored experience. If you prefer a non-legacy version, enjoy repeatable play with the alternate game board setup unlocked through initial episodes.
Develop your city through the ages in this family-friendly legacy experience.

In Nations, you will guide a civilization from its humble beginnings to the dawn of the 20th century. Compete with others by balancing growth, stability, and innovation while dealing with historical events. Make strategic choices as you buy cards, deploy workers, and build wonders, all leading toward achieving remarkable historic milestones. With a unique blend of indirect interactions and strategic planning, Nations offers an immersive experience without direct combat, challenging you to become the greatest nation.
Steer the fate of your nation, from the ancient world until the outbreak of WW1.

In Near and Far, you embark on an epic adventure with up to three friends to find the mythical Last Ruin. Travel across various maps, each with unique stories and challenges, as you gather adventurers, hunt for treasure, and weave tales of legendary journeys. Equip yourself carefully, as you'll face bandits and strange creatures. The narrative choices you make create a new story each time you play, blending strategic planning with immersive storytelling in your quest to become the most famous traveler.
Explore the lands to discover the Last Ruins and become the most storied traveller.

Secret Hitler is an intense party game of deception and strategy set in the fraught period of 1930s Germany. In this game, you will join either the liberal or fascist team, with one player designated as Secret Hitler. The fascists must strategize to instill distrust and elevate their hidden leader, while the liberals work to uncover and stop him. Each round involves electing a President and Chancellor to enact policies, with intrigue and betrayal always afoot. Will you unmask Secret Hitler in time?
In pre-WW2 Germany, Liberals and Fascists square off in an intrigue-filled parliament

In Calico, you will piece together a beautiful quilt by cleverly selecting and placing colorful patches. Each quilt has specific patterns you need to follow, but the challenge is crafting combinations that are visually delightful and also attract adorable cats to snuggle on them. On your turn, pick a patch tile, sew it into your quilt, and draw a new one. If you group colors well, you earn buttons; if patterns attract cats, they join your quilt. Score points for buttons, cats, and your pattern accuracy.
Sew a quilt, collect buttons, attract cats!

In Endeavor: Deep Sea, you lead a research institute to uncover the secrets of the ocean. As you dive into unexplored depths, you'll develop sustainable projects and work to preserve marine life. Recruit field experts to unlock new locations and publish ecological studies. With streamlined rules from the creators of Endeavor: Age of Sail, you'll focus on building expertise and launching conservation efforts. Each decision you make shapes the future of our oceans, making your mission essential for a sustainable planet.
Lead your research institute to explore ocean depths and publish your findings!

In Cyclades, you are immersed in the world of Ancient Greece, striving to be the first to build two cities in the Cyclades islands. This requires strategic bidding for the favors of the gods, who grant unique abilities each turn. Each god offers distinct powers: expand armies with Ares, control seas with Poseidon, gather priests with Zeus, increase knowledge with Athena, and boost resources with Apollo. You must balance your devotion, as only one god will favor you each turn.
Win the favor of the Gods in this competitive auction, area control game.

In Combat Commander: Europe, you take command as either the Axis or Allies in this tactical World War II board game. Using a deck of "Fate" cards, you activate units, confront opponents, and strive to seize key objectives on the map. Each turn holds unpredictable events that disrupt strategies, ensuring dynamic gameplay. Position your squads, leaders, and weapons to outmaneuver and outwit your adversary in combat scenarios across European battlefields, making each session a unique challenge.
Recreate the European theater of World War II in this acclaimed card-driven wargame.

In Camel Up (Second Edition), you enter the thrilling world of camel racing, where up to eight players bet on camels racing towards the finish line. The game has a unique mechanic where camels can end up stacked on one another, adding a twist to the race. You must carefully decide when to place your bets for a chance at bigger winnings. Using the pyramid dice shaker, you determine which camel moves next, adding an element of unpredictability and excitement. This edition offers new artwork and game modes for a fresh experience.
Place your bets and bend the odds in this crazy camel-stacking race!

In Dinosaur Island, you'll become a dinosaur park manager tasked with collecting DNA and reviving ancient creatures. You'll balance building enclosures, managing security, and creating attractions to draw visitors. Do you create thrilling carnivores to excite your guests, or play it safe with herbivores and rides? This strategy game challenges you to build the most exciting park while keeping visitors safe from dinosaur mishaps. It's all about strategy and a bit of risk-taking.
Clone dinosaurs and build attractions to gain the most excitement.

In Codenames: Duett, you team up with a partner to identify your secret agents among a grid of word cards using one-word clues. Both of you see different aspects of the grid, and your challenge is to communicate effectively without revealing an assassin. Work together, share clues, and use logic and deduction to identify all 15 agents before time runs out. Cooperation and clever thinking are key in this engaging word and deduction game, perfect for two players wanting a collaborative challenge.
Swap one-word coded clues with your partner, trying to identify specific word cards.

In La Granja, you manage a small farm by the picturesque Alpich pond on Mallorca. Across six rounds, you'll expand your farm by planting fields, adding extensions, and hiring helpers. The challenge lies in delivering goods to the market and outsmarting your rivals to claim the title of "La Granja." Use multi-use cards and careful planning to master turn order, while adapting to unexpected events. Success depends on timing, strategy, and coping with uncertainty to score the most victory points.
Develop your farm and compete to deliver goods to the market at the right time.

In Fantastische Reiche, you become the ruler of a fantastical realm, building the mightiest kingdom possible. Craft your strategy by drawing and discarding cards to create powerful combinations. Will you lead with a formidable army, or harness magical powers? The choices are endless and each game is unique. With simple rules, every turn is a chance to enhance your hand and aim for the highest score. As the discard pile grows, the tension builds until the game climaxes in a strategic showdown.
Build the greatest fantasy kingdom by constructing the best hand.

In Century: Golem Edition, you are a caravan leader in the fantastical land of Caravania. Your journey takes you along the golem road, where you trade in vibrant crystals to create magical golems. Each turn, choose one of four actions: establish trade routes, trade or harvest crystals, fulfill demands for victory points, or rest to retrieve your cards. With easy-to-learn mechanics and strategic depth, this game offers endless fun for friends and family. Reach the goal with the most victory points to win!
Snatch up costly crystals and synthesize them to create wondrous golems.
Legendary: A Marvel Deck Building Game <small>(2012)</small>

In Legendary: A Marvel Deck Building Game, you will enter the Marvel Universe, assembling a team of iconic heroes like Spider-Man and Hulk. Choose a mastermind villain such as Loki or Dr. Doom, and adapt to their schemes as you build your deck. Recruit heroes and bolster your fighting abilities to thwart villains before they escape. Experience dynamic gameplay with varied hero decks each time. The semi-cooperative nature means collaborating to prevent the villain’s success, while also competing for points.
Assemble Marvel's finest Heroes to combat Masterminds and thwart their Schemes!

In Hanamikoji, you enter the bustling world of famed Geisha street in the old capital, competing to earn the favor of seven illustrious Geishas. By collecting their preferred performance items, you can gain their favor. Employ strategic hand management and the unique "I Cut, You Choose" mechanic to outmaneuver your opponent. Striking a balance between bold moves and careful speculation, this two-player card game offers deep strategic play set against a backdrop of art and tradition.
Win the favor of the geishas through careful speculation and bold moves.

In Deception: Murder in Hong Kong, you become an investigator working to solve a murder mystery. However, there's a catch: the killer is among you! As forensic evidence is presented, you'll work to piece together the truth, while the murderer and their accomplice attempt to mislead. The forensic scientist knows the solution but can only give cryptic clues. Will you deduce the right information, or be swayed by deceit? Uncover the murderer before they get away in this thrilling social deduction game.
Interpret forensic evidence to solve a murder. Beware, the murderer may be among you!

In "Unmatched: Battle of Legends, Volume 1," you step into the shoes of legendary heroes and villains, each with a unique deck that reflects their mythos. Engage in tactical maneuvers and strategic card play to outwit your opponents on beautifully illustrated battlefields. Master each hero's abilities and face new opponents to test your skills further. With characters like King Arthur and Alice, this game offers endless strategic challenges with dynamic gameplay and stunning visuals.
Heroes and villains of legend (and their sidekicks) fight to the death.

In Sushi Go Party!, you embark on a delightful journey of sushi selection with friends. You'll draft sushi to create the most appetizing combinations and earn points. Featuring over twenty different dishes, each game is a unique culinary experience where you customize your menu. Sushi Go Party! allows for up to eight players, making it a great option for larger gatherings. Enjoy strategizing which sushi to pick while keeping an eye on your friends' collections.
Pass sushi around a bigger table and take the best dishes. Save room for dessert!

In MicroMacro: Crime City, you will dive into a world of hidden mysteries and investigate crimes throughout a bustling city. With a sprawling city map in front of you, your task is to uncover hidden details and trace the movements of suspects across different locations. The game features 16 intriguing cases, each with its own set of clues and questions. Work cooperatively as detectives to piece together the crime story, revealing the full narrative as you solve each case.
Find the small traces to solve the big cases.

In Zombicide: Black Plague, you plunge into an epic battlescape where magic and medieval weaponry meet the undead. You'll cooperate to fend off the zombie hordes unleashed by sinister Necromancers. Take control of heroes like paladins and magicians, each with unique abilities. As you explore modular boards, complete missions, and find powerful artifacts, you’ll decide strategies and use skills—whether casting spells or wielding swords—to survive the apocalypse and restore peace to the land.
Work together to kill zombies in the Middle Ages! Then kill more zombies!

In Samurai, you will step into medieval Japan, vying for the favor of samurai, peasants, and priests. Using strategic tile placement on a hexagonal grid, you aim to surround and claim symbolic figures—helmets, rice paddies, and Buddhas—across the Japanese islands. Your choices between swift attacks and calculated positioning shape your quest for influence. The game ends when all symbols of one type are claimed or ties for influence arise, leading to a tense showdown for control.
Dispute the favor of three different castes in order to unite Japan under your rule.
Isle of Skye: From Chieftain to King <small>(2015)</small>

In Isle of Skye: From Chieftain to King, you'll lead your clan to build a stunning kingdom on the breathtaking landscapes of the Isle of Skye. In this tile-laying game, you decide how much to charge for land tiles each round, balancing greed with strategy. Your kingdom will earn points based on varied scoring conditions chosen for each game, creating endless strategic possibilities. Outmaneuver opponents to assemble the most magnificent kingdom and claim the title of sovereign of the island.
Build your kingdom as Chieftain one tile at a time and rule all of Scotland!

In "Flamme Rouge," you manage a team of two cyclists—a Rouleur and a Sprinteur—competing to cross the finish line first. It's a tactical, fast-paced game where you draw cards to move riders and use slipstreams to avoid exhaustion. Your decisions—whether to lead, stay in the pack, or make a final sprint—determine your team's fate. The versatile board and card management ensure replayability, making every race unique. Can you master the strategy and lead your team to victory?
Riders negotiate the peloton and avoid exhaustion in this card-pedaled Tour de Force.

In Vindication, you find yourself washed ashore on a mysterious island, a chance to reclaim your lost honor.
