Engage in advanced resource management and strategic area control as you explore uncharted lands. You will recruit companions, discover relics, and battle bizarre monsters. Customize your path by selecting actions and combining attributes in unique ways. With a modular board and over 72 distinct abilities, each game offers new challenges and strategies. Will you restore your honor?
Reclaim your honor by defeating monsters and gaining heroic attributes.

In Roll Player, you will craft the ultimate fantasy adventurer, ready to embark on epic quests. Roll and draft dice to enhance your character's attributes, choosing among various races and classes. Buy weapons and armor to equip your hero. Develop essential skills and discover unique traits that prepare you for the journey. Each decision builds your Reputation, and the player with the highest wins. It's a strategic race to perfect your character, blending chance and choice in a medieval fantasy world.
Draft dice and purchase skills, traits and equipment to create the perfect RPG hero.

In The Princes of Florence, you become a Renaissance patron, drawing artisans and scholars to your palazzo to create masterpieces. Across seven rounds, you use auction and tile placement mechanics to build structures and landscapes that appeal to various professions like astronomers or architects. Earn work points to convert to money or victory points, but be strategic; the challenge increases as the minimum required work points rise each round, pushing your strategic and resource management skills.
Attract artisans and scholars to your palazzo by building and landscaping.

In "Glory to Rome," you are tasked with rebuilding Rome after the devastating fire of 64 A.D. Using a deck of multi-use cards, you must choose wisely how each card acts, whether as a building, a resource, or a role to play. You interact with other players by following or choosing roles, creating a dynamic gameplay environment. The game requires strategic card management and clever timing to score points through building and resource collecting, all while competing to restore the city to its former glory.
Build card combos and race to rebuild Rome to become the most influential Patrician.

In Hallertau, you will lead a small Bavarian village to prosperity. As the chief, you manage resources like hops and sheep to supply local craftspeople. The game features a unique worker placement system where spaces become more costly but can be reused, and fields that regain fertility over time. Your tactical card plays and timing are crucial for maximizing benefits. Navigate these challenges to increase your village’s wealth and prestige in the world.
Lead a small town: grow hops, improve workshops, and raise wealth to develop further.

In Western Legends, you step into the boots of a figure from the Wild West. Forge your path as an outlaw, a marshal, or anything in between. You'll explore this sandbox world, take actions like gambling, prospecting, or even robbing banks. Each choice earns Legendary Points, bringing you closer to victory. With various strategies and high player interaction, the game offers an evolving adventure. Engage in duels or keep the peace—the West is your playground.
Become a gun-toting outlaw, or a law-abiding marshal in this Wild West sandbox.

In Andromeda's Edge, you lead a faction to build a new civilization at the galaxy's edge. Starting with a basic space station and a few ships, you'll gather resources, claim moons, and build developments. By placing ships strategically, collect resources or take actions. Engage in dice battles with opponents over strategic regions, and use acquired modules to enhance your station's capabilities. Advance on progress tracks to achieve victory, combining exploration, strategy, and tactical combat.
Factions clash on the edge of the galaxy!

In Pulsar 2849, you will venture into the far reaches of space, exploring the secrets of pulsars and pioneering new technologies. As you roll and draft dice, you’ll harness the pulsars' energy, pilot survey ships, and develop groundbreaking infrastructures. Each round, you'll make strategic decisions on which paths to take, using various actions like flying to new galaxies or advancing your technology. With only 8 rounds, plan wisely to optimize your cosmic ventures and score valuable points.
Draft dice to harness the power of pulsars in the gold rush of a new millenium!

In Hero Realms, you'll dive into a fantasy world where you build your deck from powerful spells, champions, and magical items. Starting with a personal deck of ten cards, use gold to acquire mighty warriors and mystical actions from the shared Market. Strategically play your cards each turn to gain resources and attack your opponents, aiming to reduce their health to zero. With various formats and expansions, you'll find new ways to challenge your skills and explore exciting gameplay dynamics.
Compete head-to-head to create the most powerful deck of spells and minions!

In Kanban: Driver's Edition, you step into the role of ambitious managers in a high-efficiency car factory. Your goal is to impress the board by optimizing supply chains, refining production processes, and innovating car parts. Manage resources smartly, navigate production cycles, and outmaneuver your rivals to climb the corporate ladder. This Eurogame offers a rich blend of action points and worker placement, challenging you to keep operations smooth while striving for the top in a competitive environment.
Car-factory workers optimise and innovate to stand out at the big board meeting.

In Tapestry, you embark on a journey to build a unique civilization from humankind's dawn to futuristic eras. With options to advance in science, technology, exploration, and military, you can choose your path, focusing on one area or balancing your development. As you progress, you'll grow your capital city, enhance your income, and harness unique abilities. Tapestry cards tell your civilization’s story, offering strategic depth. Plan wisely to outshine your competitors and leave a lasting mark.
Lead a unique civilization to greatness through cultural and technological advances.

In Santorini, you will engage in a strategic building competition against other players set on a beautiful Greek island. The goal is to construct and ascend towers, using your builders with each turn. You'll move and build, aiming to reach the third level to claim victory. The unique twist comes from the divine powers each player can use, adding depth and replayability, as you adapt your strategy to the special abilities available. Simple rules and rich gameplay make Santorini perfect for all ages.
Use different divine powers to build and climb the towers!

In Goa: A New Expedition, you will venture into the world of spice trade in the 16th-century Goa, a hub of commerce and exploration. Through strategic auctions and resource management, you will enhance your plantations, upgrade ships, and expand your influence. Each turn, you navigate auctions to outsmart opponents, followed by actions to develop your capabilities. Balance is key; advance in diverse areas to maximize points. Tough decisions and economic mastery await in this engaging game of trade.
Run a spice trade business in colonial-era India in this closed-loop economy game.

In Faraway, you will explore the ever-shifting landscapes of the mystical continent of Alula. As you travel, you lay down cards that represent the regions you visit, aiming to fulfill objectives and gain fame. The challenge lies in the strategic timing of your actions, as each card serves dual purposes: unlocking goals and meeting conditions of previous ones. The game employs a clever system where simultaneous play and card drafting add layers of depth and decision-making. Can you outwit your opponents and emerge as the most renowned explorer?
Explore a mysterious land and fulfill quests on your way back.

In So Kleever!, you and your friends will play a cooperative word-association game where teamwork is key to success. You'll draw Keywords and secretly jot down their shared traits as Clues on your Clover board. Then, put your heads together to guess each player's original Keywords. The goal? Rack up points by guessing correctly and aim to beat your high score every round. Perfect for parties, this engaging game challenges your communication and creativity while keeping everyone involved and entertained.
Work together using one-word clues to disentangle word pairs.

In 1830: Railways & Robber Barons, you'll dive into the cutthroat world of railroads and finance in the eastern United States. Manage companies, trade stocks, and strategically lay tracks on a hexagonal board. With no chance elements, your decisions shape the outcome. Those who master this dynamic stock market will thrive while others are left in their financial wake. The game ends when the bank breaks or a player goes bankrupt, with the wealthiest investor claiming victory.
A classic game of managing railroads and investing wisely.

In Anno 1800: The Board Game, you embark on a journey to develop your home island by building a thriving industry. Through strategic planning of production chains and managing your workforce, you'll satisfy the needs of your growing population—from simple bread to lavish luxury goods. Expand your influence with ship fleets as you trade and discover new islands. The game challenges you to balance growth and satisfy your citizens' ever-increasing demands as you compete to create the most prosperous island.
Fulfill the wishes of your population by producing ever more luxurious goods.

In Galaxy Trucker, you will become a daring spaceship builder using sewer pipes to create a vessel resilient enough to withstand hazardous space adventures. Experience the thrill of real-time construction as you race against the clock and your friends to assemble your ship. Once built, embark on an epic journey through space, encountering pirates, meteor showers, and opportunities to gather valuable cargo. The goal? Earn the most credits by the end of three action-packed rounds. Do you have what it takes to be the ultimate Galaxy Trucker?
Prepare for unknown dangers by building the best spaceship possible.

In Shogun, you become a powerful Daimyo during the Sengoku period of Japan, vying for dominance over the land. Strategically plan your actions and deploy your troops across provinces. Experience unique battles with the intriguing Cube Tower mechanic, where cubes determine combat outcomes. Balance developing your provinces with gaining control of key structures to earn victory points. As you maneuver through the political and military landscape, aim to become the ultimate Shogun.
Gain control of medieval Japan by amassing troops and sending them out to battles.

In Thunder Road: Vendetta, you will enter a high-octane world of chaos on the asphalt. Gather your crew and prepare your vehicles for a thrilling race full of gunfire and destruction. Roll your dice to navigate obstacles and hazards, from oil slicks to wrecked cars. This version introduces dynamic damage effects that send your cars tumbling unpredictably. Strategically assign dice for repairs or boosts and unleash your attack copter. Only the fastest or the last car standing claims victory.
Crews race and shoot to win the race... or be the last car standing.

In "Distilled," you will inherit a distillery, aiming to become a master distiller by crafting fine spirits. This card game combines resource management and push-your-luck elements as you purchase ingredients and upgrade your distillery. Distill and age spirits in your warehouse, adding flavor and readying them for sale. Earn spirit points by creating renowned bottles, and manage your resources wisely to outpace others and claim the title of master distiller.
Purchase goods, upgrade your distillery, and craft the world's finest spirits.

Monikers is a lively party game that challenges your creativity and ability to communicate. You and your teammates guess well-known names through description, single-word clues, and charades. In the first round, you can say anything but the name itself. The second round limits you to one word, while the final round lets your gestures do the talking. It's perfect for a group, testing your improv skills while inviting plenty of laughs and fun moments for all involved.
This curated version of a classic game is guaranteed to create laughs!

In Kemet: Blood and Sand, you are thrust into the heart of Ancient Egypt where you take on the role of a powerful deity. Command your armies and expand your influence using action points and strategic card play. The game features stunning artwork, massive figurines, and a redesigned map that adds new twists. Use your wits to outmaneuver opponents, conquer territories, and claim your rightful place as the supreme god of the desert and the Nile delta. Are you ready to embrace the challenge?
Play as warring Egyptian Gods and build the most powerful army to dominate Egypt.

In Bitoku, you embody a spirit of the forest, striving to become the next great spirit. You'll be assisted by yōkai, kodamas, and pilgrims on this mystical journey. The game features hand management and engine-building, offering multiple paths to victory. You'll tactically use yōkai cards, deploy yōkai guardians as dice for actions, and build structures to advance. Guide lost souls with fireflies and plan in your personal domain for deeper strategy. Will you transcend and achieve enlightenment?
Become the next great spirit of the forest exploring it and helping lost souls.

In Viticulture, you manage a vineyard in pre-modern Tuscany, aiming to create a successful winery. With a few plots, a tiny cellar, and a handful of workers, you will plant vines, harvest grapes, and produce wine across the changing seasons. Strategic worker placement is key, as different tasks are available depending on the time of year, and competition is fierce. Visitors bring unique opportunities, helping you expand and fulfill orders. Balance your resources to become a renowned vintner.
Seasons pass as you develop your vineyard, harvest grapes, make wine and fill orders.

In "1960: The Making of the President," you step into the shoes of either John F. Kennedy or Richard Nixon as you strategize to win the 1960 U.S. presidential election. This card-driven game lets you experience the political pressure and historical events of the time. Use campaign points to secure states, dominate issues, and control the media. Adapt to changing circumstances and make tough decisions to guide your candidate to victory in a uniquely pivotal election year.
Players act as campaign managers in this replay of the 1960 presidential election.

In Tiletum, you become a wealthy merchant in Renaissance Europe, traveling from Flanders to Venice. You'll acquire trade contracts for wool and iron and gather city coats of arms. Craft your strategy to fulfill contracts, build grand cathedrals, win noble favors, and shine at significant fairs. The game's unique dice system lets you rely on them for resources and actions, balancing their power. Choose wisely to gain prestige and become the era's most prominent merchant.
Use dice for resources and actions to gain riches in the Renaissance.
Endless Winter: Überlebe Die Letzte Eiszeit <small>(2022)</small>

In "Endless Winter: Überlebe Die Letzte Eiszeit," you will guide your tribe through the challenges of surviving the last Ice Age in North America around 10,000 BCE. Develop your tribe from nomadic hunter-gatherers to thriving societies. Engage in strategic gameplay with a unique blend of worker placement and deck building. Migrate to new territories, build megaliths, and establish cultural traditions. With multiple paths to victory, each round offers dynamic interactions and decisions.
Settle new lands, grow your population, and build megaliths - in an endless winter.

In Mind MGMT: The Psychic Espionage "Game.", you will dive into a world of intrigue and hidden movements. Play as the mind-controlling recruiter, gathering psychic recruits across a secret map, or band together as rogue agents to stop them. Uncover locations, ask insightful questions, and use mental notes to piece together the recruiter's path. Can your team of rogue agents deduce the recruiter's location before it's too late? An intense battle of wits awaits in a gripping psychic showdown.
Psychic rogue agents team up to track down the Recruiter in Zanzibar.

In Skull King, you embark on a pirate adventure where predicting your success is key. Throughout ten rounds, you reveal how many tricks you believe you'll win, adding a strategic twist to classic trick-taking mechanics. The unique simultaneous bidding keeps the tension high as you aim to hit your exact number of tricks to score points. Special cards like the Skull King and Mermaid add excitement, as they can unexpectedly turn the tide of any round. Outwit your opponents and become the ultimate pirate of the high seas!
Trick-taking on the high seas. Meet your bid to please the Skull King.

In Detective: A Modern Crime Board Game, you step into the shoes of an investigator in the Antares National Investigation Agency. Engage in solving five interconnected cases using both classical detective skills and modern tools. Utilize the game's online database to explore evidence, uncover connections, and collaboratively piece together mysteries with your team. The unique mix of card-based gameplay and narrative storytelling creates an immersive experience, making you feel like a real detective on a challenging mission.
Collaborate in an FBI unit to solve cases using high-tech & traditional techniques.

In Lewis & Clark: The Expedition, you will lead a team across the North American continent, racing to reach the Pacific first. Manage your characters and resources wisely, as each decision matters. You can enlist the help of Native Americans and trappers for your Corps of Discovery. The game features a unique card mechanic where a card must be linked with another, creating a dilemma of use or sacrifice. Timing and strategic use of actions are key to winning.
Explorers race from Missouri to Oregon, asking local Native American tribes for help.

In Sea Salt & Paper, you dive into a vibrant ocean world, crafting winning sets of origami-themed cards. Throughout your turn, you carefully pick cards to build a potent hand, playing them strategically to trigger powerful effects and combos. The real intrigue comes as you decide whether to end the round, aiming to catch your opponents unprepared, or to let it continue, risking others closing the gap. Reach the target score to win, balancing risk and reward in this charming set collection card game.
A few delicate Origami-style illustrations and a whole marine universe comes to life!

In Aeon's End: The New Age, you embark on thrilling expeditions with a team of mages, venturing into battles against ever-powerful nemeses. This standalone expansion introduces the Expedition system, offering a campaign format that enhances replayability. As you progress, discover new treasures and cards, strengthening your abilities. The game seamlessly integrates with previous editions, allowing you to mix and match content for varied gameplay. With strategic deck-building and cooperation, face the breach together.
Take a crew of mages on Expeditions to face monstrosities from beyond the Breach.

In Marvel United, you become iconic Marvel heroes working together to thwart a Villain's intricate scheme. Each game presents a unique challenge as the Villain unveils different effects and threats across various locations. With your own deck of cards, you'll tactically decide which actions and superpowers to use, while coordinating with fellow heroes to achieve the impossible. Unite your abilities, build your story, and save the day in this strategic cooperative adventure.
Cooperate as Marvel Heroes to stop the Villains' master plans!

In Bora Bora, you will explore a vibrant island world, building huts and establishing your tribes. With clever use of dice, manage limited actions each turn to gather resources, place offerings for the gods, and expand your influence. Carefully balance your dice rolls and strategy to block opponents while maximizing your growth. Use task and god tiles for guidance and special advantages, aiming to achieve the most effective plan to lead your tribe to victory.
Balance difficult choices and seek glory on an island paradise.

In Star Realms: Frontiers, you'll dive into the thrilling world of space battles and strategic gameplay. As a standalone game in the Star Realms series, you can play solo, cooperatively, or take on up to three friends. Utilize an 80-card trade deck to acquire new Ships and Bases, enhancing your fleet and combat abilities. Focus on factions for powerful combos, and aim to reduce your opponents' Authority to zero. Perfect for fans of deck-building games, it offers flexibility and intense interactivity.
Expand your fleet, explore new frontiers, and impose your authority over your rivals.

In Chronicles of Crime, you dive into a world of detective work where you uncover mysteries using both a board game and an app. As investigators, you will scan QR codes to gather clues, interrogate suspects, and explore crime scenes. Every scenario presents a unique story, and with new updates, fresh cases are always available. The optional VR component adds an immersive dimension, making your sleuthing experience more engaging. Take on the challenge and solve the mysteries in record time!
Lay out the case, interrogate suspects, and investigate crime scenes with your phone.

In Oath: Chronicles of Empire & Exile, you will shape the history of an ancient realm, choosing to either support the current ruling powers or to sow chaos and rebellion. As you engage in strategic diplomacy and tactical warfare, the outcomes of your games will influence future sessions, altering available resources and objectives. Each playthrough immerses you in a living narrative without scripted endings, allowing the history and legacies you create to endure and evolve uniquely with your group.
Change the course of history as empires rise and fall and your tale becomes legend.

In Kingdomino, you become a lord seeking to expand your realm by acquiring tiles with various terrains like wheat fields, lakes, and mountains. You'll connect these domino-shaped tiles to form a kingdom, carefully matching terrains for maximum points. The twist lies in selecting tiles, as better choices delay your next turn. Build a 5x5 grid and compete to create the most valuable layout with strategic placement. It's a quick and engaging game perfect for families.
Build a kingdom with varied terrains on domino-shaped tiles in this fast family game.

In Battle Line, you will engage in a strategic duel, aiming to outmaneuver your opponent by creating stronger formations along a dynamic front. The goal is to capture five out of nine flags—or three consecutive ones—by assembling poker-style card combinations that triumph over your opponent's. With the inclusion of tactics cards, you can introduce unexpected twists, making each match a test of wit and adaptability. Face exhilarating challenges and see if you can dominate the ever-shifting battle line.
Mobilize stronger formations to counter the enemy along an ever-changing battle-line.

In "Steam," you build railroads and transport goods along a dynamic network of tracks. As you lay track and upgrade towns, you also enhance your train and choose the best goods for delivery. Manage your income and victory points as you navigate the competitive world of rail logistics. The game features a double-sided map ideal for 3 to 5 players, depicting early railway America and Europe. "Steam" offers strategic depth with multiple maps and expansions for varied gameplay.
Rival railways compete to build networks and maximise profits by transporting goods.

In Foundations of Rome, you step into the role of an ambitious architect competing to shape the eternal city. Strategize as you buy lots, construct majestic buildings, and expand your influence. With 96 intricate miniatures, bring the grandeur of Rome to life, vying for glory as you earn points through population and commerce. The game offers quick setup and straightforward rules, making it easy to dive into the intricacies of city building and outmaneuver your rivals.
Construct buildings, vie for city lots, and compete to shape the city of Rome.

In Astrobienen, you explore a universe where hyper-intelligent bees, the Mellifera, venture into space. Command one of twenty unique factions, managing a hive with your worker bees. This worker-placement game challenges you to discover new planets, gather resources, and develop technologies. Your skill in carving your faction's strengths into the cosmos is key, as you must maximize actions before hibernation arrives. Will your hive thrive against time's flow?
Hyper-intelligent bees take to outer space to build, explore, and grow.

In Turing Machine, you dive into the world of codebreaking with a unique analog experience. Armed with an innovative proto-computer using perforated cards, you'll race against others to deduce the secret code. Turing Machine offers a plethora of challenges, from simple to complex, ensuring endless gameplay. Whether you compete with friends or challenge yourself solo, the game sharpens your logic and deduction skills. It's more than a game; it's a journey into the genius of codebreaking.
Crack codes using a real analog computer.

In Hive, you will engage in a strategic duel using a swarm of insects to surround your opponent's Queen Bee. With no board or setup required, the game is played on any flat surface, using the pieces themselves to create the play area. Each of the twenty-two tiles resembles a unique creature with distinct movements. The goal is to completely enclose the opposing Queen while protecting your own, making each move a tactical decision in this portable and quick-to-learn game.
Use your insects to trap your opponent's Queen Bee in this board-less abstract game.

In Rococo, you step into the world of elegant balls during the reign of Louis XV. As a master tailor, you will craft exquisite coats and stunning dresses, all while managing your team of employees who bring unique skills to the table. Your goal is to gather resources, hire the right staff, and design the finest outfits for the grand event, all while investing in the event's decorations. Strategic planning and clever decision-making will earn you prestige points. Will your designs outshine the competition at the ball?
Make dresses for a prestigious ball while managing your deck of employees!

In Cryptid, you become a cryptozoologist eager to uncover the truth behind a mysterious creature. Using limited clues, it's your task to deduce its location without revealing too much to your rivals. The game involves a unique combination of deduction and deceit, where each player possesses vital information. Navigate the modular board and use your wits to gather more clues while misleading others. With various setups, Cryptid offers endless puzzles and challenges. Be the first to claim the glory of discovery!
Be the first to locate the cryptid through pure deduction and subtle deception.

In Ethnos, you will lead tribes of giants, merfolk, halflings, and others to dominate the regions of a fantasy world. Across three ages, your aim is to score the most glory by strategically assembling and playing cards. Choose your allies wisely, since each card's tribe or color will influence your placement in the regions. As you deploy bands of allies, leverage unique powers from your tribe leaders. With set collection and area control, Ethnos blends planning and luck for exciting battles.
Call upon unique fantasy tribes to gain control of the land and earn glory.

In Forgotten Waters, you will become a pirate navigating through a whimsical world filled with adventure and magic. As you sail the seas, you'll try to fulfill your own ambitions while working towards a shared goal with your crew. Every decision you make can lead to unexpected and hilarious outcomes, encouraging you to explore every corner of this fantastical realm. With five scenarios and a rich location book, this semi-cooperative game offers endless choices and a unique storytelling experience.
Seek fortune and infamy in a fantastical world of piratical misadventure.

In T.I.M.E Stories, you are part of a team of time-traveling agents tasked with saving the world from temporal paradoxes. Each mission sends you into different realities, where you inhabit other beings and navigate their worlds. Through "decksploration," you uncover stories and solve puzzles. Your goal is to optimize your turns to complete missions efficiently, while the replayability and narrative depth keep each session unique. Balance cooperation and strategy to master the time loops and perfect your runs.
Protect the world from paradoxes with your team of time-traveling agents.
Dice Throne: Season Two – Battle Chest <small>(2018)</small>

In Dice Throne: Season Two – Battle Chest, you will engage in thrilling battles where your strategic card play meets dynamic dice rolling. Select from a diverse lineup of powerful heroes, each bringing unique abilities to the fight. Engage in various matchups, either head-to-head or in teams, as you roll dice to attack opponents, activate skills, and earn combat points. Use those points to enhance your hero, apply status effects, or manipulate the game in your favor. This game introduces new heroes and exciting gameplay options.
A Player Vs Player dice dueling game.

In Cthulhu Wars, you will take on the role of one of the powerful alien factions and ancient gods from the Cthulhu mythos. On a sprawling map of Earth, you'll gather power, summon monsters, recruit cultists, and awaken Great Old Ones to battle for domination. Each faction has unique strategies and abilities, offering a variety of ways to claim victory. The aim is to complete your tasks, acquire spell books, and accumulate points on the Doom Track to outmaneuver your opponents and rule the remnants of Earth.
Armageddon came. Humanity fell. Which Elder God will rule the last remains of Earth?

In Dixit: Odyssey, you'll dive into a world of imagination and creativity. Each turn, you become the storyteller, crafting a hint to describe one of your surreal cards. Be subtle yet intriguing; too clear or too vague and you might miss points. The other players offer cards that match your clue, and everyone votes on which card they think is yours. With beautiful art and endless possibilities, Dixit: Odyssey is perfect for gatherings, accommodating up to 12 players with team and variant rules for extra fun.
Don’t be too vague or precise when describing beautifully surreal art.

In Seasons, you will step into the shoes of powerful sorcerers competing in a grand tournament over three years across the mystical Argos forest. The game begins with drafting a deck of nine cards that shape your strategy. As seasons change, roll dice to acquire resources, summon mythical creatures, and harness magical items. Manage your cards wisely and adapt to seasonal shifts to collect crystals, which act as victory points. The player with the highest score at the end of twelve seasons becomes the new archmage.
Mages compete across twelve seasons to collect crystals and become the new archmage.

In Love Letter, you try to win the heart of the noble Princess by delivering your message through those close to her. Using a variety of characters, each with their own abilities, you must outmaneuver your opponents. Play strategically and employ deduction as you send your letter in secret. The game mixes clever card play with strategic bluffing. This edition includes charming new artwork and added characters, allowing for games with up to six players. Gather favor tokens to win and become her confidant.
Help sneakily maneuver your love letter to the Princess—or to those closest to her.

In Long Shot: The Dice Game, you'll step into the thrilling world of 1930's horse racing. This engaging game allows up to eight players to experience the excitement of the racetrack by placing bets, buying horses, and influencing jockeys. As the dice roll, you'll strategize and adjust your plans, utilizing special abilities to gain the upper hand. The dynamic race continues until three horses cross the finish line, and the player with the most earnings wins. Will you play it safe, or take a risk on a long shot?
Bet, buy horses, and influence jockeys for cash in an exciting 1930's era horse race.

In Telestrations, you will take on the challenge of sketching a word given by a roll of the dice and then passing your drawing to the next player. As time runs out, the drawing goes around the table, turning into a game of visual whispers. Each player tries to interpret and reproduce what they see, leading to hilarious misinterpretations. With erasable sketchbooks, markers, and a variety of words, it's always a new laugh-inducing experience. Perfect for parties, Telestrations is all about creativity and fun.
Guess what they drew, then draw what they guessed, and see how funny the changes get.

In The Witcher: Old World, you become a witcher exploring a realm teeming with danger and opportunity. Set before Geralt's stories, you train at one of five witcher schools, preparing to face fearsome monsters and rival witchers. As you travel the Continent, engage in quests and make tough choices. Build a deck with powerful attacks, dodges, and spells, aiming to craft devastating combos. To win, collect trophies by defeating monsters, winning brawls, or mastering your skills.
Explore the Continent, upgrade your skills, and fight monsters/witchers for trophies.

In Arcadia Quest, you take the lead of a guild of three unique heroes in a bid to reclaim the city of Arcadia. Battle against rival guilds and the monstrous forces occupying the city in a thrilling campaign for dominance. Each scenario presents quests that require smart tactics and daring strategies. As you progress, you'll unlock exclusive abilities and gear, ensuring each playthrough is unique. With modular scenarios, you'll chart your path through the campaign, making each decision critical.
Fight against rival guilds and monsters in a campaign to reclaim the city of Arcadia.

In "Imperium: Klassik", you will guide one of eight unique civilizations to greatness. Whether you choose the mighty Romans or the fierce Vikings, you must navigate threats and expand your empire. Develop scientific and cultural achievements while managing unrest to avoid the downfall of your civilization. With deck-building mechanics and asymmetric powers, every game is a new strategy challenge. Play solo or compete against others, and see if you can leave a mark on history.
Compete to become the most dominant empire the world has ever seen!

In Arkham Horror (Third Edition), you find yourself in 1926 during the height of the Roaring Twenties. As an investigator, you'll work with others in a cooperative effort to prevent the rise of the Ancient Ones, cosmic evils lurking beyond our dimension. You'll gather clues, face terrifying monsters, and use unique abilities and tools to tackle the horrors threatening Arkham. The modular board and dice-driven events create a dynamic and suspenseful experience, immersing you in the mysterious and terrifying world based on H.P. Lovecraft's writings.
Piece the clues together to stop the horrors before your sanity shatters.

In Onitama, you will harness the power of animal spirits on a 5x5 board to outmaneuver your opponent. This two-player game offers perfect information with each player starting with five pawns. You have two open cards showing possible moves, while a fifth card awaits to be used once you decide. Strategically swap cards to adapt your tactics. Control the center and capture your foe's main pawn or occupy their starting space to claim victory. Simple yet strategic, Onitama challenges your mind and reflexes.
Assert your martial prowess by harnessing the power of various animal spirits.

In Lost Cities, you embark on thrilling archaeological expeditions by playing cards in ascending order. With five colored suits, you invest in expeditions using cards ranked from 2 to 10, along with special handshakes that multiply your gains. Each journey starts at a cost of -20 points, so you'll need strategy to ensure profitability. The game is a mix of luck and skill, and by planning carefully, you can outscore your opponent. With simple rules, it’s perfect for a fun yet strategic two-player showdown.
Set out on expeditions, but will your findings outweigh the cost of each adventure?

In The Manhattan Project: Energy Empire, you will lead a nation into the atomic age, striving for power through industrial, commercial, and governmental advancements. Develop infrastructure by managing resources and energy sources like nuclear, coal, and solar. Employ worker placement and resource management mechanics to build your nation's economy while minimizing pollution. Use science to mitigate industrial impacts and global crises in this standalone game where energy is key.
Build power plants, not bombs, in this standalone sequel to The Manhattan Project.

In Indonesia, you will navigate the vibrant economic landscape of the Indonesian archipelago. Compete with other business moguls to build a profitable empire by acquiring production companies that specialize in rice, spices, rubber, oil, and more. You'll also manage shipping routes to deliver these goods to burgeoning cities. Balance strategy and timing to outsmart your opponents and become the wealthiest player by the end of the third era. Careful investment and cunning mergers are key.
Produce and ship goods in a dynamic economic ecosystem in the Indonesian archipelago.

In Imperial, you'll step into the shoes of an international investor during Europe's age of imperialism. Manipulate the politics of major powers like Austria-Hungary and Great Britain by purchasing bonds, effectively controlling their decisions. As nations expand by building factories and deploying armies, your savvy investments and strategic alliances will determine your success. The game offers in-depth strategy without the randomness of dice, demanding calculated moves to dominate the fluctuating political landscape.
Invest in imperialist powers to extract wealth by industrialization and expansion.

In Navegador, you will step into the era of the Portuguese Age of Discoveries, exploring unknown seas and expanding your trade empire. Begin with just two ships and a few workers, then embark on voyages to establish colonies, trade goods, and build impactful infrastructure like factories and shipyards. Employ a strategic rondel system to plan your moves efficiently. Master the art of navigating this historical journey to cleverly combine resources and privileges, aiming to outwit your opponents and claim victory.
Sail to unexplored lands while managing your trade in the Portuguese Colonial Empire.

In For Sale, you will dive into the fun world of real estate, where the aim is to buy low and sell high. The game unfolds in two phases: first, you participate in bidding wars for valuable properties, planning your strategy to outwit your competitors. Then, as the market shifts, sell those properties to earn hefty profits. Easy to learn and quick to play, it's ideal for families and gatherings. The strategic bidding and selling make every game dynamic and exciting.
What's your bid? Bid on promising property bundles, then sell properties for checks.

In Cloudspire, you control one of four unique factions, vying for control of an island in the mystical skies of Ankar. Inspired by tower defense and MOBA games, you must strategically build towers, deploy your armies, and lead heroic quests. Recruit mercenaries, acquire resources, and safeguard your base. As you contend with enemy forces and unpredictable events, adapt and upgrade your capabilities to secure victory. With solo and cooperative modes, explore diverse strategies in this epic battle for power.
Use towers, minions, and heroes to help your faction claim an island in the sky.

In Summoner Wars (Second Edition), you take on the role of a powerful summoner controlling a unique army on the war-torn world of Itharia. Engage in strategic battles, summoning units to outmaneuver your opponent and defeat their summoner before they defeat yours. With numerous units, spells, and abilities, along with deck-building options, each game is a fresh challenge. Enjoy updated factions and new characters, with gameplay available both in person or online.
The fight for Itharia is on! Defeat the enemy summoner before they cut yours down.

In Dungeon Petz, you will lead a family of imps as they dive into the quirky business of raising and selling magical pet monsters. Balancing creature care, contests, and sales, you use unique worker placement mechanics to meet the ever-growing demands of the petz while competing with others. Manage your imps wisely to nurture creatures from cute cubs into impressive beasts sought after by Dungeon Lords. Engage in a humorous yet strategic adventure where timing, planning, and humor mix.
Raise monstrous pets and sell them to demanding Dungeon Lords for fame and fortune.

In "The Great Zimbabwe", you will become a tribal leader in ancient Africa, building a trade-based civilization. You'll create a network of supply lines and produce ritual goods to construct impressive monuments in honor of your chosen god. Balancing technology, resource management, and worship, you must outsmart opponents in this strategico-economical race. Strategic decision-making and efficient logistics will bring you closer to victory, but beware of your rivals' moves!
Plot out supply lines and build monuments to impress the African god of your choice.

In Dorfromantik: The Board Game, you immerse yourself in a serene world of picturesque landscapes. Collaboratively, you and your friends will place hexagonal tiles to craft rivers, forests, and villages. Strive to meet the needs of the villagers, extend tracks and rivers, and maximize points from enclosed areas. As you succeed, you'll unlock new challenges and tiles in an ongoing campaign, providing a fresh experience each time you play. It's a charming journey for the whole family.
Experience the peaceful and relaxed atmosphere of the video game on your table.

In Acquire, you take on the role of an investor in a world of growing businesses. You'll strategically place tiles to expand companies and merge them, aiming to hold the majority of stocks for lucrative bonuses. As companies merge, you decide whether to cash in your stocks or exchange them for shares in the larger businesses. The game is a thrilling race to amass the most wealth. Its engaging mechanics and strategic depth have kept players captivated since 1964.
Invest, divest, and stage hostile takeovers in this classic real estate game.

In Cat in the Box, you'll dive into a quantum twist on trick-taking. Each game for 2 to 5 players defies traditional rules: the color of your cards isn't decided until you play them. You'll predict how many tricks you'll win and place tokens on a shared board to boost your score. Remember to strategize; claiming a color already taken creates a paradox, costing points. With vibrant components and engaging mechanics, this game challenges your intuition and foresight in a unique, colorful way.
Win tricks without knowing the colour of your cards until you play them.

In Space Alert, you assume the role of a crew member on a small spaceship exploring dangerous galaxy sectors. Missions last just 10 minutes in real time, where you must protect your ship against threats like battleships, monsters, and asteroids. The game requires you to coordinate actions such as moving, firing, and distributing energy to survive. It’s a cooperative experience for 1-5 players, blending real-time challenges with strategic planning. Each game session is quick, intense, and highly engaging.
This ship runs itself! Wait, why are our shields down and where did you go? Help us!

In Love Letter, you will enter the enchanting world of the kingdom of Tempest, aiming to win the heart of Princess Annette. Using a deck of just 16 cards, you must strategically outmaneuver your opponents by drawing and playing cards to eliminate rivals or directly deliver your love letter. It's a clever mix of deduction, risk, and luck, as you balance between playing powerful cards and staying under the radar. Simple yet strategic, Love Letter offers a captivating challenge for 2 to 4 players.
Can you get a letter to the princess or remove all your rivals? You win either way!
Age of Empires III: The Age of Discovery <small>(2007)</small>

In Age of Empires III: The Age of Discovery, you step into the shoes of a colonial power during the age of exploration. Your mission is to explore the New World, sending out diverse units such as merchants, soldiers, and monks. You will engage in trade, establish colonies, and build important capital structures to gain an edge over rivals. Strategy is key as you navigate through economic development, territory control, and occasional warfare while aiming for ultimate glory.
Send monks, merchants, soldiers, & more to explore, settle, & battle in the New World

In Power Grid Deluxe: Europe/North America, you'll experience strategic gameplay as you manage resources and build expansive networks to power cities across Europe and North America. Navigate through auctions, acquire power plants, and optimize your resource usage. Upgrade your plants with coal, oil, natural gas, or uranium, and strive for efficiency while keeping your network expanding. Careful planning and competition make it essential to outwit your opponents and become the ultimate power supplier.
Manage resources, build networks and supply the most cities with power.

As an explorer in "Reisende des Südtigris", you will embark from Baghdad during the Abbasid Caliphate to map lands, waterways, and stars. Each turn, manage your caravan, utilize workers for exploration, upgrade your equipment, and report your findings back to the House of Wisdom. The race to impress the Caliph is on as you chart your discoveries with care and earn victory points. Navigate the strategies of player interaction, utilizing open drafting and tile placement to gain influence and fame.
Explore the waterways, map the land, and chart the stars in medieval Baghdad.
The King Is Dead: Second Edition <small>(2020)</small>

In "The King Is Dead: Second Edition," you navigate the chaos following the king's demise in medieval Britain. As rival factions—the Scottish, Welsh, and English—compete for supremacy, you must strategically influence the power struggle with limited resources. Whether you strengthen alliances or manipulate opponents, your goal is to ensure that the dominant faction aligns with your interests. This edition offers enhanced graphics, new artwork, and an asymmetric mode for an engaging experience.
A subtle game of shifting power and control over medieval Britain.

In "Survive: Escape from Atlantis!", you will race to evacuate your people from a sinking island before it's too late. The island is composed of tiles that slowly disappear, and you'll need to move your pieces, each with different values, to surrounding safe islands. Navigate dangerous waters teeming with sharks, whales, and sea monsters. Use your action points wisely to outmaneuver opponents and reach safety. The game's combination of strategy, risk-taking, and memory makes it an exciting adventure.
Sharks, whales, and sea monsters, oh my! Hurry and escape before Atlantis disappears!

In "Imperial Settlers," you will guide a faction of Romans, Barbarians, Egyptians, or Japanese to build a sprawling empire. With strategic card play, you construct buildings and gather resources to expand your realm. The land is limited, heightening the tension as you clash with neighbors over territory. Manage your cards to unleash powerful actions, trade, and ultimately outmaneuver your rivals over five engaging rounds for victory. A blend of strategy and conflict awaits in this unique card-based civilization game.
Construct buildings, harvest resources, and attack your neighbor!

In Tikal, you will lead an expedition deep into the dense jungles of Central America in search of hidden temples and ancient treasures. As you explore, you unveil new areas of the jungle, discovering temples that can be excavated further to reveal their secrets. Collect and protect treasures to score points. The modular board and strategic decisions make each journey unique. Manage your action points wisely to outmaneuver your rivals and become the most successful explorer.
Strategically create pathways through jungle, collect treasure, and excavate temples.

In Die Glasstraße, you will experience the tradition of glass-making in the Bavarian Forest. Master the art of balancing glass and brick production while strategically managing your resources. Select from fifteen specialists to execute your plans, and be mindful of what your opponents choose, as duplications limit actions. You build processing buildings, one-time effect structures, and earn bonus points for end-game achievements. The key is to play the right specialist at the right moment, turning your glass production into a flourishing trade empire.
Clear the land, hire specialists, build and gather to make your own trade empire.

In Century: Spice Road, you become a leader of a caravan traveling along the historic silk road. Your goal is to strategically trade and upgrade your spices to fulfill requirements on victory point cards and earn glory. Each turn, choose among four actions to plan your path to victory. Gather resources, trade strategically, and fulfill demands quickly, as the game ends when a player claims their fifth victory point card. With straightforward mechanics and a focus on clever resource management, this game offers a rich experience.
Grow and trade spices and use them to gain estate.

In The King's Dilemma, you become the leader of a powerful house in the kingdom of Ankist. This narrative-driven legacy game invites you to make tough decisions as part of the King's council. Each session, a new dilemma card presents you with a moral and political challenge. You must debate, vote, and sometimes bribe your way to influence the kingdom's future. Balancing your house's ambitions with the welfare of the realm, your choices lead to branching storylines and multiple possible endings.
Leaders join in council to vote on the kingdom’s issues, but with hidden motives!

In Bunny Kingdom, you lead a clan of rabbits striving to expand their influence across a vibrant land. You'll draft cards to strategically place warrens on a 100-square grid, gathering resources and building cities to boost your score. Settle in diverse regions to collect water, grow carrots, and uncover rare riches. Secretly recruit rabbit lords and masters to enhance your assets. Manage your territory wisely to gain the most points by the game's end after four rounds. Will your rabbits reign supreme?
Adorable bunnies build cities, harvest carrots, and go on missions to be "Big Ears!"

In Nemo's War (Second Edition), you embark on an epic journey as Captain Nemo aboard the Nautilus. Set in 1870, this game lets you explore the seas with scientific missions, battles, and adventures against Imperial powers. With a focus on story-driven gameplay, you will use action points to navigate oceans, engage in dice-rolling combat, and make strategic decisions. Designed mainly for solo play, it also offers cooperative and competitive modes for up to 4 players.
Sail the Seven Seas as the hardened captain Nemo, fighting the Imperialist powers.

In the game Fury of Dracula, you will pursue the legendary vampire across Europe, working together as hunters to track him down. The game combines hidden movement and tense deduction as you try to anticipate Dracula's moves. During the day, you take action to gather resources and information, while at night, Dracula strikes. With streamlined combat and intricate strategies, you must outsmart Dracula before his influence over Europe becomes too great. Will you save the continent, or will Dracula elude you?
Dracula is attacking! Or is it a trick while he hides? Track him down to find out.

In Chinatown, you dive into the bustling world of New York City's famed district, vying to become the most successful entrepreneur. Through strategic negotiation, you'll acquire and trade property rights, place business tiles, and complete profitable ventures. Balancing random resources and skillful deals is crucial to thrive. As businesses grow, payouts increase, driving fierce competition among players. Will your negotiation skills lead to triumph in the vibrant streets of Chinatown?
Negotiate and build the most successful business in all of Chinatown!

In Brügge, you'll step into the shoes of 15th-century merchants in a bustling Belgian city. As commerce thrives, you'll compete to establish influence, power, and prestige. Use versatile character cards to build canals, manage threats, and hire unique townsfolk. Each action you take brings you closer to victory. Balance your resources wisely as you navigate unexpected challenges that threaten your prosperity, aiming to become the most esteemed merchant in the city.
Vie for influence, manage threats, build, and employ the unique denizens of the city!

In Heaven & Ale, you lead an ancient monastery and its brewery, aiming to craft the finest beer. You'll strategically place tiles in your garden to manage resources and monks, all while keeping an eye on your brewmaster. Balancing upgrades and harvesting is key to success. The game combines tile placement and strategic movement on a rondel, challenging you to optimize your moves. With careful planning, you'll outbrew others in this thoughtful game of timing and resource management.
Harvest beer ingredients and master the art of monastic brewcrafting.

In Tiny Epic Galaxies, you command a galactic empire seeking to expand its influence across the cosmos. By rolling dice, you take actions like moving spaceships, gathering resources, or exerting influence on new planets. The game's unique mechanic allows opponents to follow your actions by spending resources, keeping everyone engaged. Plan your moves wisely to colonize planets, gain victory points, and unlock special abilities. The key to success lies in strategic resource management and timing.
Roll your dice and colonize planets, utilizing your energy and culture.

In Imperial 2030, you become a shrewd international investor in a world where global powers vie for dominance. Instead of controlling countries directly, you'll influence their politics by investing in them. The world powers take turns, and your money dictates their actions. Control over a nation can shift with every investment, so choosing where to invest is key. With new features like the Swiss Bank and strategic canals, the game challenges you to focus on the most profitable opportunities.
Use money to manipulate countries into warring with each other for your own profit.

In Summoner Wars: Master Set, you'll step into the shoes of a powerful Summoner on the war-ravaged planet of Itharia. Armed with mystical Summoning Stones, you'll call forth armies from six distinct factions, like the cunning Shadow Elves or the mighty Vargath. Use magical spells and strategic tactics to outsmart your opponent on the battlefield as you summon warriors, cast spells, and deploy troops on a grid-based map. The aim? To defeat the rival Summoner and claim victory in an epic clash of magic and might.
Harness the magic! Summon your warrior hordes onto the field of battle.

In "Awkward Guests: The Walton Case," you step into the shoes of a detective to solve Mr. Walton's murder. The game offers endless re-playability with its unique mix of deduction and card trading. Investigate by questioning suspects, checking clues, and consulting police reports. You exchange essential information with other players while keeping suspects in the dark. The first to uncover the Who, How, and Why of the murder wins. Prepare for a thrilling mystery-solving experience!
Mr. Walton will be murdered—repeatedly! Uncover the clues to figure out who did it.

In Nusfjord, you will step into the role of a major fishing company owner set in a picturesque northern Norwegian village. Your mission is to develop the harbor and surrounding landscape by expanding your fleet, clearing forests, and constructing buildings. Clever manipulation of worker placement is key, with strategic decision-making essential as you navigate the limited spaces and scarce resources. Balance gaining wealth with keeping the local elders satisfied to thrive in this unique, economic challenge.
Use your three workers to clear trees, build a harbor, and fish in northern Norway.

In Destinies, you will embark on a journey through a dark medieval-fantasy world filled with intriguing stories and mysteries. This competitive board game combines traditional gameplay with modern app support, eliminating the need for a game master. Through Scan&Play technology, you explore the world, uncover new tiles, and interact with NPCs in meaningful ways. Your goal is to fulfill your destiny by completing quests, choosing paths, and making impactful decisions that shape the narrative and the world.
Characters explore a medieval-fantasy land as they race to fulfill their destiny.

In Project L, you will dive into a world of triple-layer 3D puzzles using sleek acrylic pieces. Starting with a modest set of shapes, you'll strategically expend three actions each turn to build a stronger engine, enabling you to tackle more complex puzzles. Complete these to earn points or acquire new pieces, steadily improving your collection. This game, with its elegant design and engaging gameplay, challenges you to outsmart your friends while relishing the satisfaction of perfecting your strategy.
Der Herr der Ringe: Das Kartenspiel – Neuauflage <small>(2022)</small>

In the revised edition of "The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game", you embark on an epic cooperative adventure in Middle-earth. Team up with heroes to face challenging scenarios, utilizing strategic deck construction and hand management to succeed. This core set introduces a new campaign mode and supports up to four players, allowing you to experience the story together. With added Boon and Burden mechanics, each scenario carries lasting consequences, deepening the narrative experience.
Revised core set repackages the original with support for 1-4p and a new campaign.

In The Guild of Merchant Explorers, you will navigate mysterious lands using a personal map board. Begin your journey from a single city and expand by placing cubes according to revealed terrain cards. Your goals include establishing new cities, exploring shipwrecks for treasures, and creating trade routes for bonus points. With each round, cube placements reset, so building new cities is crucial. Compete to achieve common objectives first for additional rewards. Multiple maps allow remote play, enriching the experience.
Explore strange lands, establish trade routes, and search for treasure.

In "Flamecraft," you become a Flamekeeper in a fantastical village where artisan dragons craft wonders in shops. You’ll gather items, manage your hand, and place specialized dragons like bread and potion types to enhance storefronts. Use enchantments to boost your reputation and gain favor from these charming creatures. As you carefully manage your resources and dragon placements, your aim is to become the top Flamekeeper with the most renown. Enjoy a whimsical blend of strategy that’s perfect for families.
In a magical realm a village awakes, and artisan dragons make coffee and cakes!

In Alien Frontiers, you will embark on a mission to colonize a newly discovered planet. Manage resources wisely to build fleets and establish colonies. The board represents a detailed star system where you deploy your ships (dice) to orbital facilities, gathering resources and exploring alien tech. Strategic placement of colonies influences key territories. Your journey involves blocking opponents and seizing opportunities. Can you navigate the alien frontier and rise as its dominant power?
Race to develop and colonize the surface of planet Maxwell.

In Runewars, you will lead a faction in the realm of Terrinoth, vying for control through strategic battles and resource management. This epic board game blends conquest, adventure, and fantasy, as you recruit armies, lay siege to cities, and search for powerful dragon runes. With a modular board and rich thematic setting, each game offers a distinct strategic challenge. Dive into a world of heroes and monsters where only one can rise victoriously among the competing empires.
Build, conquer, gather, recruit, and find runes in the Terrinoth realm.
Exit: The Game – The Abandoned Cabin <small>(2016)</small>

In "Exit: The Game – The Abandoned Cabin", you find yourselves trapped overnight in a mysterious cabin. The door is locked with a combination code and the windows are barred. Using an enigmatic spinning code dial and a mysterious book, you and your team will need to crack codes, solve puzzles, and deduce clever solutions to secure your freedom. This cooperative game challenges your creativity and teamwork, pushing you to uncover clues and escape before time runs out.
A kind stranger's invitation becomes a grim trap - can you escape before he returns?

In Small World, you will control a series of quirky fantasy races, each with their own special abilities, to compete for control over a world too small for everyone. Balance expansion and timing as you push your civilizations to greatness – but know when to let a dwindling race decline and embrace a new one. Mechanically, you manage race tiles, occupy territories, and outmaneuver opponents, aiming to hold the most land by the end. The player with the most victory points wins.
Control one fantasy race after another to expand quickly throughout the land.

In Raiders of Scythia, you will lead a crew of fierce warriors to raid ancient empires and gather riches. As you ride across vast lands, you'll recruit a team, train animals, and gather provisions to take on settlements. The game blends strategy with worker placement, hand management, and variable player powers, creating a dynamic experience. Aim to earn the most Victory Points by raiding, plundering, and completing quests before your rivals do.
Raid and plunder your way through ancient empires on horseback.

In Burgle Bros., you and your team are daring thieves attempting a heist in a secure, multi-story building. Navigate through different floors, each with unique challenges and a safe to crack. Plan your moves carefully, use your character's special abilities, and avoid guards to make it to the roof with all the loot. The modular board keeps gameplay fresh and strategic, needing cooperation amongst players to succeed as one wrong move can end the game.
As part of a heist team, break in, get the loot, and get out without getting caught.

In Innovation, you will guide your civilization from the stone age to the modern era by developing technologies, ideas, and cultural advancements. Each card represents a new innovation with unique powers that can lead to advancements, score points, or disrupt your opponents. As you progress, you'll need to strategically combine your cards to build a thriving civilization. But watch out—your opponents might benefit from your cards too! Successfully score achievements and outmaneuver rival civilizations to win.
Guide your civilization with inventions from the stone age through to the modern era.

In Pax Renaissance: 2nd Edition, you step into the shoes of a powerful banker in the transformative era of the Renaissance. As Europe teeters between feudalism and modernity, you will finance monarchs, support republics, sponsor explorations, and even engage in clandestine activities. With varied paths to victory, you influence Europe's destiny—be it imperial conquest, trade prosperity, religious dominance, or cultural enlightenment. Combine strategy with historical depth in this engaging game of influence and power.
Become the most influential banker and pull the strings that decide Europe's future.

In Sidereal Confluence, you will become one of nine unique alien races striving to dominate the galaxy through trade and negotiation. You'll negotiate deals to acquire vital resources, technologies, and colonies, transforming your economy and advancing your civilization. The game features simultaneous play, where cooperation is essential, yet the ultimate aim is to outscore your rivals. You must balance collaboration with competition, enabling a dynamic and engaging gameplay experience.
Nine alien races wheel, deal, plan, and develop to be the best leader of the galaxy.

In Marvel United: X-Men, you step into the shoes of iconic Marvel heroes working together to thwart the evil plans of a game-controlled villain. You'll navigate a modular board using a unique deck to unleash powerful actions and superpowers. Team up with other heroes, combining your skills to overcome challenges and save the world. The cooperative play and dynamic interactions create a thrilling experience, encouraging strategic planning and teamwork. Become a hero and unite to stand against villainous forces.
Co-operate as Marvel Heroes to stop the Villains' master plans!

In "Above and Below," you set out to rebuild your life after a barbarian attack by founding a new village. As you build above ground, you discover mysterious caverns below, promising treasure and adventure. Balance your time between village growth and exciting expeditions underground. Each villager has their skills, and you'll assign them tasks like cave exploration or resource gathering. The stories unfold as you explore, with decisions affecting your progress. Master storytelling and strategy to win!
Build your newly founded village above while exploring the caves and stories below.

In Merchants & Marauders, you will sail the Caribbean during the Golden Age of Piracy, choosing the life of a merchant or a pirate. Trade goods, hunt rumors, undertake daring missions, or plunder to amass wealth and glory. Customize your ship, hire a skilled crew, and decide where your loyalties lie. Whether you trade or raid, danger lurks at every turn, and your decisions will shape your legacy. Will you become a legend of the seas or meet a watery end?
Live the life of an influential merchant or a dreaded pirate in the Caribbean.

In Bonfire, you are a gnome on a mission to bring light back to your dark world. The mystical bonfires have gone out, and you must complete tasks for the guardians of light to reignite them. You will sail to islands, collect tasks, and strategize using puzzle-like tile placement to specialize in actions. As you move guardians through your city and build it up, you aim to earn the trust of the guardians. With diverse strategies and a race against time, Bonfire offers a rich and engaging gameplay experience.
Gnomes struggle to re-ignite mystical bonfires to bring light to their dark planet.

In Furnace, you become a 19th-century capitalist aiming to build a successful industrial empire. Over four rounds, you bid for company cards and manage resources. Each round is divided into auction and production phases. During the auction, strategically place your discs to acquire companies or compensation. In the production phase, optimize your resources and develop your industry. The player with the most money after four rounds wins, showcasing your strategic engine-building skills.
19th century capitalists manipulate the market and manage their industrial empires.

In Neuroshima Hex! 3.0, you step into a tactical post-apocalyptic battlefield, leading one of four unique armies. Each faction comes with its own deck of 34 tiles featuring soldiers, support, and special actions. Strategically place your troops on the hexagonal grid and manage your resources to outmaneuver your opponents. The game culminates in a high-stakes showdown where the last surviving headquarters wins. Engage in deep strategy while exploring a richly themed dystopian world.
Battle robots, gangs, and more in tactical post-apocalyptic warfare.

In Mindbug: First Contact, you summon bizarre hybrid creatures like a Snail Hydra or Kangasaurus Rex, and send them into battle. Each player starts with ten creature cards and two Mindbug cards, which allow you to mind-control an opponent's powerful creature. This dynamic creates a unique tactical duel where timing and decision-making are key. With no resources to manage or decks to build, dive straight into strategic action and see if you can outsmart your rival.
Serve the Mindbug, summon hybrids, and mind-control your opponent's best cards.
Dead of Winter: The Long Night <small>(2016)</small>

In Dead of Winter: The Long Night, you will lead a group of survivors struggling to endure in a post-apocalyptic world ridden with threats. You'll need to fend off zombie hordes, confront rival colonies, and explore mysterious locations like the Raxxon laboratory, where dark secrets promise both danger and valuable resources. The game combines cooperative elements with potential for betrayal, requiring strategic decisions and teamwork to survive the harsh winter nights. Enjoy an immersive experience as you manage scarce resources, braving both external and internal challenges.
A new group stands alone against the undead, bandits, and the horrors of Raxxon.

In Arboretum, you will carefully cultivate stunning paths in your garden by strategically laying down a variety of tree cards. Each turn, you draw, play, and discard cards, seeking to outscore your opponents by having the most valuable paths of connected cards. While the game appears serene, there’s an underlying tension as you must decide which cards to keep to block others from scoring. With 80 cards of ten tree species, create the most enchanting arboretum to win the game.
Build the Arboretum of your dreams, and prevent your rival from building theirs.

In Antiquity, you will guide your civilization through the challenges of the late Middle Ages in Italy. You'll select a patron saint whose unique goals will dictate your strategy—opt for growth, trade, conquest, or city-building. As your cities thrive, the surrounding environment becomes depleted, increasing the complexity of resource management. Balance development with sustainability before famine and pollution overwhelm you. Compete against others to achieve your civilization’s objectives first.
Achieve your civilization’s goal before being overwhelmed by famine and pollution.

In Bärenpark, you will step into the world of bears, tasked with building your own spectacular bear park. Place polyomino tiles on your personal board to create spaces for different types of bears, ranging from mighty polar bears to adorable koalas. Each tile strategically fills the grid, covering icons that earn you new pieces or expand your park. The better you plan, the faster you complete your park and score points. Aim for a winning combination of efficiency and beauty in this delightful puzzle game.
Build a bear park on personal boards by carefully placing polyominoes.

In Frostpunk: The Board Game, you lead a colony of survivors in a frozen post-apocalyptic world. Your mission is to manage both infrastructure and citizens, making tough decisions to keep the settlement alive. With a dynamic society that reacts to your leadership, every choice impacts their mood and survival. Will you be a visionary or a tyrant? Inspired by the acclaimed video game, this cooperative board game challenges you with strategy and survival elements, offering a unique gaming experience.
A city-survival game where heat means life and every decision comes with a cost.

In Mission: Red Planet, you will become the head of a Victorian-era mining corporation racing to control the vast resources of Mars. You'll have ten rounds to deploy your astronauts, occupy rich zones, and collect valuable minerals like celerium, sylvanite, and ice. Choose strategically from your team of nine professionals, each offering unique abilities—from traversing Mars to sabotaging competitors' ships. Secret missions and clever action selection add layers of strategy as you vie for supremacy.
Launch your rockets, sabotage the competition as you vie to control Mars.

In Sid Meier's Civilization: The Board Game, you will guide a civilization through the ages, starting from humble beginnings. You can choose to dominate through military might, cultural influence, scientific progress, or economic supremacy. Explore a modular game board, build cities, research technologies, and engage with other leaders in a quest for glory. With various historical civilizations, multiple paths to victory, and strategic depth, it captures the grandeur of building an empire from the ground up.
Lead your civilization to greatness in military, arts, science or economy.

In Expeditions, you will journey into the mysterious Siberian taiga following a meteorite crash that awakened an ancient corruption. As an intrepid explorer, assemble your expedition with unique cards and venture to uncover artifacts and tackle challenges. This competitive game encourages strategic card play and engine-building as you enhance your mech's abilities. Navigate through a modular board and face unexpected encounters using worker resources and clever tactics to achieve glory.
Venture to the dangerous north in this tile-exploration sequel to Scythe.

In Dixit, you will embark on a journey of creative storytelling. As the storyteller, you pick a card and give a clue using words or sounds to describe its surreal image. Others submit their cards that match your clue, leading to a mix of interpretations. Everyone then guesses which card was yours. Successful guessing without giving away too much is the key! Discover the imaginative visions of your friends and find out who can best balance the art of subtlety and boldness.
Give the perfect clue so most (not all) players guess the right surreal image card.

In "Letters from Whitechapel", you’ll dive into the foggy streets of London in 1888, hunting or hiding as the infamous Jack the Ripper. Assume the role of Jack and try to elude capture while committing your notorious crimes, or band together as detectives trying to catch him before he reaches his grim goal. The game involves careful movement, bluffing, and deduction as you traverse through numbered circles on the map. The asymmetrical roles and hidden movement add tension and excitement to the chase.
Slip away as Jack the Ripper or track his hidden movement as a team of investigators.

In Gizmos, you step into the exciting world of a science fair, where you compete to build the most impressive machine. You'll collect energy marbles from a unique 3D dispenser, using them to construct gizmos that earn you victory points. Choose from four actions: File cards for future builds, Pick marbles, Build machines, or Research for new possibilities. Cleverly connect your creations to trigger satisfying chain reactions and combos. The player with the best-engineered machine claims the title!
Gather energy marbles to build gizmos parts and trigger chain reactions and combos.

In Marrakesh: Essential Edition, you will compete as part of influential families aiming to become the "Obermufti" of the city. The game unfolds over three rounds, each with four turns. Strategically choose colored cylinders to plan your moves and place assistants on your board for key actions. Drop cylinders into the mysterious cube tower to see which emerge, shaping each round's possibilities. Trade wealth for influence and enhance actions to gain the upper hand. The most skillful player claims victory with the highest score.
Influential families react to the whims of the cube tower to gain power in the city.

In Dead Reckoning, you command a ship and crew in a Caribbean-esque world full of exploration and piracy. Customize your ship's speed, firepower, and storage to suit your strategy. Enhance your crew's abilities using a unique card-crafting system, where cards evolve as you play. Explore new islands, battle for control, and engage in epic sea battles using a dynamic cube-tower mechanic. The game also features expansions with hidden content that unfolds as you delve deeper into the adventure.
Card Crafting meets 4X!  Sail the high seas and choose your path to victory!

In Dungeon Lords, you will step into the shoes of an evil dungeonlord, tasked with creating the ultimate underground lair. Use strategy to construct tunnels, build rooms, and hire monsters to protect your domain. Set traps and face heroes who aim to destroy your dungeon. With your hand of cards, choose actions wisely, as some will lock your options for future turns. Plan through seasons to counter incoming threats and achieve victory by capturing heroes and perfecting your dungeon.
Prepare your dungeon. Set evil traps. Release your monsters. Stop the good guys.

In Tekhenu: Obelisk of the Sun, you will travel back to ancient Egypt, building and expanding the magnificent temple complex of Ipet-Isut. This strategy game challenges you to balance your actions carefully as you draft dice, each linked to a different Egyptian god. The shadow of the central obelisk affects which dice are available and their influence. You must manage resources and draft wisely to endure the judgment of Maat and score victory points. It's a game of planning and adaptation over multiple rounds.
As the Obelisk's shadow moves, use dice to build Ipet-Isut and the temple of Amun-Ra.

In Ginkgopolis, you step into the future where humanity must innovate to build eco-friendly cities in harmony with nature. You will gather a team of experts and strategically place city tiles to expand your urban reach upwards and outwards. Manage your resources carefully, utilizing victory points, new tiles, and special powers granted by character cards. Compete to be the best urban planner by adapting to the ever-changing cityscape and the actions of others. With each move, consider not only your strategy but how it might affect upcoming turns for your opponents.
Build upwards as well as outwards to control the most buildings in a future eco-city.

In "Harry Potter: Hogwarts Battle," you join forces with friends as a Hogwarts student, such as Harry, Ron, Hermione, or Neville, to protect the school. This cooperative deck-building game lets you gather power by acquiring cards representing iconic characters, spells, and magical items. Collaboratively strategize to regain health, fend off villains, and resist Dark Arts attacks. Only teamwork will secure Hogwarts from the clutches of evil.
Defend iconic locations with your friends against You-Know-Who and his cronies.

In Air, Land & Sea, you take on the role of Supreme Commander, managing your country's military forces across three crucial theaters: air, land, and sea. You'll strategize with a hand of six cards, playing one per turn to gain dominance. Decide whether to play cards face up for tactical advantages or face down for flexibility. Each choice is vital, and sometimes a strategic retreat can change the game. Reach 12 points first by mastering the art of warfare across multiple fronts!
