Submit orders on three fronts to outwit and outmatch your military opponent.

In BattleLore: Second Edition, you step into the fantasy world of Terrinoth for epic battles. This two-player game pits the disciplined Daqan Lords against the ferocious Uthuk Y'llan. You'll strategize, command squads, and harness lore magic to gain the upper hand. Each game presents new maps and tactics, allowing army customization for your play style. Victory requires seizing objectives and defeating enemies on a dynamic battlefield, using cards, dice, and clever maneuvers.
Fantasy Command & Colors spiced up with magic.

Maria takes you to the strategic and political complexities of the War of the Austrian Succession. As one of three players, you navigate alliances and conflicts, embodying Austria, France with Bavaria, or Prussia with the Pragmatic Army. The divided map and unique player roles allow for both subtle negotiations and direct military confrontations. Mastering Tactical Cards and careful planning of your maneuvers and retreats are crucial for success. Choose between a quick introduction or an in-depth campaign experience.
Maneuver martially and politically in this 3 player War of the Austrian Succession.

In Takenoko, you are transported to the Japanese Imperial court where you need to manage a bamboo garden while caring for a giant panda. As a court member, you will cultivate plots of land, irrigate them, and grow vibrant green, yellow, and pink bamboo. The challenge is to satisfy the panda's appetite without compromising the garden's yield. With action points, tile placement, and a modular board, you balance growing bamboo and feeding the panda. The most adept gardener who harmonizes these tasks will be victorious.
Carefully cultivate a bamboo garden with the help of a gardener and a hungry panda.

In The Vale of Eternity, you become a tamer in a fantasy realm where mythical creatures roam. Your goal is to tame the most impressive minions, choosing from over seventy spirits and monsters. In each round, you'll draft cards, perform actions like selling or taming, and use summoned cards' effects. Dragons, the most noble creatures, are highly sought after. With mechanics focusing on hand management and open drafting, the game offers a strategic yet accessible experience.
Tame a variety of mythical creatures to gain their powers.

In "Unmatched: Robin Hood vs. Bigfoot," you will command legendary characters in a strategic duel. Choose Robin Hood, who leads his outlaws in clever ranged assaults, or Bigfoot, who charges through the forest alongside the formidable Jackalope. Each hero has a unique deck reflecting their mythos. Engage in tactical movement and strategic card play, with no randomness in combat resolution. The double-sided board and artistic miniatures immerse you in this fast-paced and thrilling battle experience.
The big beast and the wily rogue fight to see who's king of the forest.

In Abyss, you embark on a quest to control the underwater realms. Assemble your allies through strategic card drafting and recruit powerful Lords to gain influence over key territories. As you balance resource management and tactical decisions, you must carefully plan when to leverage your Lords' abilities, as they lose power once territory is secured. Compete with others to win the Council's favor and reign supreme, blending strategy with an immersive nautical theme.
Control factions, influence the court and reign over underwater realms!

In Mysterium, set in the 1920s, you become a medium invited to a Scottish mansion to solve a ghostly murder mystery. One player takes on the silent role of the ghost, communicating through dreamlike illustrated cards. Your task is to unravel the clues to identify the murderer, location, and weapon. Cooperation is key as you interpret the ghost's visions and work with others to deduce the truth. The unique mechanics blend deduction with storytelling, creating an immersive and intriguing experience.
Become a psychic and divine spectral visions to solve the murder of a restless ghost.

In Schotten-Totten, you engage in a strategic battle of wits over nine boundary stones separating your clans. Using cards, you'll form powerful three-card sets similar to poker hands. The goal is to win stones by creating stronger formations than your opponent. You can even claim stones preemptively by proving your opponent can't beat your hand, adding an intriguing element of deduction. Secure five stones, or three in a row, to win this quick and engaging duel.
Place your kilted clansmen, control stones, expand territory & foil the rival clan.

In "Helden müssen draußen bleiben!", you step into the shoes (or claws) of monsters defending their dungeon from intruding heroes. Work together to protect your treasures from these so-called heroes who are relentless in their quest to loot. Each turn, draw and play cards to move, activate tiles, and fend off adversaries. Survive the three levels of threats to win. Unique mechanics and variable player powers make every game session different and challenging.
As monsters, work together to defend your dungeon against so-called heroes.

In San Juan, you will find yourself as a builder in the bustling colony of Puerto Rico, drawing from a deck of multi-use cards. Each card can represent a construction, currency, or goods, requiring strategic choices to outmaneuver your opponents. Select roles like Builder or Producer each round to gain advantages, and strive to be the first to construct twelve buildings for victory. This card-driven city-building game combines tactical planning with role selection, making every turn a fresh challenge.
Cards have multiple potential uses -- choose wisely to build the city.

In Carpe Diem, you become a wealthy patrician in ancient Rome, striving to build a prosperous district. Navigate a unique path to strategically place tiles, producing gold, bread, and goods. Compete to earn prestige points by completing contracts and achieving end-game bonuses. The open drafting mechanism and various scoring opportunities allow for multiple strategies. Created by renowned designer Stefan Feld, Carpe Diem offers a rich and engaging experience in its Roman setting.
Build villas and lands to produce gold, bread and goods in ancient Rome.

In Ghost Stories, you assume the role of a Taoist monk defending a village from the malevolent Wu-Feng and his ghostly minions. The game is cooperative, requiring you to work with other monks to exorcise ghosts. Each turn, you'll face new spectral threats, using dice rolls and Tao tokens to banish them. Strategically move through the modular board to harness villagers' powers and keep the village safe. Victory demands defeating Wu-Feng's incarnation, but beware, many paths lead to defeat.
Taoist monks must defeat the undead or humanity is lost as Wu Feng returns.
Agricola: Die Bauern und das liebe Vieh <small>(2012)</small>

In Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small, you and your opponent each manage a small farm, expanding your domain and breeding various animals. This game focuses solely on animal husbandry, offering a strategic challenge as you decide whether to expand your land or gather more animals. You start with a simple 3x2 board, aiming to enclose pastures and build structures for maximum victory points. The game is a harmonious blend of resource management and strategic planning.
Breed animals and expand your small farm in this two player version of the original.

In The Resistance, you embark on a mission to overthrow the Empire by strategically assigning operatives to critical missions. However, beware of spies hidden among you, ready to sabotage your plans. Over five rounds, you must deduce the loyalty of your companions through discussion and voting, aiming to complete missions successfully without being thwarted. With no player elimination, the game focuses on intense social deduction and trust-building, offering a thrilling experience for 5 to 10 players.
Assign operatives to missions while avoiding enemy spies.
Blood Bowl: Team Manager – The Card Game <small>(2011)</small>

In Blood Bowl: Team Manager – The Card Game, you will coach a ragtag "fantasy" football team through a grueling season filled with chaos and mayhem. Choose from six unique teams such as Chaos, Dwarfs, or Wood Elves, and lead them to glory by drafting star players, hiring staff, and upgrading your facilities. Cheat your way to victory and amass fans as you clash with rivals in high-stakes matchups. The manager with the most fans at the end of the tournament wins the coveted title of Manager of the Year.
Coach your “fantasy” football team and gather most fans to win.

In Smartphone Inc., you become the CEO of a major smartphone company just as the industry is taking off. You'll strategize over five rounds, setting the price, expanding your network, and researching new technologies. By planning your actions carefully, you can outpace your rivals, produce more phones, and conquer the market. Balancing price and profits is key, as aggressive pricing might increase sales, while higher pricing leads to more income per unit. Only the wealthiest will reign supreme.
Success is measured in money as you build your global smartphone empire.

In Star Wars: Armada, you become a fleet admiral in a galaxy-spanning conflict. Assemble your fleet of pre-painted miniatures and dive into epic battles as either the Imperial Navy or Rebel Alliance. Utilize the unique maneuver tool to navigate vast capital ships through space while engaging in tactical combat. The game's innovative command stack requires strategic foresight to issue commands that sway the battle's outcome. Lead your ships skillfully, and you might change the fate of the galaxy.
Form your fleet, plan a strategy, and execute it with your commands.

In Lords of Hellas, you plunge into a mythical blend of ancient Greece and advanced technology. Command an asymmetric hero with unique abilities and paths to victory. Will you secure territories, construct impressive monuments, or slay fearsome monsters? Strategically manage your hero's statistics—Leadership, Strength, and Speed—while navigating this dynamic battlefield. Unlock divine powers, outmaneuver foes, and cement your rule over Hellas in this thrilling strategy game.
Honor the Gods, build temples, defeat monsters, and establish supremacy over Hellas.

In Twice as Clever!, you roll six colorful dice and choose one each turn to maximize your score in five unique categories. Your choice matters as lower-numbered dice are set aside and may be used by others. Cleverly combining the dice will unleash bonuses and boost your points. With the white die as a wild card, every roll presents exciting opportunities. Try out the new dice-marking challenges and choices to outwit your opponents. Whether solo or with friends, it's a delightfully tactical dice game!
Roll colorful dice, choosing just one each roll to combo bonuses and points!

In The Godfather: Corleone's Empire, you take on the role of competing mafia families in 1950s New York City. Deploy your thugs, don, and family members to take control of the city's lucrative rackets. Compete for area dominance, strategize with limited resources, and engage in deadly confrontations. Manage your hand of cards wisely, as money rules all, and the wealthiest family will emerge victorious. Add a touch of ruthlessness with drive-by shootings, sending rivals down to sleep with the fishes.
Reach the top of the cut-throat mob world...all others sleep with the fishes.

In 51st State: Master Set, you step into a post-apocalyptic world where you build a new society from the ashes of the old. As a leader of one of four factions, you'll strategically use cards to develop locations, recruit leaders, and leverage your resources. Choose whether to raze locations for quick resources, make deals for regular income, or build lasting establishments. The game offers rich strategy with multiple paths to victory, with mechanics that include hand management and worker placement.
Build, deal and raise your state out of the ashes of the apocalypse.

In The Pillars of the Earth, you become a master builder in 13th-century England, where your goal is to contribute the most to constructing a magnificent cathedral. By placing workers, you gather resources or gold, then use craftsmen to turn these into victory points. Each turn, strategic decisions with your master builders can also recruit more workers or improve your craftsmen. Balancing your resources and points is key to victory. Can you build the greatest cathedral?
Produce, craft, and recruit to build a cathedral in this classic worker placement.

In Notre Dame, you step into the shoes of a prominent family head in 14th century Paris, aiming to enhance the prestige of your neighborhood near the iconic cathedral. Using clever card play, you'll navigate the challenges of urban management, from boosting influence to ensuring public health. Balancing your ambitions against the looming threat of the plague, your decisions will determine your family's legacy. Will you rise above the rest and earn the most prestige in this strategic battle for power?
Improve the area around Notre Dame Cathedral to earn prestige for your family.

In Hannibal: Rome vs. Carthage, you will experience the intense rivalry between ancient Rome and Carthage. As you command armies and maneuver generals using Strategy Cards, you'll aim to gain political and military dominance over your opponent. The game utilizes an asymmetrical card-driven system, where each decision influences the unfolding drama of historical events and military strategies. Engage in thrilling battles and use your strategic prowess to tip the scales in favor of your side.
Card driven strategic and political struggle between Ancient Rome and Carthage.

In Altiplano, you find yourself in the highlands of Peru, managing resources like fish, alpaca, and silver to build the most efficient production engine. This game combines strategic thinking with bag-building mechanics, where you draw resources from your personal bag and decide how best to use them. With unique starting roles and the ability to acquire new production sites, the game offers diverse paths to victory. Efficient resource management and timing can lead you to fill your warehouse most advantageously.
Bag building in the highlands of Peru.

In Fall of Rome, you will step into the roles of Roman citizens and allies during a time of crisis for the empire. Using cooperative gameplay inspired by Pandemic, your challenge is to fend off invading barbarian tribes like the Goths and Huns. You must recruit and command armies, form alliances, and defend cities across the empire. Can you stabilize the region and prevent the fall of Rome? Unique roles and abilities offer diverse strategies to achieve victory in this thrilling historical setting.
Will you be strong enough to protect the Imperium from the Barbarians?

In Newton, you become a young scientist during the 17th century striving to make groundbreaking discoveries. You'll journey across Europe, visiting universities and cities to learn and gain knowledge, while managing your limited resources and actions over six rounds. Strategic hand management and action selection are key as you decide which card to leave on the board to strengthen future turns. By acquiring new cards, you'll open up powerful actions to outwit your opponents and score the most victory points.
Action selection and hand management in the age of enlightenment.

In Ready Set Bet, you and your friends experience the thrill of the racetrack as you cheer and jeer while betting on your favorite horses. The game unfolds over four fast-paced rounds, where you'll place bets in real-time based on the roll of the dice. After each race, you resolve bets and earn money, gaining advantages with VIP Club Cards for future races. With its dynamic mix of luck and strategy, the player with the most money after four rounds emerges victorious in this lively party game.
Head to the races for a day of cheering, jeering, and betting!

In "Die Kartographin," you venture into the uncharted Western Lands alongside brave heroes and cunning foes. As a royal cartographer, your task is to map out these lands while documenting the heroic battles against creatures that threaten your kingdom. This game blends strategic decision-making with creative map-drawing. With new maps, scoring, and ambush cards, each game offers unique challenges, whether played standalone or mixed with its predecessor.
Explore new lands and chart the deeds of brave heroes who defeat monsters.

In Akropolis, you become an architect in ancient Greece, strategically designing a city across multiple levels. You’ll place tiles representing housing, temples, markets, gardens, and barracks, carefully arranging them to maximize prestige and outshine rival cities. Balance constructing these districts with gathering resources, particularly stone, which allows you to build vertically and enhance district value. Clever placement and planning will determine your city’s success as you compete to create the most harmonious and impressive metropolis.
Build your Greek city on multiple levels to keep your districts perfectly placed.

In Vor den Toren von Loyang, you will dive into the bustling markets of ancient China, becoming a prosperous merchant through planting and selling crops. You'll grow vegetables in your fields and fulfill orders for various customers. Enhance your strategy by using helpers who can boost your production or income. With a unique card drafting system, select from fields, customers, and other opportunities to optimize your resources. Invest wisely as early profits can lead to victory in this economic challenge.
Harvest crops and fulfill orders to become the most prosperous merchant.

In Saint Petersburg, you'll step into the shoes of visionary leaders in Russia's early 18th century. Your goal is to skillfully manage resources, investing in craftsmen for rubles and constructing buildings for victory points. The presence of aristocrats boosts your influence and end-of-game scoring potential. As you juggle these elements, every choice counts, and timing is crucial. With open drafting and set collection mechanics, this engaging game challenges you to outmaneuver opponents in a race for prosperity.
Invest in infrastructure and manage cash wisely to attract nobility to the city.

In Mage Wars Arena, you step into the shoes of a powerful mage, ready to duel other mages in intense arena battles. Each player wields a customizable spellbook, selecting spells to summon creatures, cast potent enchantments, and equip magical weapons. With a unique blend of card game and miniatures mechanics, you'll control your forces on a grid-based board, strategizing each move. Choose your mage from different magic schools, each offering distinctive tactics and abilities, to achieve victory.
Fight to the death as a powerful mage in this game of deep strategy and decisions!

In Gùgōng, you are part of a powerful Chinese family in 1570 Ming Dynasty China. Engage in strategic gift exchanges with officials to gain influence in a time of corruption. Your goal is to navigate the empire by offering gifts of higher value to take desirable actions. You can embark on a journey along the Grand Canal, contribute to the Great Wall, or buy jade. The game centers around strategic choices, with your ultimate aim to gain the favor of the emperor for victory.
Exchange gifts, send servants, and visit the Emperor in a luscious 1570 China.

In Chess, you will engage in a battle of wits, maneuvering your pieces on an 8x8 board to outsmart your opponent. Each piece moves uniquely, allowing you to attack, defend, or strategize for victory. Capturing your opponent's king, known as checkmate, marks your triumph. A game steeped in history, Chess is loved globally, offering both challenging gameplay for experts and an entertaining experience for beginners. Its centuries-old legacy makes it a celebrated and enduring game.
Checkmate your opponent in this timeless abstract.

In Honey Buzz, you will guide your bee colony through the world of economics. As spring arrives, expand your hive piece by piece with honeycomb tiles that activate powerful actions. Forage nectar, produce honey, and sell it to forest creatures. The goal is strategic hive building, where the placement of tiles can trigger multiple action sequences. With limited nectar and ever-watchful competitors, you'll need to plan your moves carefully to outsmart and outmaneuver other players.
Bees have discovered economics! Make and sell honey to get money and win!

In Arkham Horror, you step into 1926, an era pulsating with jazz and clandestine revelry. Yet beneath the excitement lies a growing menace. You and your friends become investigators tackling mysteries born from H.P. Lovecraft's eerie Cthulhu Mythos. Select from 16 unique characters to roam the streets of Arkham, upgrading your skills and gathering resources. Your mission is urgent: close interdimensional gates to thwart the Ancient Ones. Teamwork is crucial to avert catastrophe and save the town.
Work as a team to save the town of Arkham from monsters and a Great Old One.

In King of Tokyo, you'll become a mutant monster, gigantic robot, or strange alien battling for dominance. Roll six dice to gain victory points, energy, heal, or attack. Push your luck across three rolls to outmaneuver opponents. Occupy Tokyo to score extra points, but risk facing all players alone. Use energy to buy special cards for powerful effects. Win either by being the last monster standing or earning 20 victory points. Fast-paced and chaotic, it's a thrilling race to be King of Tokyo.
It's a fight to the death when giant monsters battle over Tokyo in this dice-roller.

In IKI, you will immerse yourself in the bustling life of Edo, exploring the vibrant streets of Nihonbashi. As a player, you hire and manage skilled artisans, vendors, and unique professions to create a thriving market. Using mechanics like open drafting and set collection, you aim to master the philosophy of IKI, showcasing subtlety and elegance. The strategic use of resources and interactions with townspeople guide you in your quest to become the most admired resident of Edo.
Hire artisans, set them up in the market and acquire prestige in feudal Japan.
Blitzkrieg!: World War Two in 20 Minutes <small>(2019)</small>

In Blitzkrieg!: World War Two in 20 Minutes, you will take command of armies and engage in quick, strategic battles across various theaters of WWII. Drawing tokens from a bag, you determine your forces and deploy them wisely to win campaigns. The game focuses on resource allocation instead of dice-rolling, making it accessible to wargame novices. Whether playing solo or against an opponent, Blitzkrieg! offers a fast-paced, engaging experience that can be played multiple times in one evening.
Deploy units in different theaters of combat to win WW2.

In Skull & Roses Red, you engage in the ultimate bluffing showdown. Each round, place a card face down and dare opponents to do the same. Feel confident? Bid to flip cards, hoping to reveal only roses. But beware—hidden skulls can ruin your plans! Win by successfully navigating two challenges. The unique twist? Control two biker gangs for double the strategy. With a mix of poker face, bold bids, and intense anticipation, this game keeps everyone guessing until the very end.
Does the token hide a flower or skull? Bid, bluff and laugh with striking components.

In Pan Am, you will navigate the thrilling world of early aviation to build a successful air travel empire. Compete with the legendary Pan American Airways and other airlines in strategic bidding wars to acquire key landing rights and expand your fleet for greater reach. Trade routes with Pan Am for profit and invest wisely in stocks to secure victory. Blending history with strategic depth, Pan Am immerses you in the dynamic growth of global air travel from its pioneering days.
Triumph in the golden age of air travel.

In Descent: Legends of the Dark, you embark on a thrilling cooperative adventure across the vibrant fantasy realm of Terrinoth. This game blends traditional dungeon-crawling with modern technology through its app-driven mechanics. You and your companions take on the roles of unique heroes, each with distinct abilities, and face off against undead, demonic barbarians, and various other dark forces. With a new take on combat and 3D scenarios, your quest unfolds over a campaign of sixteen quests. Engage in strategy, crafting, and exploration, crafting your own legend as you overcome dynamic challenges.
An app-driven dungeon crawl set in the world of Terrinoth.

In Dice Forge, you are a hero competing for a divine seat among the gods. Your key to victory lies in divine dice with customizable faces. During the game, you will upgrade these dice by acquiring new faces, allowing you to gather resources more effectively. Sacrifice gold to gain powerful die faces and complete quests to earn rewards. The game combines strategy with an element of luck, as you build and adapt your dice to outmaneuver your rivals and ascend to the heavens.
Control luck itself! Choose to forge improved dice or complete quests for rewards.

In Boonlake, you embark on an adventure with pioneers, leaving civilization to settle in an uncharted Western U.S. region. You'll explore landscapes, build communities, and develop a thriving life by managing resources and raising cattle. The game is unique due to its innovative action mechanism, ensuring no two games are alike. Each choice you make not only affects your outcome but also impacts others, adding strategic depth. Balance personal goals and communal prosperity for a prosperous new beginning.
Build, raise cattle, expand and explore in a fictional Western US region.

In London (Second Edition), you are actively involved in rebuilding the city after the great fire. You'll draft cards to construct buildings and manage loans while balancing your city's prosperity with its poverty levels. The game uniquely allows you to run all card actions simultaneously, which adds a strategic layer to your decision-making. It's important to limit debt and poverty, as you strive to realize your vision of a thriving London and outsmart your opponents.
Draft cards, avoid debt, and run your industrial engine to rebuild London.

In Downforce, you will dive into the thrilling world of high-stakes racing. Bid strategically to own powerful race cars, and skillfully play your cards to zoom around the track. It's not just about finishing first—place secret bets on who will win and accumulate wealth through savvy predictions. With a mix of racing, bidding, and betting, you’ll need to find the perfect moment to strike. The game's variable player powers and stunning design ensure a captivating experience every time you play.
Auction, bet, race! You can lose the race and still win the game.

In Cubitos, you take part in the annual Cube Cup, a thrilling race of luck and strategy. You'll control a runner on the racetrack and leverage a unique support team composed of various dice. Each turn, you roll your dice to move, acquire new dice, and activate special abilities. Be cautious when pushing your luck, as too many risky rolls could result in a bust! Strategic choices and a bit of daring make every race unique and exciting in this family-friendly game.
Race for the glory of the Cube Cup in this exciting game of luck and strategy!

In Tiny Towns, you become the mayor of a small town nestled in the forest, where woodland creatures thrive in secret. Your village is represented by a 4x4 grid. By gathering and placing resources carefully, you construct various buildings, each with its own unique scoring. Plan wisely to maximize space and resources, and avoid empty squares that can cost points. Compete to create the most prosperous town, as the player with the most victory points wins!
Plan well as you build your town one building at a time. Will it fit?

In "In the Year of the Dragon," you take on the role of a Chinese ruler around the year 1000, managing your workers to endure a year of relentless disasters. The game unfolds over twelve rounds, each representing a challenging month. You'll select actions and recruit people with unique abilities to prepare for impending events like disease, drought, and Mongol attacks. Strategy is key as you balance resources and ensure your palaces withstand the crises, aiming for survival and victory.
Choose and manage your workers to protect your palaces from a series of disasters.

In Ticket to Ride: Märklin, you will journey through Germany, connecting cities and countries using beautiful Märklin train models. This version introduces a thrilling twist with passengers and merchandise tokens. Strategically place your passengers to collect valuable tokens for victory points, navigating your own routes freely while paying a cost to move on others'. Compete to complete the most destination tickets for a bonus. This blend of strategy and competition makes each game exciting.
Build railroad routes across Germany to try to connect valuable destinations.

In Endeavor, you will lead an empire seeking fame and power across uncharted waters. As the world maps fill in, you'll explore new lands, forge alliances, and compete for resources. Manage Industry, Culture, Finance, and Politics to build structures, gather Trade Tokens, and secure Asset Cards. Through seven rounds, balance short-term strategies with long-term goals to achieve the greatest glory. Whether through diplomacy or conquest, the path to victory is yours to determine.
Spread your glory over the vast, as of yet unexplored world.

In Die Macher, you lead a political party through seven regional elections in Germany. Manage your resources wisely to secure votes, influence the media, and align with national opinions. Your strategic decisions will determine your success as you navigate alliances, negotiate, and bid with other players. With multiple scoring paths, it's a complex political simulation where adaptability and foresight are key to victory. The player with the most victory points after seven elections wins.
Players represent political parties attempting to gain power in Germany.

In "Imperial Struggle," you step into the shoes of France and Britain, battling for global supremacy in the 18th century. You’ll navigate war, trade, and diplomacy as you vie for influence across four major wars. The game involves strategic economic building and alliance-making during peace turns, and intense territorial battles during war turns. Your decisions shape history, determining whether it's England or France that emerges as a dominant power by the century's end.
France and Britain clash globally over trade, influence and territory in the 1700s.

In Codenames: Pictures, you dive into the world of espionage. As a spymaster, you give your team one-word clues to identify specific image cards on the table. Each image is unique and filled with various elements, adding complexity to the game. Your mission is to lead your operatives to contact all your agents before the opposing team. It's a race against time and wits, as one wrong guess could end in disaster. The game is easy to learn, providing a thrilling experience for small groups and parties alike.
Give your team one-word coded clues, trying to identify specific image cards.

In Azul: Stained Glass of Sintra, you will compete to craft the most stunning stained glass windows. Using translucent pieces, you must strategically choose which panes to place while managing your resources carefully. The game features double-sided player boards, offering a variety of arrangements for endless replayability. The challenge lies in striking the balance between gaining the right tiles and avoiding waste in a beautifully designed setting.
Create beautiful windows with coloured glass more efficiently than anyone else.

In Imperium: Legends, you take control of one of eight distinct civilizations, guiding it from obscurity to greatness. You'll explore new lands, lead scientific and cultural advancements, and keep your people united against constant threats. Balanced strategy is key—expand too quickly and risk instability; grow too slow and become insignificant. With diverse powers and solo play options, this deck-building game offers rich, asymmetric gameplay. Compatible with Imperium: Classics, it expands your options even further.
Compete to become the most dominant empire the world has ever seen!
Spartacus: A Game of Blood and Treachery <small>(2012)</small>

In Spartacus: A Game of Blood and Treachery, you will become the head of a Roman house, vying for influence in ancient Capua. Use political maneuvers and engage in brutal gladiator battles to rise in power. Each round consists of scheming, trading, and bloody arena combat. Scheme against rivals, barter assets, and place bets on gladiator matches to earn glory and influence. Will you forge strong alliances or betray others at key moments to secure your dominance?
Barter, buy, bid, deceive, and fight your way to become the dominant dominus in Rome.

In Bruxelles 1893, you step into the shoes of an architect in the late 19th century, aiming to create stunning Art Nouveau buildings. This strategic game blends worker placement, bidding, and area control mechanisms. You'll seek prestige by constructing magnificent structures and producing art to earn valuable points. The modular action board ensures a fresh challenge each round, while you carefully manage resources and your workforce to outscore rivals over five thrilling rounds.
Manage your workers to help usher in a new era of culture and progress in Brussels.

In "The Great Wall," you will lead ancient Chinese clans to defend against the relentless Mongol hordes. This unique strategy game combines worker and soldier placement, requiring both competition and cooperation. You’ll gather resources, recruit advisors, and build engines to amass Honor points. Each turn is a year, with challenges in every season. Your clan leader's strengths will guide you as you work with, or against, others to fortify the wall and claim victory.
Control medieval Clans in China trying to resist invading Mongol hordes.

In King of Tokyo: Dark Edition, you take on the role of giant monsters vying for control of Tokyo in a thrilling, dice-rolling showdown. This collector's edition transports you to a darker, alternate universe with its unique art and deluxe components. Alongside the classic gameplay of push-your-luck and strategic decisions, a new mechanism adds a fresh twist to the battle. Gather energy, attack foes, and strive to be the last monster standing in this electrifying battle for dominance.
Fight for dominance in this upgraded pulp edition of a dice-rolling monster battle.

In Puerto Rico: Das Kartenspiel, you’ll engage in a strategic journey to develop San Juan using a deck of versatile cards. Make crucial decisions as you select roles each round, impacting not just your growth but also influencing opponents. Use your hand to construct buildings or as currency for new developments. With roles triggering unique events, each choice shapes your path to victory. Adapt your strategy with multi-purpose cards and build a thriving city before your rivals.
As you build up San Juan, carefully choose how to use the multi-use cards you have.

In Firefly: The Game, you become the captain of your own Firefly-class ship, traveling through the 'Verse in search of jobs to complete and earn cash. You'll assemble a crew of diverse skills and personalities, upgrade your ship, and make deliveries. Tread carefully, as some cargo may attract unwanted attention from the Alliance or dangerous Reavers. With open drafting, dice rolling, and strategic planning, you must navigate challenges and compete to be the first to achieve the story goals.
Find a crew. Find a job. Keep flying. Cross the 'verse to complete jobs and get paid.

In Biblios, you step into the role of an abbot competing to build the most prestigious library in a medieval monastery. You'll need to balance your resources carefully, using limited gold to acquire valuable cards representing workers and sacred texts. With a combination of strategic planning, bidding during auctions, and a bit of luck, you aim to dominate categories like Illuminators, Manuscripts, and Scrolls. The game is played in two stages: gaining cards and then bidding on them, shaping a unique experience with each play.
Amass the greatest library of sacred texts, using your wits and meager gold supply.

In Civilization, you will lead an ancient nation from the dawn of agriculture to the rise of Rome. Manage resources, trade with competitors, and develop your culture in this game of strategy and skill for 2 to 7 players. It's not about conquering but about advancing your civilization through clever use of technology, diplomacy, and economy. Navigate challenges like land shortages and rivalries as you balance the roles of warriors, merchants, and more. Experience the thrill of building an empire, utilizing an early form of the tech tree mechanism.
Expand and develop your historical empire while trading with competing civilizations.

In "Here I Stand," you will immerse yourself in the political and religious turmoil of 16th century Europe. This card-driven game challenges you to lead one of six major powers—Ottomans, Habsburgs, English, French, Papacy, and Protestants—as you vie for dominance. Through strategic alliances and cunning diplomacy, you'll navigate wars and reformations, utilizing a unique map system. With secret deals and potential backstabbing, the game's dynamic interactions keep you on edge. Enjoy a deep and challenging conflict simulation.
Europe in conflict during the Protestant Reformation of the 16th century.

In Evolution: Climate, you will guide your species through a world where the climate is as challenging as the predators and scarcity of food. Develop unique traits like Hard Shells for defense or Long Necks to reach high food sources. Adapt to swings between a scorching desert and freezing tundra, adding layers to your strategy. With over 200,000 evolution possibilities, no two games are alike. This standalone game enhances Evolution, making every game an engaging fight for survival.
Adapt your species in an ecosystem of scarce food, predators, and a dynamic climate!

In Mythic Battles: Pantheon, you step into a shattered ancient Greece, where gods have lost their power. Choose a god and assemble a warband of heroes, monsters, and mortals to reclaim divine shards. Engage in epic battles, utilize strategic card play, and conquer your foes in a land ravaged by divine wrath. With detailed miniatures and rich mythology, your tactical skills will be tested as you strive to lead a new Pantheon. This is a battle for power, glory, and survival.
Gather your team from the vast Greek pantheon and fight to the death!

In Wavelength, you will embark on a journey of mind-reading as two teams compete to understand each other's thoughts. Aimed at creating the perfect clue, the Psychic on your team draws a card with contrasting pairs like "Hot-Cold" or "Fantasy-Sci-Fi" and gives a hint. Your team will then discuss its significance and turn the dial to pin down the hidden bullseye on the spectrum. The closer you get, the more points you earn! It's a delightful test of perception and communication.
Read your teammates’ minds in this pinpoint party game of infinite possibilities.

In Sword & Sorcery, you embark on an epic fantasy adventure where you and your friends resurrect legendary heroes to combat dark forces. Controlled by the game's advanced AI, these supernatural foes will challenge your strategic skills. As you progress through story-driven quests, collect soul points to restore your hero's powers. Enjoy the excitement of MMORPGs with customizable characters and dynamic area combat, all within a narrative-driven cooperative experience.
Heroes are resurrected to face dark forces and ancient evil assaulting Talon Coast.

In Millennium Blades, you take on the role of players immersed in the world of the ultimate collectible card game. You'll build decks, trade cards, and compete in fast-paced tournaments over the span of 2-3 hours. Dive into a simulation packed with manga and anime influences, manage your cards, and play the market to create powerful collections. Enjoy dynamic gameplay with each session offering different card setups, ensuring varied strategies. The goal is to achieve fame and become the Millennium Blades World Champion.
Play as players who are playing the greatest CCG in the universe.

In Santa Maria, you will establish a thriving colony in the New World by expanding your settlement with polyomino tiles. Utilizing dice as workers, you strategically activate rows and columns to build a bustling engine. Decisions include managing resources, forming shipping routes, and enhancing your religious influence to recruit monks offering various strategic advantages. With minimal luck and no destructive conflict, each game offers a unique challenge through its varying available buildings and specialists.
Build and maximize your polyomino colony in the New World.

In Caper: Europe, you take on the role of a criminal mastermind, assembling a crew of thieves to pull off heists across Europe. Over six rounds, you'll draft cards to deploy your thieves and equip them with gear to outmaneuver your rival. Your objective is to control famous locations and claim valuable loot. Clever card play and strategy are key as you balance influence and resource management, striving to score the highest points and emerge victorious in this two-player duel.
Three heists. Two rivals. One criminal mastermind will rise to the top.

In Sprawlopolis, you and your team are tasked with transforming a tiny town into a bustling metropolis. Using only 18 cards, you must strategically place them to maximize your city's growth. Each card represents different city zones, and you'll work together to connect and expand them. The twist is managing to keep road maintenance costs low, as roads reduce your score. Communicate and plan wisely to meet the city's demands. Can you and your team create the ultimate urban wonder?
Build the best metropolis by following the planning rules with this 18-card deck.

In Fresco, you are a master painter tasked with restoring a beautiful fresco in a Renaissance church. Each turn, decide when to wake up—early risers get the best choices, but cranky apprentices may slow you down. Assign your team to buy and mix paints, earn money by painting portraits, or even visit the opera to boost morale. Balance your resources wisely and complete sections of the fresco to impress the Bishop. With modular expansions, the game offers varied strategies and plenty of replay value.
Buy and mix paints to restore the Renaissance fresco and earn the Bishop's favor.
Sherlock Holmes Consulting Detective: Jack the Ripper & West End Adventures <small>(2016)</small>

In Sherlock Holmes Consulting Detective: Jack the Ripper & West End Adventures, you will immerse yourself in the intricate streets of Victorian London. As Holmes' confidants, solve ten unique cases by delving into newspapers, maps, and the London Directory. Tackle six standalone West End adventures and four challenging Jack the Ripper investigations. Collaboratively gather clues, follow leads, and test your deductive reasoning to outwit the infamous detective himself. Ideal for fans of narrative-driven mysteries.
Help Sherlock Holmes investigate the notorious serial killer, Jack the Ripper.

In Space Hulk, you will dive into the desperate battles between Space Marines and Genestealers within the narrow corridors of a derelict spaceship. As one player leads the elite Space Marines, you'll undertake high-stakes missions on the claustrophobic board, testing your tactical prowess. The other player controls the relentless Genestealers, swarming to overwhelm the marines. With modular terrain and fast-paced mechanics, every decision is crucial, making for an intense and strategic experience.
Space Marines combat Genestealers in the cramped corridors of a derelict spaceship.

In Woodcraft, you will run your own workshop deep in the forest, crafting unique items and improving your workspace. You'll gather different types of wood, symbolized by dice, which you can cut, glue, and manipulate to fulfill contracts. Hiring helpers and acquiring new tools will help you optimize your production and efficiency. With strategic planning and clever resource management, build the most successful workshop and satisfy your customers better than anyone else.
Grow trees, gather wood and other materials, craft items and build the best workshop!

In Commands & Colors: Napoleonics, you will relive the iconic battles between the French and British during the Napoleonic era. Using a unique card-driven system, you command your armies by playing command cards that dictate movements and attacks, introducing a strategic blend of planning and luck. Adapt to the ever-changing battlefield, maneuvering through varied terrain and using your diverse units to outsmart your opponent. Every decision counts in this tactical challenge.
Play several battles of the Napoleonic era, with a simple  card driven system.

In Flash Point: Flammendes Inferno, you're part of a firefighting team facing intense flames and saving lives. This cooperative game challenges you to rescue seven out of ten victims from a burning building before it collapses. You'll strategically use action points to extinguish fires, navigate through perilous areas, and transport victims to safety. With both basic and expert modes available, the game offers evolving difficulty levels, immersive elements, and the adrenaline of battling a relentless inferno.
Smoke! Fire! Work as a team to save as many as you can from a blazing inferno.

In Nippon, you step into the shoes of a powerful Zaibatsu leader during Japan's transformative Meiji era. Your goal is to build a sprawling industrial empire by investing in industries that will influence the nation and expand your power. Carefully balance your decisions as you invest in technology, shipping, and manufacturing, while vying for majority control in key areas. Every strategic choice you make carves your unique path through this historic period of rapid modernization.
Build an industrial empire out of a small business during Japan's Meiji period.

In Clash of Cultures, you guide your civilization from a modest settlement to a dominant empire. You will explore new territories, build bustling cities, and research powerful advancements. The game's modular board invites strategic exploration, while a variety of paths to victory keep every game fresh. Manage your cities carefully by choosing different buildings, each offering unique advantages. Whether through conquest or culture, only one civilization will stand the test of time.
Lead your civilization from a single settlement to a mighty empire.

In Kingsburg, you become a lord tasked with developing your territory at the kingdom's frontier. Over five years, you'll gather resources, construct buildings, and train troops. Each year has three production seasons and a winter season where you must fend off invaders. Utilize dice rolling to influence the King's Council for resources, soldiers, and advantages. Balance your strategies between military might and building prestige structures to win the King's favor by the end of the game.
Grow your realm, influence members of the King's court and fight the forces of winter

In Macao, you become an adventurous trader in the bustling 17th-century Portuguese port city on China's coast. Over twelve rounds, you'll select cards, roll dice, and strategically allocate resources to build your influence. A unique dice selection method lets you plan ahead, storing resources for future turns. Navigate your ship to deliver goods, acquire wealth, and expand your territory in the city. The player with the most prestige after twelve rounds claims victory.
Deliver goods, build the city and your tableau using a unique dice selection method.

In Stockpile, you become a savvy investor in a bustling stock market of the late 20th century. Navigate through insider information and strategic bidding as you buy and sell stocks to amass wealth. With hidden information, manage your investments wisely amidst changing market conditions. Will you hold for a stock split or sell to avoid bankruptcy? Each round, place your bets on stockpiles with known and unknown cards. Outsmart fellow investors and outshine in this fast-paced economy game.
Bid, buy and sell stocks in this hidden-information game.

In PitchCar, you will flick small wooden pucks around a customizable race track, racing against friends in a test of dexterity and strategy. The large puzzle-like pieces fit together to form a dynamic track that resembles a slot car raceway. With different track configurations and expansions available, each game offers unique challenges. Suitable for all ages, it's perfect for family gatherings or friendly competitions, offering endless fun with every flick.
Flick disks around a wooden race track that you can customize out of the box!

In Mice and Mystics, you become a loyal follower of the king, but transformed into tiny mice to escape evil Vanestra. Navigate through a massive castle filled with perils and enemies like rats, roaches, and the fearsome housecat, Brodie. Play as diverse characters like the clever Prince Collin or the sturdy smith Nez Bellows. This cooperative board game challenges you to plan strategically, collect cheese to gain new abilities, and work together to save the kingdom. Adventure and storytelling await in an ever-evolving environment.
After being turned into mice, a prince and his allies experience giant-sized stories.

In Thunderstone Quest, you will assemble a party of heroes, gather weapons, spells, and light, and delve into perilous dungeons. Explore new quests with unique dungeon tiles and face dangerous monsters. This fantasy deck-building game challenges you to upgrade your deck by purchasing more powerful cards as you advance through pre-set scenarios or replay with custom setups. Enjoy a blend of story and strategy in a game full of heroes, adventures, and choices.
Recruit powerful heroes, arm your party and dungeon delve for Thunderstone Shards!

In Avista, you will challenge your quick thinking and word-finding skills in a fun card game setting. Using a custom 52-card deck, each round presents you with subjects and initial letters that you must match by calling out the correct word as fast as you can. The subjects vary in difficulty, adding layers of challenge. The game rewards swift mental agility and a sharp tongue. Perfect for groups of 3 to 6 players, Avista keeps you engaged with its dynamic pace and competitive edge.

In Arch Rival, you will test your dexterity by stacking various pieces into a delicate arch. The game begins with a balanced arch built with color-coded cube compartments on a rocking base. As you take turns, you'll roll dice to determine how many pieces to stack and which compartment to fill. Be careful, because if you cause the arch to collapse, you lose! It's a tense party game of skill and tactics, where steady hands and a strategic mind will keep the arch steady.
Test your dexterity—stack pieces into a fragile arch before it all comes crashing dow
